column3: Eh re' korik laj k'axooj naaqa'nam i hoj , re' Jesucristo xk'uhtanik qeh noq xuyeew riib' pankimik quum . Je' wo' re' i hoj inchol qaye'em qiib' pankimik chikiij taqe i qahermano .

Ach-oq i iqal i runinq'ijiik i elik chaloq Egipto , re' Jesús reht'al chik chi xponik i ru orahiil chi nareliik reje ayu' wach ak'al , eh chi naa wo' chik rojiik ruuk' i raJaaw pan taxaaj . Re' Jesús xa ruk'ax wo' taqe pampeet i kinimanik reh wach ak'al , eh xa je' wo' re' kik'axariik xub'an noq xooj kuxoq .
Eh ¿ awach taqe aj uuk' xwihik cho ruk'aah i Dios chuwach i ka'winaq haab' ? ¿ Mi ma' kuuk' taqe re' i aamaam awati't ximahkunik chaloq re' xkahnik tuuch' i kiti'jolal chupaam i ye'aab' chiq yuuq' ?
Ruum chi nanimaj taq chik i Dios , eh hat taq rak'uun rixq'uun , ma' ruk'ul ta chik chi nee taq i na a'n inak'ax taq cho wach najtir noq komajaa' taq inanab'eej wach i Dios .
Re' Dios , chu'nchel xuyeew q'ab' keh chi xkikowb'isaj i kánima . Je' re' xb'aan keh ruum i Dios , re' raaj i reh chi junketeljiik wo' chik kiwach naa rub'anam .

Eh xb'iraj i q'orik xb'aan cho pan kixilak i kijib' chi k'achaach , je' wili i xuq'or : Xa ki'ib' libra chi trigo i naa ruye'ariik chi riij i jinaj q'iij chi kamanik . Eh waqiib' libra chi sebada i naa ruye'ariik chi riij i jinaj q'iij chi kamanik . Xa re' la' , maasach wach i aséite , i vino , inki .
Chaloch' taq awiib' chuwach i QaJaaw , eh re' reh nee ruyeew taq runimaal awach .

ruum re' Dios rupab'aam chik ruq'ijil jaruuj i rub'an i q'ataj q'orik chikinaah i tinamit . Eh jinaj i winaq rusik'im cho wach chub'anariik , re' wili xuk'uhtaaj chik chikiwach i tinamit noq xruksaj wo' chik chaloq chi k'achlik wach , inki i Pablo .
Re' taqe i soldado xkijitz' jinaj i corona k'iix , xkikoj wach naah i Jesús , eh xkikoj chi riij jinaj itz'ihy q'eqjutik ru kaqiil .

Ruum aj re' , re' hin inwaaj chi neenkian kaxáro ruka'peech taqe ixoq kamnaq kib'ahiil , i ko q'ahxoq taqe . Wih-oq kak'uun kixq'uun kicholoq k'acharik pankipaat , eh ma' nkiyeew q'ab' chi neekich'ooljik ruum i aj ixowaal ,
Re' taq i hat inchol taq animam chi re' hin wilkiin ruuk' i waJaaw , chi re' waJaaw wilik wuuk' i hin . Eh wi ma' xanimaj taq chi je' re' , xa re' ta naq taqe i nub'an nee taq inanimaj .
Eh re' kimik , ruch'ihil i kiye'aab' kamnaq , xikutarik pan palaw q'aaq' . Re' palaw q'aaq' re' re' , re' ruka'peech kimik .

Wi ta k'ih pech xuq'asaj riib' i Jesucristo chi jilow mayiij , k'ih pech naq kamnaq chaloq i rutz'uhkriik chee wach ak'al . Raaj i wili ma' je' ta re' i xub'an i reh yu'naak pantz'apaab' taqe wach ree q'iij : Re' Jesucristo xa junriim xk'ulik ayu' wach ak'al , eh reh juneliik noq xuq'asaj riib' chi mayiij chi rehtesjiik i mahk .
Re' Dios xukuy cho kilariik ruuk' i kina'ojb'al noq xib'ehik cho panchiq yuuq' chuwach i ka'winaq haab' .
Eh re' taq i hat nuhermano , noq naa taq amolom awiib' chuk'uxariik i Santolaj wi'k ree xq'eq je' rukab' i ruk'uxum chaloq i QaJaaw , ko naa taq awuy-eem awiib' noq naa taq ak'uxum .

Noq xuweq iloq i ruwaaq rehtalil lutz'b'al ree huuj i je' Rak'uun Tentzun , jinaj chik kowlaj yihk xub'an noq xwil . Re' q'iij xq'equmrik wach , xa je' chik q'eqjutik laj itz'ihy . Re' poh xsutinik chi xa kaq chik , xa je' chik kik' xkahnik .

Eh wilik taqe ixoq xinimanik , eh q'ahtesjik wo' chik keh kikamnaaq chi k'achlik kiwach . Wilik wo' taqe i ruuk' ti' k'axik xikanteesjik ma' xkaaj ta chi xiko'ljik , re' nkaaj i keh chi na' kiwuktoq chaloq chi k'achlik kiwach , nakireqem jinaj i loq'laj k'acharik .

Eh re' Pablo je' wili i xuq'or keh i polisía : Re' hoj , hoj aj Roma , xojkiyeew chi tz'uhuum chikiwach tinamit , eh xojkikoj pantz'ilom chi komajaa' ta nkiq'at q'orik chi qanaah mi korik chi wilik qamahk oon ma' xta qamahk . Eh yu'naak qohkaaj kesam reje pantz'ilom panke'lik . Ra'j xti ma' ruyeew ta riib' re' . Ko kichaloq wo' peet q'atal q'orik re' re' chi qehteesjiik , kora'j nee qoh elik re' , inki .

Re' taqe k'uhb'aal je' wili ruq'or : Maa ch'uwa'risaj wach aakaxaro , maakansaj aawas achaaq' , maak'ax wach chib'ih reh aawas achaaq' , inki . Eh re' k'uhb'aal wili , ruch'ihil i k'uhb'aal junch'uq chik , inooj eloq chi xa jinaj wach i ruq'or , je' wili ruq'or : Chak'ax taq aawas achaaq' je' rukab' noq inak'ax taq awiib' i hat , inki .
Eh awach i ch'iklik ruk'ux chi naa rilom wach i Jesucristo , k'ahchi' rusaqb'isam wach i ránima , je' rukab' i reh saq wach i ránima .
Eh xti mponik wo' naq rusuqkiil pan wánima i ruq'or i ruk'uhb'aal i Dios .
Xa eliik-oq suq taq ak'ux , chunimjiik i QaJaaw Jesucristo . Inuka'pechej ruq'orariik taq aweh chi xa suq-oq taq ak'ux .
Re' hin xnusutej b'ila' wiib' chi rilariik awach inq'orinik cho weh . Inwilow pe' , xawuquub' wo' chi ye'aab' kantela re' ruuk' i oro wilkeeb' ar .
Eh ¿ awach taqe aj chaj-iij xuq'or i korik i Dios chi ma' jaruuj taqe naa ruk'ulum ruuk' chi hi'lik ? ¿ Mi ma' keh re' i ma' xkaaj ta runimjiik i ruk'uhb'aal ?
Eh chu'nchel i k'ulinaq chi peet b'eeh chi nuwach i hin , ajileq' , aj kaansoom taqe , eh ma' xinimjik ta wo' kuum taqe i tentzun .

Re' taq i hat i wilkaat taq chi mosohjik , cha nimaj taq , eh ponoq taq panaq'awach apatroon , ma' xata re' i atoob' wach kik'ux i naa taq animam , je' la' wo' re' i naa taq a'nam kuuk' i josq'laj patroon .

Eh wilik taqe i winaq xkipab'aa' i koq chikiwach i q'atal q'orik chukojariik ru mahk Esteban je' wili i xkiq'or : Re' winaq wili xti korik chi ma' rumay ta rub'ajariik i rupaat i Dios je' wo' hoq i najtir k'uhb'aal .

Chu'nchel i wili ruuk' i Dios inchalik , re' i xk'amwik qeh panotob'il ruuk' i reh parub'ihnaal Jesucristo . Eh re' wo' i reh xpaab'anik qeh chuq'orariik i keh i qas qachaaq' chi neekiokik panotob'il ruuk' i Dios .
Je' re' noq re' taq i hat nuloq'laj hermano , cha tijej taq aweh nik' wach rukuyariik i ti' k'axik xkian chaloq taqe jalal ruq'oral i QaJaaw Dios , i xiq'orik chaloq parub'ihnaal .
Eh awach i neenkipahqaaj kuyb'al kimahk parub'ihnaal i QaJaaw neekiko'ljik , inki Dios , inki .

Je' wili xkiq'or : Je' ta wo' naq re' . Neeta naq intz'uuyjik wach , inye'arik ruloq'il , inkojarik chi ehchan na'ojb'al , int'ioosjik reh i rotob'il , inye'arik runimaal wach , inye'arik rajaawriik , re' inye'wik chee kowiil i qaDios wilik chi juneliik . Je' ta wo' naq re' , inki taqe .
Re' taq i xooyb'al awiib' mo'q xa chawiij taq neen wihik , mo'-oq ruuk' i ruk'oloch b'esjiik taq i rismaal anaah , mo'-oq ruuk' rukojariik taqe i oro , ruuk' rukojariik i k'ih taq tz'aaq itz'ihy .

Eh mat k'ixik chuq'orariik i rib'iral i QaJaaw Jesucristo . Mat k'ixik wo' wuum i hin chi wilkiin prexo ruum i rukamaj i reh . Hat-oq la' haa' chuk'ulariik i ti' k'axik ruum i ruq'orariik i ak' k'uhb'aal . Chakuy ransil taqe re' , ruuk' i rajaawriik i Dios .
Eh kuum i keh , inusantoheej wiib' i hin , reh chi re' keh neen ki santoheej kiib ruuk' i korik .
Chawik'raaj awiib' i hat , chayeew rukowiil kik'ux i xa chib'ih jariik ach k'isiin k'achalkeeb' , ruum re' hin i nukoj rehtaal taqe i na a'n ma' imponik ta chuwach i nuDios .
Re' roox ánjel xuchihkaaj chaloq i wilik chupaam i rukulk chinaah taqe nim ha' , je' wo' chinaah taqe raasb'al ha' . Eh ruum i re' , xi sutinik chi kik' .

Eh xa ruum chi nqayeew qak'ux chunimjiik i Jesucristo , inqa a'n rusuqkiil i rotob'il i Dios . Eh ma' xta chik i rub'an wii' kiib' qak'ux , insuuqb'ik la' qak'ux chi ruyub'jiik i ruloq'il i Dios naaqehtriik .

Aweht'al taq i hat chi re' k'oyoom , chi re' b'anal reh i ch'uwa' wach na'ojb'al , oon k'axal wach b'ehomal , re' taqe re' eliik wach ruuk' i loq'inik tiyoox ma' jaruuj naa rokiik pa runimaal rajaawriik i Jesucristo pa runimaal rajaawriik i Dios .

Re' i Abraham , ruum wo' chi xnimanik , xunimaj noq xq'orarik reh ruum i Dios chi eloq reje paruyuq'ul . Xelik wo' reje , xooj chupaam i ye'aab' i xye'arik reh chi rukooch . Xa re' la' ma' reht'al taj aha' inooj .
Ma a'n wo' taq aweh i xohk'rik , ruum re' re' i ruyoj i na'ojb'al . Re' la' i Santolaj Uxlab'al wih-oq taq panawánima chi manlik .
Re' taqe re' , ma' k'isiin wo' naa runimaniik keh chub'anariik i kima'tob'laj tuskil naa kik'uhtaam . Eh kuum i keh , naa ruq'orariik chi re' chi ma' re' i xti korik laj b'eeh .
Eh xa ruum i Jesucristo neenqa a'n okik panotob'il ruuk' Ajaab'ees Dios chi je' i hoj , chi je' taq i hat , re' jinaj chi Santolaj Uxlab'al neentoob'inik qeh chub'aan .

Eh re' taqe i ma' re' ta aj judío i aj nimaneel chik taqe , xqataq'aaj chik ruq'orariik keh panhuuj aha' wilik i ruk'ul qak'ux i hoj : Re' chi ma' toob' ta chi neenkik'ux keh i tiwik ye'ooj chi mayiij chikiwach i tiyoox , ni xata re' kik' , ni xata re' i chikop xa b'iyooj chi kalaq , eh chi manki a'n chik keh i k'oyomal je' rukab' i ruq'or i najtir k'uhb'aal , inki taqe .

Eh re' i Pedro je' wili xuq'or reh i Ananías : ¿ Chihreet noq xayeew q'ab' reh i aj Yahm chi xokik panawánima , reh chi xachuk i q'orik reh i Santolaj Uxlab'al , ruum yejaal i tumiin xakeb'aa' , re' i tz'aaq awak'aal ?

Chi je' re' ma' je' ta chik runa'ojb'al ha'lak'un i qana'ojb'al , ma' xata eeh neenqaq'or keh chukul q'orik ruuk' i xa chib'ih jariik chi tokoom k'uhb'aal neenkiq'or qeh . Eh ma' nee ta chik inqayee qiib' chi jot'arik keh taqe i xa chukul q'orik .

¿ Mi ma' aweht'al taq re' hat chi re' taqe i ma' korik ta wach kik'ux ma' naa ta kokiik pa runimaal rajaawriik i Dios ? Eh ni xata re' i taqe aj k'oyomal , taqe i looq'en tiyoox , taqe inkich'uwareej wach kikaxaro , taqe i kimahkunik ruuk' kuch winaq , naa kokiik ar .

Eh manqakanaa' taq i rumolariik qiib' chulooq'jiik i Dios , manqatijej qeh inki a'n i ma' nkaaj ta chik kimolom kiib' . K'ul la' qayeew rukowiil qak'ux chi qawach . Eh xti ajwaal wach chi qee hoj i re' yu'naak , ruum ach k'isiin ma' ink'uloq ruka'peech i QaJaaw Jesucristo .

Re' taq i hat , cha kanaa' taq rub'aan i yiib' wach na'ojb'al . Ma a'n taq chik i k'oyomal , je' wo' i ch'uwa' wach chi b'anarik , je' wo' xa chib'ih jariik iraaj ma' raaj b'anarik , je' wo' rub'aan i yiib' wach chi b'anarik , je' wo' ruk'axariik wach b'ehomal , re' re' eliik wach ruuk' i loq'inik tiyoox .

Raaj i hoj i pan q'iij wilkooj , eliik-oq manlik wach i qana'ojb'al . Eh inchol qako'leem qiib' ruuk' i qanimaniik , je' wo' ruuk' i k'axooj . Eh re' ko'lemb'al qiib' ch'iklik reje wii' qak'ux kamanoq qeh je' rukab' noq inkamanik reh i ruch'ihch' puneet soldado ,
ruum re' Ruxlab'al xuyeew cho qeh i Dios ma' re' ta yo'jik i ruk'am chaloq i ruyeew la' rukowiil qak'ux reh i k'axaj iib' , reh i rukorkiil wach qak'ux .
Eh awach inq'orik reh chi reht'al wach i Dios , eh mo'-oq wo' runimaj taqe ruk'uhb'aal , re' re' xachukuj q'orik i rub'an , ma' xtaj i korik ruuk' .

chamanaa' taq wach re' i rusuqkiil nuk'ux ruuk' i k'acharik pan jinaj wach k'uxliis , ruuk' i jinaj chi k'axaj iib' taq chawach , ruuk' i jinaj chi uxlab'al , eliik ta naq wach neenqik'raaj taq awuuk' .
Eh ruum i re' xkaaj naq kichopom Jesús . Xa re' la' , ma' awach taj ixukowej ruk'ux chi ruchopariik , ruum komajaa' ta wo' imponik i ora reh i ruchopariik .
Eh chi neen wihik kuuk' i otob'il reh chi nee kib'ehomrik ruuk' i rub'anariik i holohik laj na'ojb'al , eh reh wo' chi xa atoob'-oq wach kik'ux chuye'ariik i naakisihim .
Re' keh je' wili i chaq'wik xkian : Wi ta ma' chih ru mahk , ma' xqaq'asaj ta naq panaq'ab' , inki taqe .

Eh re' taqe inkiyeew ruloq'il jino'q i q'iij , inki a'n chi loq'oomb'al reh i Dios . Eh re' taqe i xa chu'nchel i k'uxb'al wi'k inkik'ux , inki a'n chi loq'oomb'al reh i Dios , eh reh wo' Dios inkit'iosej . Eh re' taqe i ma' chu'nchel taj i k'uxb'al wi'k inkik'ux , inki a'n wo' chi loq'oomb'al reh i Dios , eh inkit'iosej wo' reh i Dios .
Xa suq-oq taq ak'ux chi ruyub'jiik i naa taq ruye'em aweh i Dios . Chakowej taq ak'ux chukuyariik ti' k'axik . Eh maakanaa' wo' taq rub'aan atiij .

Eh re' q'atal q'orik Félix xuq'or reh i k'amal kib'eeh soldado chi xana rucha'jaljiik i Pablo chi maa rutz'ap i kooq chi jumpech , eh chi nee ruyeew q'ab' reh chi nee ruq'o'reej taqe chaloq i ramigo nee kiooj k'oloq ruuk' chi q'orob'jiik .
Re' wilik k'axooj ruuk' , i rukuy nik' nimaal i ti' imb'aan reh , inimanik , inuy-inik , chu'nchel i rukuy .

Pan santo laj huuj je' wili i ruq'or i rutz'ihb'aam chaloq i reey David : Re' hin xnunimaj i Dios , ruum aj re' , i nuq'or rib'iral , inki . Je' wo' re' i hoj yu'naak inqanimaj wo' Dios : Inqanimaj aha' wilik i ruq'or , inqaq'or wo' rib'iral ,

Eh inqaq'or wo' taq awee hat chi chakoj taq kina'ojb'al i ma' nkaaj ta kamanik . Chayeew taq rukowiil kik'ux i xa ki'ib' kik'ux chi nimanik . Chatoob'eej wo' taq i komajaa' kow kik'ux . Eh xa hat-oq taq kuyuul chu'nchel aj uuk' .

Re' roo' ánjel xuchihkaaj chaloq i wilik chupaam i rukulk chinaah i ruye'aab' i peet josq'laj chikop . Eh re' tinamit ruchopom naah xi kahnik panq'equm , eh xa nkitiiw chik i kaaq' ruum i ruti'kiil i xkik'ul .
Eh chawunchelaal taq i hat i ajalam taq chik wach aana'ojb'al , nee ta naq taq i ruyeew rusuqkiil ak'ux i Dios , nee ta naq taq i ruketelaaj chaawach , je' wo' taqe i xti manlik rutinamiit i Dios .

Re' reh k'uhtamaj reh chi korik i rub'eeh i QaJaaw . Eh nik' nimaal i reht'al chi riij i xk'ulik ruk'uhtaaj i Jesús , chu'nchel ruk'ux i ruq'or , t'anlik wach i ruq'orariik i rub'an . Atoob' ta xa re' i qasanik ha' xub'an i Juan ruuk' ha' reht'al ma' reht'al taj i qasanik ha' i rub'an i Santolaj Uxlab'al .
Eh wi xa a'n taq awa' ahaa' , eh xa chib'ih-oq chik jariik taq i xawaaj a'nam , ma' xta reet cha a'n taq chu'nchel chi loq'oomb'al ree Dios .

Re' taq i hat wilik taq chik panawánima i Santolaj Uxlab'al , re' i ruye'em taq aweh i Jesucristo . Ruuk' i re' , ma' kota chik ruman chi awach neentijinik taq aweh , ruum re' wo' i Santolaj Uxlab'al ink'uhtanik taq aweh i holohik , i korik , ma' re' ta chukuj q'orik . Maacanaa' taq chik i wihik ruuk' i Jesucristo , je' rukab' i xatrutijej taq wii' .
Re' ti'jolal noq ma' xtaj i uxlab'al ruuk' , kamnaq inkahnik wii' . Je' wo' re' i nimanik imb'aan xa chi rutkeel wila' ma' ruch'ihil otob'il , inkahnik chi kamnaq .
Noq xuq'or i Pablo i wili , xuchop jinaj i kaxlanwi'k , eh xut'iosej ree Dios chikiwach i wilkeeb' pan i barco . Xuch'uy i kaxlanwi'k , xutoq'aa' rub'anam ruwa' i reh .

Manlik la' ruuk' i ruq'orariik reje keh panhuuj chi mankik'ux chik keh i mayijimaj chikiwach i tiyoox , je' wo' kitib'kaal i chikop i xa b'iyooj taqe , chi mankik'ux i kik' , chi manki a'n chik keh i k'oyomal .

Eh re' Pablo , je' wili i xuq'or reh : Re' Dios naa rusak'wiik awee hat , i xak'ul i na a'n awach . Wila' tzunulkaat cho ar chuq'atariik q'orik chi nunaah je' rukab' i ruq'or i najtir k'uhb'aal , ¿ chihreet noq inataq'aaj nusak'ariik ? Ruuk' i xaq'or re' re' , ma' nanimaj taj i ruq'or i najtir k'uhb'aal , inki .

Je' re' noq yu'naak , ma' xta chik i tojb'al mahk chikinaah i wilkeeb' ruuk' i Jesucristo . Re' taqe i ma' k'acharik ta chik inki a'n je' rukab' iraaj i kiti'jolal , k'acharik la' chik inki a'n je' rukab' iraaj i Santolaj Uxlab'al ,
ruum re' Dios ma' xusik' ta qawach chi nakooj ruye'em pantojb'al mahk . Xusik' la' cho qawach , reh chi naqareqem i ko'lemb'al qiib' parub'ihnaal i QaJaaw Jesucristo .

Eh naa rojiik chi kijot'ariik i nimaq taq tinamit sut i wach ak'al Gog , eh Magog i kib'ihnaal . Eh re' i aj yahm naa wo' rumolom wach i ki soldado i tinamit re' re' reh i peletohinik . Re' ki soldado xiik' naah kik'ihaal je' k'ihaal i saniib' chii' palaw .

Eh wilik wo' naq taq chaxilak i hat i je' re' i kina'ojb'al . Raaj yu'naak tz'ajooj chik iloq taq amahk , eh aq'asam taq chik awiib' chub'anariik iraaj i Dios . Hat taq chik ko'limaj chuwach i mahk parub'ihnaal i QaJaaw Jesucristo , parub'ihnaal i Santolaj ruxlab'al i qaDios .

Ruum aj i re' , k'ahchi' nuk'ulum i ti' k'axik wili . Xa re' la' re' hin ma' kink'ixik taj ruum taqe re' , ruum weht'al awach i nunimaj , eh i nunimaj chi wilik rajaawriik chi rumolariik i nuye'aab' naa ruye'em weh na' k'oloq ruka'peech i Jesucristo .

Eh maakanaa' taq rub'aan aatiij , cha pahqaaj taq reh i Dios chib'ih taq inawaaj , ruuk' i rajaawriik i Santolaj Uxlab'al . Xa eliik-oq na'lik taq aweh , reh chi ma' nee tanyoj taq ak'ux . Eh cha a'n taq atiij chikiij chu'nchel santo laj aj nimaneel .

Re' hin i Pablo , wuch'ihil i Silvano , wuch'ihil Timoteo , noq , xnutz'ihb'aaj reje huuj wili aweh taq i hat wilkaat taq Tesalónica , i wilkaat taq pan jinaj wach k'uxliis chunimjiik i Ajaab'ees Dios , i QaJaaw Jesucristo . Chuyeew ta naq i rotob'il i Dios taq cha naah , je' wo' hoq i suq kiil k'uxliis .
Chu'nchel ta naq nee kinab'inik taq awach chi xa hat taq chaq'laam , ruum re' QaJaaw Jesucristo inyijik chaloq i ruk'uliik ruka'peech .
Eh jarpech taq naa ak'uxum aweh i kaxlanwi'k , naa awuk'em taq aweh i ha' pan i kulk korehtaal i ruk'uliik ruka'peech i QaJaaw Jesucristo . Re' ti' laj kimik xuk'ul k'ahchi' taq aq'orom rib'iral
Eh noq neenkian kitiij chu'nchel kik'ux , re' yowaab' neenk'aachjik eh re' QaJaaw neenuksanik reh . Eh wila' wilik taqe i mahk rub'anam , neenkuyarik i ru mahk ruum i QaJaaw .

Re' hin eliik tik'ulik panuk'ux panutiij chi q'iij chi aq'ab' . Tinut'iosej ree Dios , re' i k'ahchi' nub'anam i rukamaj i hin chi ma' xta ruch'uwa'iil wach i nukapeew , je' rukab' i rukamaj i Dios xkian chaloq i numaam wati't .

Re' keh je' wili i xkiq'or reh taqe yuuq' , nimaq taq saqrehp : Tiq'ehb'oq taq cho chi qanaah Qoh akeb'aa' taq chuwach i tzunlik cho paruloq'laj ye'aab' Qoh akeb'aa' taq chuwach i rujosq'iil i je' Rak'uun Tentzun ,

Awach iraaj rib'iram , chunimaj i ruq'or i Santolaj Uxlab'al keh i ju'jun ch'uq chi aj nimaneel Awach i naa reliik korik , naa nuye'em reh chi k'uxarik i maná , ma' nilarik ta wach . Eh naa nuye'em reh Jinaj i k'isa saq laj ab'aj re' tz'ihb'amaj wii' jinaj i ak' b'ihnaal ma' awach ta neht'alinik reh . Xa re' wo' neht'alinik awach ink'ulwik reh , inki .

Eh ruum i kituskil ree tumiin , naa taq kaat kelq'aam ruuk' i ruk'uhtjiik taq aweh i xachukuj q'orik . Xa re' la' re' keh , ma' naa ta rik'iik chikiij chi naakiye'ariik pa runimaal ti' k'axik , ruum xa najtir wo' inkorjik cho wach chi je' re' i naakik'ulum .
Ruum aj re' , re' Dios i ruyeew q'ab' chi kijot'ariik ruum i yiib' wach na'ojb'al . Eh re' re' minwik keh chunimjiik i xachukuj q'orik ,
Xti korik wo' i ruq'or i tz'ihb'amaj pan santo laj huuj chi je' wili : Ruum taq ayiib' wach na'ojb'al i na a'n i hat taq aj judío , inkib'aj i Dios i ma' re' ta taqe aj judío , inki .

Nik' wach i xkian chaloq i winaq aj war , Janes , i Jambres , i xkixowaaj cho wach i xub'an i Moisés , je' wo' re' inki a'n taqe aj jot'ool re' re' inkixowaaj wach i korik eh xiik' naah yib'kiil wach i kikapeew kiq'eb'em chi riij kik'ux i korik laj nimanik .
Re' hin kow taqe nuq'il , i nukoj kina'ojb'al awach taqe nuk'ax . Je' re' noq re' hat , maakanaa' awiib' . Chachop la' ak'ux chi nimanik , eh cha sik' wo' chik i Dios ruka'peech .
Re' i Dios xa ruum inqayeew qak'ux chi nimanik , qoh ruko'leej chuwach i mahk , eh chi xa parub'ihnaal i QaJaaw Jesucristo wilkooj chik pansuqkiil k'uxliis ruuk' i Dios .

Chawik'raaj awiib' i hat cha wib'il awiib' , je' wo' ruuk' i k'uhb'alinik naa a'nam , re' taqe re' naa a'nam . Wila' xa a'n taqe re' , neetiko'ljik i hat , eh nee wo' kiko'ljik i neeki-ib'irinik reh i naa aq'orom .

Xata wo' jarpech i nub'an cho ti' k'axik keh i aj nimaneel , chupaam i paat inlooq'jik wii' i Dios , re' naq xwaaj chi nkikanaa' runimjiik i Jesús . Eh xayohb'aal wach i nuk'aah chikinaah , kinooj chi kisik'ariik pantaq tokoom tinamit .
Ink'utinik chi korik i ruk'am chaloq yiib' wach na'ojb'al , re' taqe wili : ch'uwa'risanik wach i kaxáro , k'acharik pan k'oyomal , i ch'uwa' wach na'ojb'al , ma' tob'laj tuskil ,
Je' re' noq , ni xata re' i hin i xintikwik reh i , eh ni xata re' i je' kojooj ruha'iil xub'an , wilik qajaawriik . Xa re' la' wo' Dios wilik rajaawriik , re' i xk'isanik reh .
Eh re' Dios ruye'em taq chik chaaweh chu'nchel i rotob'il ajwaal taq wach cha weh . Yu'naak xa re' taq chik naa awuy-eem jaruuj ink'ulik ruka'peech i QaJaaw Jesucristo .

Eh jinaj i q'orik xb'aan cho pan taxaaj noq xb'iraj . Xa je' chik rukab' noq inqajik chaloq nim ha' wataq ab'aj xampojik chik . Xa je' chik rukab' i xeleqinik i rub'an i kahoq . Eh xa je' chik inq'orik ruk'ihaal arpa noq inq'oojiik .
Eh chu'nchel i jalal ruq'oral i Dios ik'inaq taqe chaloq kiq'orom wo' cho rib'iral i chi awach i naakinimaniik reh i Jesús , parub'ihnaal i reh naakik'ulum i kuyb'al kimahk , inki Pedro .
Eh naa ruye'em keh i juneliik k'acharik awach i k'ahchi' kikuyum rub'anariik i holohik laj na'ojb'al , k'ahchi' kisik'im chi naa ruye'ariik kiloq'il , chi naa ruye'ariik i kik'axb'aal .

Re' hin i Juan , inutz'ihb'aaj reje ahuuj taq i hat i wuquub' ch'uq chi aj nimaneel wilkaat taq paruyuq'ul i Asia . Chak'ul taq i rotob'il , i suq kiil k'uxliis inchalik ruuk' i Dios , wilik cho najtir q'iij , wilik yu'naak , naa ruwihiik chi juneliik . Re' i ruyeew i wuquub' chi uxlab'al wilik chuwach i Dios paruloq'laj ye'aab' .

Re' Pablo je' wili i xuq'or keh : Hoo' , korik noq re' Juan xuqasaj cho kihaa' i xkiyot' kik'ux chi riij i kimahk . Xa re' la' , i xuq'or wo' keh chi naa kinimam i k'ulik iloq reh chi riij i reh , iraaj ruq'orom chi re' QaJaaw Jesús , inki keh .

Je' re' noq re' QaJaaw reht'al nik' wach kiko'ljiik i rub'an chuwach i pajarik inchalik chikinaah i kiq'asam kiib' reh . Eh reht'al wo' hoq nik' wach noq i ruyeew taqe panti' k'axik i yiib' wach kina'ojb'al korehtaal i rureq ruq'ijil i q'ataj q'orik .

Jinaj la' ye'aab' xiik' naah chihojal xkaaj kireqem , re' i ye'aab' pan taxaaj . Ruum aj re' , re' Dios ma' jaruuj neenk'ixik chi neeruq'or keh chi re' reh i ki Dios , ruum jinaj i nimlaj tinamit ruyejaam cho keh pan taxaaj .
Eh manimaj aweh i hat taqe i yiib' wach k'utaaj imb'aan , re' taqe i xa memil laj q'orik . Chachop la' ak'ux chub'anariik iraaj i Dios .

Re' taqe soldado re' re' xkipuhkaaj kiib' wach ak'al . Eh xkisutej riij i ye'aab' wilkeeb' wii' i santo laj aj nimaneel , je' wo' tinamit q'e' ruk'axam . Eh re' Dios xukut chaloq i q'aaq' pan taxaaj chikinaah i aj ixowaal re' re' , eh xuk'at taqe chi jumpech .
Eh xuq'or keh chi naa ruqajiik kihaa' chi kunchelaal parub'ihnaal i Jesucristo . Chi riij i re' , xkipahqaaj kikuyariik ree Pedro chi kahnoq pee chik jarub'-oq q'iij kuuk' ar .
Ruum aj re' , q'e' naa niimb'isaj awiib' chuq'orariik chi nee na a'n ruk'uhtjiik kib'eeh i je' taqe moywach eh chi hat kisaqumaal i panq'equm k'acharik inki a'n
Eh re' i Jesucristo xanoq wo' ruq'orom cho pampeet chi naa ruye'em qeh i juneliik k'acharik .

Eh re' taqe i wilik kuuk' i na'ojb'al inchalik ruuk' i Dios , saq chik wach i kik'achariik . Eh xasuq kik'ux chu'nchel aj uuk' , ch'ub'ik wach kik'ux , xa chaq'laam taqe . Aj keteloom wachiis taqe , eh inki a'n otob'il ma' awach taj i tokoom rilariik inki a'n eh korik kiq'orik .
Re' Ajaab'ees Dios i ruk'ax i Rak'uun , xuyeew rajaawriik chinaah taqe i xa chib'ih jariik wilik .

Re' QaJaaw ma' chamlik ta chaloq chub'anariik i ruq'orom cho rib'iral , je' rukab' inkikapaaj i ju'jun . K'ahchi' la' rukuyum taq aawuyub'jiik i hat , ruum re' reh ma' raaj taj chi awach i neenkimik parumahk iraaj la' chi chu'nchel neenkiyot' i kik'ux chi riij i kimahk .

Re' hin inwaaj naq chi chu'nchel i winaq ma' nee ta nkian kaxáro , nee kikahnik chi je' nukab' i hin . Xa re' la' ma' nee ta rub'an , ruum re' Dios reh reh wach i kooch ruye'em cho chinaah i ju'jun ma' eliik ta wach i xuyeew chi qanaah .
Re' taq i hat hermano , cha k'ax taq awiib' . Eh cha pahqaaj taq i kooch i ruyeew i Santolaj Uxlab'al , eh re' i xti ajwaal wach chi xilak re' , re' chi nee taq inaq'or i ruk'uhb'aal i Dios .

K'ahchi' qaq'orom rib'iral i Jesucristo , ruum re' wo' Dios , i q'orinaq cho reh pampeet chi re' saqum naa rusihq'iniik chupaam i q'equm . Eh re' wo' xsihq'inik cho pan i qánima , reh chi ruuk' i saqum re' re' neenqa a'n reht'aljiik nik' wach noq wilik i ruloq'il i Dios , re' i saqum i ruk'uhtaaj qeh i Jesucristo .

Chupaam i q'iij re' re' , xooj k'oloq Éfeso jinaj i aj Judío Apolos rub'ihnaal , Alejandría inchalik . Re' reh xti nchol k'uhb'alinik eh reht'al chi korik i ruk'uhb'aal i Dios tz'ihb'amaj pan santo laj huuj .
Je' wo' re' i xb'aan reh i Jesucristo . Ko najt ruuk' i tinamit Jerusaleem xponik xkikansaj , reh chi ruuk' i ruloq'laj kik'eel xuchihkaaj , xukanaa' chi wilik kisantohiil taqe rak'uun rixq'uun .
Re' taqe wili naa ak'uhb'alem wii' . Chayeew rukowiil kik'ux . Chak'uhtaaj awajaawriik chi kiq'ilariik . Mayeew q'ab' chi neenkixow awach .
Re' qak'axariik xub'an i Dios ti xk'utinik noq xutaq'aaj cho wach ak'al i jinaj chi Rak'uun . Re' xraaj i reh chi parub'ihnaal i Rak'uun naa ruwihiik qak'achariik chi juneliik .

WaJaaw , re' hat xat ye'wik taqe weh . Ruum aj re' , inwaaj i hin chi naa kiwihiik ar aha' naa nuwihiik wii' i hin , reh chi neenkilow wach i nuloq'il , re' i loq'il aye'em weh i hat , ruum re' hat xa kinak'ax wo' chaloq pampeet noq komajaa' inatz'uhkrisaj i wach ak'al .
Eh aha' yuuq' kiooj k'oloq , xanoq wo' sachooj eh ti' k'axik inki a'n reh i kas kichaaq' .
Re' Jesucristo , i Rak'uun i Dios , jinaj raJaaw K'amal b'eeh aj Tiij chi qeh i hoj , okinaq chik i koq pan taxaaj ruuk' i Dios chi qatoob'jiik . Ruum aj re' , qachop taq qak'ux chi nimanik ,

Eh xqilow wo' noq xye'arik runimaal wach ruloq'il i Jesucristo ruum i Ajaab'ees Dios , re' noq xq'orob'jik cho ruum i Dios ruuk' i loq'laj q'orik wili : Re' wili i Wak'uun q'e' nuk'axam , eh ruuk' i reh ch'iklik nuk'ux , inki .
Eh chu'nchel i wili xa re' wo' jinaj chi Santolaj Uxlab'al inch'aqwik cho chinaah i ju'jun chi aj nimaneel chi naa kianam re' q'oreel i ruk'ul chi keh paruk'ux i reh .

Eh noq xuxulej chee rutuun i rukaaj ánjel . Je' naa k'isiin ma' junch'uy i q'iij , i poh xpohyik kiwach . Eh je' naa k'isiin ma' yejaal i kik'ihaal ch'umiil xpohyik kiwach , eh je' naa k'isiin ma' juntoq q'iij , k'isiin ma' juntoq aq'ab' xq'equmrik kiwach , eh ma' xisihq'inik ta chik noq xwil .

Noq xkilow chi je' re' , junokiik taqe chuchopariik i Sóstenes nim wach k'amal b'eeh chupaam i paat inlooq'jik wii' Dios . Eh xa ar wo' chuwach i q'atb'al q'orik kiq'ojib'eej , re' Galión xama' xta wo' xraaj reh .
Eh xkaaj wo' naq chik kichopom i Jesús xa re' la' , re' reh ma' xuyeew ta wo' riib' keh .

Ruum aj re' , re' hoj ma' ta neerub'an kiib' qak'ux chi ruq'orariik i ruk'uhb'aal i Dios . Atoob' ta naq k'ahchi' cho rokiik qarijb'iil , re' qánima rajlaal i q'iij k'ahchi' rureqem rukowiil chunimjiik i Dios .

Eh re' i María xuk'am chaloq i jinaj lemeta ink'ohnik laj iq'oom nardo ruyej-aal q'e' k'ih tz'aaq , xub'uch' i rooq i Jesús , eh xuchiqsaj wo' chik ruuk' i rismaal i naah . Re' iq'oom xupuhkaaj riib' i ruk'ohonkiil chupaam i paat re' re' .

Eh xa ruum wo' chi xnimanik i Abraham , xpatinik chi xa je' aj patal chupaam i ye'aab' q'orooj cho rib'iral reh ruum i Dios . Re' Abraham , xa re' ruuk' itz'ihy naah paat xpatinik wii' . Eh je' wo' re' ixpatinik cho wii' i Isaac , i Jacob , re' i xk'ulwik reh i ruq'orom cho rib'iral i Dios .
Eh re' taq i hat hermano , chak'am taq naah i na'ojb'al i nub'an i hin . Eh chakoj taq rehtaal i kik'achariik taqe k'ahchi' kik'amam naah i xatqatijej taq cho wii' i hat .
K'ul la' taq chatoob'eej awiib' chawach ruuk' i ti' k'axik i neenchalik taq cha naah . Chi je' re' , nee taq i na a'n runimjiik i ruk'uhb'aal i Jesucristo .
Re' taq i hat xakoj taq chik rehtaal chi re' Dios i ruq'or chi korik wach ruk'ux awach imb'anik reh otob'il ma' xata ruuk' i nimanik i rureq rukorkiil wach ruk'ux .
Eh ¿ mi ruum i re' neenqaq'or chi re' Dios ma' rub'ehel ta imb'anik ? Ra'j ti ma' chih ta re' , rub'ehel la' i rub'an ,
Re' taq i hat , chak'ul taq cho chi korik taqe aahermano komajaa' ta kow kik'ux . Eh matoq'aa' taq awech'um riij keh inkiq'or ,

Chi riij i re' , je' wili i peleto xb'aan pan taxaaj noq xwil : Re' ánjel Miguel , ruch'ihil taqe ruánjel , xub'an i peleto ruuk' i mama' kaq riij aaq' . Eh re' mama' aaq' ruch'ihil wo' naq taqe ruánjel chi k'ulb'ilinik .
Nik'-oq xchalik taq ak'aah chawach , mat ik'ik taq q'iij chi k'ahinik taq awiib' . Mayeew taq q'ab' ree k'aah chi nee taq tiruyeew pamahk .

Maaq'aj taq wach i ma' holohik taj imb'aan taq aweh eh maab'aj taq i kib'ajwik taq aweh . Chapahqaaj la' taq i rotob'il i Dios chikiij , ruum re' re' xraaj taq awuuk' noq xusik' taq chaawach chi naa taq awehtriik i rotob'il i reh ,
Re' waJaaw xtaaq'anik cho weh xa wilik wo' wuuk' . Ma' hin ta rukanaam chi wutkeel , ruum eliik k'ahchi' kiin chub'anariik imponik chuwach i reh , inki Jesús .
Eh kow-oq taq ak'ux , xti cha yejaa' taq awiib' ruuk' i korik laj ruq'oral i Dios . Eh re' korik laj k'acharik taq neena a'n neenko'linik taq aweh chuwach i aj yahm .

Re' wili iraaj ruq'orom i ma' eht'alimaj taj chi riij i wuquub' chi ch'umiil xawilow wach parusak'aaj nuq'ab' , re' taqe i re' kijalwaach i ju'jun chi k'amal b'eeh wilik chi kixilak i ju'jun ch'uq chi aj nimaneel . Eh re' wuquub' chi ye'aab' kantela re' ruuk' i oro kijalwaach i wuquub' ch'uq chi aj nimaneel , inki weh .

Eh re' hoj xqeht'aliij chi re' Jesucristo xama' najt taj xqahteesjik i rajaawriik ruum i Dios chuwach i kajaawriik i ánjel . Eh xa ruum i rotob'il , xuyeew pan kimik i Jesucristo kuum i tinamit , eh xye'arik wo' chik ruloq'il , runimaal wach ruum i ti'laj kimik xuk'ul .
ruum re' i Dios inye'wik taq pan awánima i rotoowjiik , i rub'aan i holohik . Eh re' wo' reh neentoob'inik taq aweh chub'aan aha' wilik iraaj i reh .
Re' hin i nuq'or taq aweh taqe wili , reh chi neen wihik taq awuuk' i suq kiil k'uxliis i nuyeew i hin , eh neemanlojik wach i rusuqkiil taq ak'ux .
Re' hin i Pablo , hin raj tahqaneel i Jesucristo . Xirupab'aa' i Dios , i aj Ko'len qeh . Eh xirupab'aa' i QaJaaw Jesucristo , re' i ch'iklik wii' qak'ux .

Eh re' taqe ixoq parub'ehel naakitiq'aam kiib' , maaniik' naah inki a'n , paneb'a'il-oq la' kikoj i kiso' . Man ki k'olochb'isaj i rismaal kinaah . Mankixoyej kiib' ruuk' oro , ruuk' perla , eh ni xata ruuk' k'ih tz'aaq itz'ihy .

Re' i Jesús , xub'arkiij wach , rutz'uhuum . Ruuk' i re' , xresaj taqe chaloq parupaat i QaJaaw chu'nchel i aj k'aay kuch'ihil i kitentzuun , i kib'ooyax . Eh xutilej wach ak'al i kitumiin i kich'aqwik wach tumiin , xuk'ahwaaj reje wulu' i kiméxa .

ruum re' Dios xyej-anik cho qeh , re' xraaj i reh chi parub'ihnaal i Jesucristo , xuyeew qeh i ak'laj k'acharik . Reh chi naa qa'nam i holohik laj na'ojb'al , je' rukab' i ruyejaam cho wach i reh pampeet .
Hat taq loq'laj hermano , mansahchik taq ak'ux ruuk' i xiik' naah chi ti' k'axik k'ahchi' taq ak'ulum ruum re' re' pajb'al taq aweh , maaq'or taq chi kore' taq i hat k'ahchi' ak'ulwiik reh .

Je' re' noq , qasuuqb'isaj taq qak'ux chi manlik . Qayeew taq ruloq'il i qaDios , ruum xureq chik ruq'ijil chi naa rub'anam kaxáro i je' Rak'uun Tentzun . Eh re' naa ruk'amam chi rehk'een ruyejaam chik riib' ,
Re' ko'lemb'al iib' , kamanoq taq aweh chi jilow ach'ihch' puneet . Eh re' ruq'oral i Dios i ruyeew taq aweh i Santolaj Uxlab'al , kamanoq taq aweh chi jilow taq ach'ihch' k'ul q'as .

Eh re' i Moisés , xponik rureq chi jinaj i aj Egipto k'ahchi' rub'anam ti' k'axik reh jinaj i aj Israel . Re' i Moisés xuko'leej i aj Israel , xukansaj i aj Egipto chi q'ajb'al wach i ti' k'axik xub'an .
Hermano , manq'uhtik taq ak'ux i hat chub'anariik i ma' xta reet chi b'anarik .
Re' taq i hat , xa eliik-oq na'lik taq aweh , eh korik-oq wach taq ak'ux chi nimanik . Matyo'jik taq , eh kow-oq taq ak'ux .

Re' la' taq i hat xawihqaaj taq chaloq rupaat taq aatiyoox , Moloc xatehlaaj taq reje , ruch'ihil i rujalwaach ruch'uminal taq atiyoox , Refan xaloq'ej taq , re' taq i hat xatyej-anik reh . Eh ruum taq i na a'n re' re' , naa taq kaat nuk'amam reje ko chi juntar i Babilonia , inki Dios , inki .
Hermano , korik-oq taq wach ak'ux chi nimanik . Eh mansahchik taq panak'ux aak'uhb'aaljiik xponik qa a'n ruuk' qachii' , je' wo' taq aak'uhb'aaljiik xqataq'aaj taq reje aweh panhuuj .
Eh re' wo' Dios inkojwik qana'ojb'al chuk'ulariik i wili . Eh re' wo' reh xye' wik pan qánima i Santolaj Uxlab'al chi raa' ri'sil peet i naa qak'ulum na' chub'an .
Re' taqe ixoq inchol kib'iram i kik'uhb'aljiik imb'aan chi ma' xta choqik neenkian , eh kiq'asam-oq kiib' chi korik ree Dios .
Manimaj i mahk neentz'aqarik wach aweh chi riij jino'q i to'ool wila' ma' chih ki'ib' oon ixib'-oq i neekiq'orik i korik chi wilik ru mahk .
Re' taq hat hermano , k'ul taq chayeew rusuqkiil ak'ux chawach ruuk' santo laj tz'ub'uuj . Eh chu'nchel i kinimanik ree Jesucristo wilkeeb' ayu' inkitaq'aaj taq reje rusuqkiil ak'ux .

Eh ruum i ruti'kiil kik'ux , xa nkipukej chik i pooq wach kinaah . Xa suq chik kioq'ik , eh xkik'er reje kichii' chuq'orariik chi je' wili : Q'e' wo' chik ti' , Q'e' wo' chik ti' i xuk'ul i tinamit re' re' . Ruuk' chu'nchel chib'ih naq i wilik reh , xib'ehoomb'rik taqe wilik ki barco nah palaw . Eh xa chi jumehq'iil tii xsahchik wach , inki taqe .

Chakoj taq rehtaal chi re' i Ajaab'ees Dios ma' k'isiin ta xoj ruk'ax , ruum xojrukoj chi hoj rak'uun rixq'uun . Eh xti korik chi hoj rak'uun rixq'uun , ruum i re' , ma' qohponik ta panaq'kiwach i tinamit , eh ni xata re' Ajaab'ees Dios imponik panaq'kiwach .

Je' wo' taq i hat k'ijolaq , tinimanoq taq chikiwach i kitowik parukamaj i Dios . Eh k'ul taq cha nimaj awiib' ruuk' chaq'lamiil , ruum pan santo laj huuj i ruq'or chi je' wili : Re' Dios ma' imponik ta panaq'wach taqe inkinimb'isaj kiwach . Eh re' taqe i chaq'laam i ruyeew i rotob'il chikinaah , inki .

Ra'j xti ma' chih ta re' ruum re' Dios korik inq'orik , atoob' ta chu'nchel i tinamit chukul q'orik taqe . Eh tz'ihb'amaj wo' chaloq chi je' wili : Re' hat naa aq'oriik chi korik wach ak'ux , ruuk' i re' , naaweliik korik noq naakiq'atam q'orik cha naah , inki .
Eh yu'naak xk'ulik iloq ayu' Damasco , xye'arik cho rajaawriik kuum taqe kajaaw i k'amal kib'eeh aj tiij , reh chi naa ruk'amam taqe reje pantz'ilom chu'nchel i kiq'orik aab'ihnaal , inki .

Eh chi kixilak i tinamit Israel xi wihik chaloq taqe i jalal tii chik ruq'oral i Dios xkian kiib' , aj chukul q'orik taqe . Je' wo' re' na' kiwih-oq taq chaxilak i hat i naakik'uhtaniik reh chi q'eeqmaal i xachukuj q'orik injot'wik . Eh ruuk' i re' , ma' naa ta kikojom chi Dios i QaJaaw , re' i xko'linik naq cho keh . Ruum taqe i re' , jinaj i runimaal ti' k'axik naa ruchaliik chikinaah chi jumehq'iil .

Eh ruum i re' , re' taqe i k'amal kib'eeh i aj judío tix kaaj naq kikansam i Jesús , ma' xata ruum chi rub'an i k'aachrisanik pan i hi'limb'al q'iij , ruum la' wo' hoq chi rupaj riib' ruuk' i Dios , eh chi xuq'or chi re' Dios i raJaaw .
Re' hin , hermano , q'e' taq insuuqb'ik nuk'ux chawiij , ruum ma' jaruuj kinsahchik taq panak'ux , eh k'ahchi' taq ak'amam naah taqe i nuk'uhtaam taq aweh .
Re' reey David je' wili xuq'or chi riij i Jesús : Re' hin eliik k'ahchi' wilom wach i waJaaw , ma' hin ta rukanaam , xa eliik k'ahchi' kiin rutoob'eem , reh chi ma' xta neenyojwik nuk'ux .

Re' taq i hat xat-aasjik wo' taq chik ruka'peech . Xa re' la' yu'naak , ma' re' ta chik ruuk' taq atuut ajaaw xakikimik . Xat-aasjik la' taq ruuk' i ruq'oral i Dios , re' i ruq'oral k'achlik eh ma' jaruuj naa rusahchiik wach ,
Eh k'ul taq cha pahqaaj kuyb'al amahk chawach . Eh k'ul taq cha a'n atiij chawiij , reh chi nee taq tik'aachjik ruuk' ayab'ilaal . Re' rutiij i korik wach ruk'ux xti nk'utinik wach i rub'an .
Je' re' noq , re' hin xti korik i nuq'or taq aweh chi awach i ruyeew ruk'ux chi nunimjiik , wilik i ruk'achariik chi juneliik .
Re' hin ma' naa ta taq kaat nukanaam chi jumpech naa la' wo' chik nusutiniik chaloq taq awuuk' .
Xiik' la' naah nimaal wach jino'q i aj judío , k'ih wach chihreet . Peet , ruum chi re' Dios keh i aj judío xuq'or i ruk'uhb'aal chi peet .
Je' wo' taq i hat kamanoom , tinimanoq taq chikiwach apatroon ayu' wach ak'al . Cha a'n taq i kikamaj parukorkiil ruuk' loch'ik chu'nchel taq ak'ux . Je'-oq rukamaj i Cristo taq i na a'n .

Re' hat ma' imponik ta panaq'awach i rotob'il , i ruk'axb'al , i q'unil wach ruk'ux i Dios . Eh ma' nakoj ta rehtaal chi ruuk' naq i rotob'il i Dios , k'ahchi' kaat ruye'em chi naa ayot'om ak'ux chuwach chi riij amahk eh re' naq chik i reh neenanimaj .
Re' hoj ch'iklik qak'ux ruuk' i Dios , ruum chib'ih jariik i neenqapahqaaj reh pan qatiij ruuk' rub'ehel je' rukab' iraaj i reh , qeht'al chi nee qoh rib'iraj .

Re' ta naq i Dios inye'wik ch'ikaab' k'uxliis , suq kiil k'uxliis , neen ye'wik taq aweh i k'acharik pansuqkiil chunimjiik i reh , reh chi ruuk' i rajaawriik i Santolaj Uxlab'al , nee ruyeew taq rukowiil ak'ux chi ruyub'jiik i ch'iklik taq reje wii' ak'ux .

Eh aha' xkojarik wii' wach kuruus i Jesús ma' najt ta ar wilik i junseht chi tik chee' . Eh chupaam i tik chee' re' re' , ko xk'otarik i koq jinaj i jul muq'umb'al kamnaq komajaa' ta awach imuhqik chupaam .

Eh re' peet josq'laj chikop xchoparik ruch'ihil i rukoj riib' chi q'orol ruq'oral i Dios , re' i xk'uhtanik cho reh i sahchb'al k'uxliis chuwach i chikop re' re' . Eh ruuk' i re' xujot'ib'eej taqe i xkiyeew q'ab' chi xkojarik keh i rehtalil i peet josq'laj chikop , xkiloq'ej i rujalwaach . Eh re' josq'laj chikop ruch'ihil i rukoj riib' chi q'orol ruq'oral i Dios , k'achlik kiwach noq xikutarik pan palaw q'aaq' qoplik ruuk' asufre .
Je' re' noq wila' re' i nixowanik awach inuhmik , chayeew ruwa' , wila' chiqiij chii' , chayeew ruhaa' . Wila' je' re' i xa a'n reh ma' k'isiin ta neenchalik rukaaqb'iik i wach ruum i ruk'ixiik .

Re' ta'j wo' naq i ruk'uhb'aal i Jesucristo wih-oq taq panawánima chi juneliik . Eh chak'uhb'alej taq awiib' , chayeew taq rukowiil ak'ux chawach ruuk' chu'nchel i holohik laj na'ojb'al . Eh chat'iosej taq ree Dios i rotob'il , ruuk' i rutz'uyjiik i Salmo , ruuk' i tz'uuy loq'oomb'al ree Dios , ruuk' i tz'uuy i ruyeew taq panawánima i Santolaj Uxlab'al .
Eh je' wo' taq i hat b'ahiilb'ees , cha k'ax taq awehk'een cha ju'junaal mo'q xa tik'atzk'otik taq chikiwach .

Wila' re' ixoq aj nimaneel wilik i awach reh kamnaq rub'ahiil , inchol taqe rutoob'eem , reh chi ma' chikinaah taj i aj nimaneel neenkahnik i ihq re' re' . Chi je' re' , re' taqe aj nimaneel neenkian rutoob'jiik taqe ixoq kamnaq kib'ahiil , re' i xti korik wo' hoq chi ma' xta ilil keh .
Re' wili i korik ruq'orom chee Dios : Re' chi ruye'em qeh i juneliik k'acharik , eh re' i juneliik k'acharik wili xa ruuk' i Rak'uun i Dios inkan .
Eh awach i ruk'ulum paránima i Rak'uun i Dios , ye'ooj reh i juneliik k'acharik . Raaj i ma' ruk'ulum ta paránima i Rak'uun i Dios , ma' ye'ooj ta reh i juneliik k'acharik .
Wila' re' hin , Ak'uunb'ees Dios nee kinesanik taq chaaweh pan q'ab' inchopwik taq anaah , xti korik chi nee taq ti elik cho pan q'ab' chi jumpech .
Ruum aj re' , i nupahqaaj taq otob'il aweh chi marub'an taq ki'ib' ak'ux chi nimanik ruum i ti' k'axik k'ahchi' nuk'ulum taq chawiij . Ruum re' wili , naa rukamaniik chi toob'al taq aweh .

Ruum re' taqe re' ma' nkian taj iraaj i QaJaaw Jesucristo . Re' la' inki a'n i rootwaaj i kiti'jolal i keh . Eh ruuk' tii chik holohaq q'orik noq i nib'irjik , inkijot' i kikapeb'aal taqe komajaa' kow kik'ux chunimjiik i Jesucristo .

Xa ma' tiklik ta kib'anik , yiib' wach i kina'ojb'al , aj k'axal wach b'ehomal taqe , aj kaqwachineel taqe , aj kansan kas kichaaq' taqe , sik'il peleto taqe , aj jot'ool taqe , ma' tiklik ta kib'anik , aj molol wach k'utaaj taqe .
Eh ruuk' i rajaawriik i Santolaj Uxlab'al wilik pan qánima , chako'leej riij i korik laj k'uhb'aal ruye'em chaaweh i Dios .
Eh awach i xa re' i ruk'ax wach i ruti'jolal i rub'an , re' tojb'al mahk naa ruk'ulum chi jilow . Eh awach imb'anik reh iraaj i Santolaj Uxlab'al , re' juneliik k'acharik naa ruk'ulum chi jilow .
Eh manqayeew i rujosq'iil i Qajaaw i hoj , je' rukab' noq xkiyeew cho rujosq'iil i keh , ruum i xkian re' re' xuyeew q'ab' i Dios chi xiti'arik kuum i aaq' , eh xikimik .
Re' wilik k'axooj ruuk' , ma' rub'an taj i re' ma' re' , ree ras ruchaaq' ma' xata chi rutkeel i ruk'ax riib' ma' ink'atzk'otik taj ma' ruq'aj ta wach i yiib' wach imb'aan reh .
Je' cho ch'ihch' i kikojom chi kiso' . Re' kixiik' xa pok'oj chik riib' noq kirupinik xa je' chik rukab' i polok'inik inki a'n i ruk'ihaal kareta noq qeremaj kuum i kawáyu ree ojik panq'aq'inik .
Re' i tinamit ma' xta naq mahk neenkahnik chikinaah wi ta ma' xin chalik chuq'orariik keh i ko'lemb'al iib' . Eh yu'naak ma' nee ta chik inkuyarik i kimahk ruum xkib'iraj chik .
Eh re' taq i hat ticholoq taq k'acharik chi kixilak i ma' re' ta taqe aj nimaneel , maasub' taq i q'iij cha q'or la' taq rib'iral keh i ak' k'uhb'aal .

Re' hoj qeht'al chik chi re' taqe i ma' holohik ta laj na'ojb'al inqa a'n junkojariik haa' wach kuruus xb'aan ruuk' i Jesucristo , reh chi xsahchik wach i mahk pan qánima , reh chi ma' re' ta chik i mahk neenqakamaneej wach ,

Eh ink'utinik wo' hoq awach taqe rak'uun rixq'uun i Dios , eh awach taqe i ehchalimaj ruum i aj yahm : Awach i ma' re' taj i rukorkiil i rub'an , eh ma' ruk'ax taj i ras ruchaaq' , ma' re' ta rak'uun rixq'uun i Dios .
Re' inkiyeew kik'ux chub'anariik i ruk'ax wach i kiti'jolal , inkixowaaj wach i Dios , ruum ma' nkaaj ta kinimam , eh ma' nee ta wo' kichol runimjiik i ruq'or i ruk'uhb'aal .
Ruum aj re' , re' wánima , re' nuti'jolal , re' nukapeb'aal xiik' naah suq kiil kik'ux . Ruum xa ruuk' chik i Dios naa nuye'em nuk'ux .

Re' i nuq'or taq aweh i hin re' chi , noq inkiyeew i chikop chi mayiij chuwach i tiyoox taqe ma' kinimanik ta ree Dios , keh i ma' tob'laj uxlab'al inkiyeew ma' re' ta ree k'achlik Dios inkiyeew . Eh re' hin ma' nwaaj ta chi nee taq ti okik haa' chi kilooq'jiik taqe ma' tob'laj uxlab'al .

Eh chi kixilak taqe i aj nimaneel ar Antioquía , xi wihik chaloq taqe i jalal ruq'oral i Dios , taqe i aj tijoom , je' wili i kib'ihnaal : Bernabé , Simón , i q'eq ruti'jolal inkiq'or reh , Lucio aj Cirene , Manaen , i junk'iih cho ruuk' i Herodes i xwihik chi ajaab'esil ar Galilea , eh re' i Saulo .
Maayeew taq chik awiib' chi jot'arik keh i xama' xta rutiq wach inkiq'or , eh ruum taqe yiib' wach na'ojb'al re' re' , naa ruye'em chaloq i rujosq'iil i Dios chikinaah i ma' kinimanik ta ree reh .

Re' taqe re' , q'ilarik inkaaj , ruum re' keh xa kiooj chi yojoj k'uxliis chi' taq paat . Xa reh reh inkik'uhtaaj re' i ma' ruk'ul ta chi k'uhtjik xa re' inkaaj inkireq kitumiin chi xama' xta rub'ehel .
( Re' Jesús xuq'or keh i raj tahqaneel chi ma' chu'nchel ta saq kiwach , ruum reht'al i reh chi kixilak i keh wilik naa ruk'ayiniik reh chi ma' eht'alimaj )

Re' Jesús je' wili i xuq'or keh : Re' hin xti korik taq i nuq'or aweh : Awach i ma' re' ta chi chii' i ru puertahiil i kikoraal i tentzun inokik , tokoom chik inooj johtoq , re' re' ajileq' eh aj kaansoom .

Re' taqe re' sahchinaq i kina'ojb'al , ruum xkiq'eb' chi riij kik'ux i korik laj b'eeh . Eh re' chik xkik'am naah i ruyiib' wach na'ojb'al , aj chukul q'orik , Balaam rub'ihnaal , rak'uun i Beor . Re' reh xraaj naq rureqem cho rutumiin chub'anariik i yiib' wach na'ojb'al .

Eh re' taqe aj judío , je' wo' taqe i ma' re' ta aj judío ma' xinimanik taj , xkian jinaj wach kik'ux kuuk' i q'atal q'orik , reh chi xkian ti' k'axik keh i kiib' chi aj tahqaneel , eh naa naq kikansam chi ab'aj .

Re' Jesús xupahqaaj roxpeech reh i Simón chi je' wili : Simón , rak'uun i Jonás , ¿ mi q'e' kinak'ax ? inki . Re' Pedro tib'ik ruk'ux , ruum roxpeech chik xpahqaljik reh , je' wili xuq'or : Jaaw , re' hat aweht'al chu'nchel . Eh aweht'al chi q'e' ti nuk'ax , inki . Re' Jesús je' wili i xuq'or : Chacha'jeej taqe weh re' i je' taqe nutentzuun , i nuchjik .

Eh chupaam i tinamit re' re' , ma' naa ta rokiik i ch'uwa' wach , ni xata re' imb'anik reh i re' ma' re' , ni xata re' i chukul q'orik . Re' naa kokiik ar xa re' wo' i tz'ihb'amaj i kib'ihnaal chupaam i ruhujil i juneliik k'acharik wilik ruuk' i je' Rak'uun Tentzun .

Re' ixoq re' re' rax muqik ru kaqiil i ruso' , ruxoyib'eem riib' ruuk' oro ruuk' i holohaq ab'aj , ruuk' uuh kirob' rotik . Eh ruchopom jinaj rukulk re' ruuk' i oro , re' nujinaq wii' chu'nchel i ruma'tob'laj na'ojb'al , re' ruch'uwa'iil wach i ruk'oyomal .
Eh chi riij taqe re' , eliik-oq wilik i k'axaj iib' taq chawach , ruum re' re' ink'amwik chupaam i wihik pan jinaj wach k'uxliis .
Eh re' Jesús je' wili i xuq'or keh : Yu'naak xponik chik i ru orahiil chi re' hin , Ak'uunb'ees nuwii' winaq , naa ruye'ariik nuloq'il .

Wila' naq'or chi ma' toob' taj i ch'uwa'risanik wach kaxáro , ¿ chib'ih reet noq inach'uwa'risaj wach aakaxáro i hat ? Eh wila' nawixowaaj kiwach i tiyoox , ¿ chib'ih reet noq tiooj chi i leq' chupaam paat kiwihik wii' ?

Noq xweht'aliij chib'ih ruq'or i k'uhb'aal re' re' , ar x-uhtik wach i mahk wuuk' , ruum xtohq'ik nuk'axam wach i ma' toob' ta naq chi k'axarik wach . Eh noq komajaa' ta nqeht'aliij i k'uhb'aal , re' mahk kamnaq naq chi qawach .
Naa kaat nuko'leem pan kiq'ab' aj judío , naa kaat nuko'leem pan kiq'ab' i ma' re' ta taqe aj judío , re' i naa kaat nutaq'aam reje wii' yu'naak .

Re' hoj noq xub'an chaloq ma' xta naq qana'ojb'al . Ma' nqanimaj ta naq i Dios . Ma' qeht'al ta naq wach i korik , re' naq inqa a'n i ruk'ax wach i qati'jolal . Pamahk naq k'acharik inqa a'n , eh hoj naq aj kaqwachineel . Yiib' naq wach qohb'anik k'ul naq inqixowaaj qawach .

Chuwach i Dios , chuwach i QaJaaw Jesucristo , eh chikiwach ánjel sik'ooj kiwach , i nuq'or aweh chi maakanaa' chik runimjiik taqe i nuq'or aweh wili . Eh mo'-oq awach i tokoom rilariik neena a'n , ma' awach atiq naah ru mahk .
Je' re' noq , maaq'eb' taq chi riij ak'ux runimjiik i QaJaaw Dios , ruum re' re' xiik' naah chihojal i jilow taq naa ak'ulum .
Eh re' jino'q i sik'ooj wach chub'aan i rukamaj i Dios inchol ruk'uhtaam chi korik wach ruk'ux .
Re' Pedro k'ih q'iij xkahnik ar Jope , eh parupaat i Simón aj yej-an tz'uhuum xub'an rupatal .
Eh raaj taq i hat , ¿ mi ma' aweht'al taq re' chi hat taq rupaat i Dios , chi re' Ruxlab'al i Dios patim taq panawánima ?
Je' re' noq re' hoj hermano , yu'naak nee chik inqa a'n okik chupaam Ye'aab' xti wilik rusantohiil chi ma' xta k'isinoq qayo'jiik xa ruum i loq'laj rukik'eel i Jesucristo .

Re' Jesús je' wili i xuq'or : Re' hin naa wo' chik wojiik . Eh re' taq i hat naa naq chik kin taq asik'im . Xa re' la' , xa panamahk wo' taq naa akimiik , ruum ma' naa ta taq a'nam i ponik naa nuwihiik wii' i hin , inki .

Re' taq i hat i rusik'im taq chik chaawach i Dios , reh chi xatrukoj taq chi hat ru santo laj tinamiit , cha a'n taq i holohik laj na'ojb'al , re' taqe wili : Re' i korik laj ketelinik wachiis , re' loch'ik , re' chaq'lamiil , re' atoob' wach k'uxliis , re' rukuyariik i ti' k'axik .
Eh awach imb'anik reh i nukamaj kirutahqeej . Eh aha' naa nuwihiik i hin , ar wo' naa ruwihiik i waj kamanoom . Eh re' imb'aniik reh nukamaj naa ruye'ariik ruloq'il ruum i waJaaw , inki Jesús .
Eh wilik-oq runa'ojb'al chi taaq'anik parupaat , eh chuk'uhtaaj keh i rak'uun rixq'uun nik' wach i loch'ik , i nimanik ,
Ruum aj re' , k'ul taq chayeew rukowiil ak'ux chawach , k'ul taq chatoob'eej awiib' chawach , je' rukab' taq i k'ahchi' kaat yu'naak .
Re' k'uhb'aal ab'iram taq cho pampeet i ruq'or qeh chi k'ul naa qak'axam qiib' chi qawach .
Noq i nukapaaj i hin chi ma' xta naq reet chi ma' nee ta inki a'n kaxáro taqe i komajaa' inki a'n kaxáro , ruum i k'axik ink'ularik chupaam i k'acharik yu'naak .
Jinaj i winaq , Nicodemo rub'ihnaal , wihinaq chaloq aj fariseo , k'amal kib'eeh i aj judío .

Je' wo' re' xub'an i Rahab , re' i k'oyoom laj ixoq : Re' reh xuyeew kipatal taqe i aj Israel xi ponik chi taqarik , eh xutoob'eej taqe chi xi elik reje pan tokoom b'eeh . Eh ruuk' i otob'il xub'an re' re' , xq'orarik chi korik wach ruk'ux ruum i Dios .
Xa re' la' , re' ixoq nee wo' inko'ljik wila' xuk'isaj taqe i rak'uun rixq'uun parub'ehel , eh wila' korik wach i runa'ojb'al chi nimanik wila' xk'axwik , wila' xk'acharik pan santohiil .

Re' qaDios i hoj , hoj aj Israel xsik'wik cho kiwach i qamaam qati't . Eh xuk'ihaaxb'isaj taqe , korehtaal xuyejaa' chi nimlaj tinamit noq ko wilkeeb' Egipto ma' re' ta kitinamiit . Eh koq'uun chik , re' Dios ruuk' i rajaawriik xresaj taqe cho panti' k'axik ar .

Eh re' Dios ineht'alinik reh i ránima i ju'jun , xuk'uhtaaj chi naa taqe ruk'ulum chi rak'uun rixq'uun i ma' re' ta taqe aj judío . Ruum aj re' , xuyeew cho keh i Santolaj Uxlab'al je' rukab' noq xuyeew cho qeh i hoj .

Re' Dios xq'orik reh chi je' wili : Maach'uwa'risaj wach aakaxáro , inki . Eh xuq'or wo' chi je' wili : Maacansaj aawas achaaq' , inki . Atoob' ta ma' rub'an i k'oyomal jino'q , eh i rukansaj-oq i ras ruchaaq' , re' re' xama' k'ahchi' ta wo' runimam chu'nchel i k'uhb'aal .
Eh re' wo' hin kinye'wik keh i juneliik k'acharik . Eh ma' jaruuj naa rusahchiik kiwach , eh ma' awach ta neenq'uchwik keh panuq'ab' .

Eh re' Dios inye'wik reh i suq kiil k'uxliis , naa rusacham wach chi jumehq'iil i rajaawriik i aj Yahm , je' naa naa ayeq'em taq panawooq i hat , ruum re' chik taq i hat naa ruye'em awajaawriik i Dios . Re' ta naq i QaJaaw Jesucristo toob'inoq taq chaaweh .
Eh xa je' tii chik manlik aj nimaneel naa kianam kiib' , xa re' la' ma' naa ta ruponiik panaq'kiwach i korik laj nimanik . Re' hat , maamin awiib' kuuk' i je' re' kina'ojb'al .

Je' wo' re' noq wilkooj i hoj . Atoob' ta xiik' naah qak'ihaal , xa je' la' jinaj chik qati'jolal noq wilkooj ruuk' i Jesucristo . Ruuk' i re' , qohkahnik chi xa jinaj chik qawach chiquncheel , je' rukab' noq wilik i qati'jolal .

Re' taqe wili xti korik , ruum aj re' , maa kanaa' chik ruq'orariik taqe , reh chi neen kiyeew kik'ux chub'anariik i holohik i kinimanik reh i Dios . Re' taqe na'ojb'al wili ma' xta reet chi b'anarik , eh chu'nchel aj eh neen kamanik wii' .

Je' re' noq xooj eloq wach i tz'ihb'amaj cho pan santo laj huuj , i chi je' wili : Re' Abraham xunimaj i Dios , eh ruuk' i xub'an re' re' , xq'orarik chi korik wach ruk'ux ruum i Dios , eh xkojarik chi ramigo i Dios , inki .
Hat taq nuhermano , i tinimanik taq reh i loq'laj QaJaaw Jesucristo , ma' ruk'ul ta chi jinaj i suq rilariik taq neena a'n , eh re' jinaj tokoom rilariik taq neena a'n .
Re' q'orik i nelik cho pan kalaq xa je' chik chuhiil i ruti'jolal i kamnaq ma' tz'aplik ta naah parujuleel . Eh aj chukul q'orik taqe je' ti'kiil i rutiiw i aaq' i rub'an i kiq'oral .
Je' wo' hoq i b'ahiilb'ees inchol ruk'axam i rehk'een , ruum awach i ruk'ax i rehk'een , iraaj ruq'orom chi re' wo' reh ruk'ax riib' ,

¿ Chib'ih jariik i naa qaq'orom chi riij i wili ? Re' i naa qaq'orom re' chi xa ruum chi xkiyeew kik'ux chunimjiik i Jesucristo taqe i ma' re' ta aj judío xiko'ljik chuwach i mahk ruum i Dios , ro'q ta ma' k'ahchi' ta naq kikapaam rusik'ariik i ko'lemb'al kiib' .
Eh inchol kik'amam naah i korik xye'arik cho chi naab'jik , chi saq wach i kikapeb'aal .

Eh wila' aj nimaneel taqe i kipatroon , ma' ruyee ta riib' chi xa k'isiin neemponik panaq'kiwach , ma' xata ruum chi kuch aj nimaneel kiib' . Inchol la' kianam chi korik i rukamaj , ruum re' i k'ahchi' kianam rukamaj atoob'laj hermano taqe .
¿ Eh wila' wilik taqe aj judío ma' xkinimaj taj i ruk'uhb'aal i Dios ? ¿ Mi ruum i re' , ma' nee ta rub'an i Dios i ruq'orom cho rib'iral ?
Ma' re' ta nkiwii' chi kamnaq chik i Jesús , jinaj la' i soldado xhopwik reh i panjojol ruuk' q'as ju' ch'ihch' . Eh jumehq'iil xelik chaloq i kik' ruch'ihil ha' .
Re' wili i nuk'uhb'aal i nuq'or taq aweh : K'ul taq cha k'ax awiib' chawach , je' rukab' taq ak'axariik i nub'an i hin .

Eh re' taq i hat xat kimik taq chik chuwach i mahk , xat k'aach wo' chik taq ruka'peech , ruum aj re' maa kemelej taq chik aawooq aq'ab' reh i rub'anariik i mahk . Chaq'asaj la' taq awiib' ree Dios chi manlik , reh i rub'anariik imponik chuwach i reh .
Eh re' hoj ma' je' ta qakab' taqe inkikanaa' wo' chik runimjiik i Dios , pantojb'al mahk ojik inki a'n Je' la' qakab' taqe nkireq i ko'lb'al ree kánima , ruum inkiyeew kik'ux chi nimanik .

Eh ma' k'isiin taqe aj judío naakiko'ljiik , ruum je' wili i ruq'or pan santo laj huuj : Re' aj Ko'loom pan tinamit Sión naa ruchaliik , eh re' reh naa resaniik reh i yiib' wach na'ojb'al wilik pan kánima taqe aj judío .

Eh re' wo' taqe aj Judío xikansanik cho reh i QaJaaw Jesucristo , je' rukab' noq xkikansaj chaloq taqe jalal ruq'oral i Dios . Eh je' wo' re' noq xojkikaaj chaloq i hoj , ma' xkian taj imponik chuwach i Dios , xa chu'nchel inkixowaaj wach

Eh wila' xama' xqakanaa' wo' rub'aan i mahk , eh xa pan qak'ux-oq chik neenchalik noq neen qa a'n qeht'al wo' naq chik i xti korik , ma' xta chik jino'q tokoom mayiij i neenye'arik chi kuyb'al reh taqe mahk re' re' .
Re' Dios , hoj junwukteesjiik xub'an cho ruuk' i Jesucristo noq xruksaj wo' chik chaloq chi k'achlik wach . Ruuk' i re' xuyeew qa ye'aab' pan taxaaj ruuk' i Jesucristo .
Je' re' noq maat chukwik taq chik q'orik , korik la' taq naa aq'oriik kuuk' aawas achaaq' , ruum chi qunchelaal xa jinaj chik qawach chi nimanik , eh hoj jilow rooq q'ab' i Jesucristo .
Eh re' hoj ma' xqanimaj ta k'isinoq keh xkiq'or winaq re' re' , ruum inqaaj i hoj chi nee taq inanimaj i hat chi manlik i xti korik laj ak' k'uhb'aal taq ab'iram chaloq .
Awach i ye'ooj chi rukooch i q'orik pan tokoom q'orik , chupahqaaj ree Dios parutiij chi neenchol ruch'ob'ariik rub'ehel i xuq'or pan tokoom q'orik .
Eh re' Saulo reh rixowaaj kiwach i kinimanik reh i QaJaaw , xuq'or kikanteesjiik . Eh , xooj ruq'o'reej i kajaaw i k'amal kib'eeh aj tiij ,
Eh yu'naak xa ojik chik weh awuuk' . Re' taqe wili nuq'or noq ko wilkiin wach ak'al , reh chi re' taqe i aye'em weh neenkireq chi manlik i suq kiil k'uxliis i nuyeew i hin .

Suuqb'oq la' taq ak'ux , ruum k'ahchi' taq awehtriik haa' i ti' k'axik ruk'ulum chaloq i Jesucristo . Chi je' re' , ma' k'isiin ta naa rusuqb'iik taq ak'ux na' chawil taq wach i runimaal ruloq'il i reh .
Eh noq xwilow chikop taqe i wilkeeb' chupaam : Wilik i kijib' kooq , wilik i josq'laj chikop , wilik i xa kijukem kiib' noq kib'ehik , wilik tz'ikin kirupinik .
Xa re' la' yu'naak , cha kanaa' taq rub'aan chu'nchel i yiib' wach na'ojb'al wili : Josq'iil , tukinik wachiis , ixowanik iib' , tz'aqaj wach k'utaaj , yiib' wach q'orik i nelik cho pan chi'is .
eh xkahnik chee Pablo kuuk' . Ar xutoq'aa' i koq kamanik , ruum inchol wo' reh i kamanik inki a'n i keh , kemeel taqe piim laj itz'ihy , re' ruuk' inokik chi kok' paat .

Eh maayeew taq chik q'ab' reh i mahk chi nee ruyeew i rajaawriik chinaah taq ati'jolal i xa sahchik wach reh . Eh maayeew taq q'ab' reh i mahk chi nee taq tirumin chub'anariik i ruk'ax taq wach ati'jolal .
Re' taqe re' , inqataq'aaj reje ruq'orariik keh , inqakoj reje kina'ojb'al ruuk' i rajaawriik i QaJaaw Jesucristo , chi kikamanoq parub'ehel , reh chi neenkireq tz'aaq k'uxumb'al kiib' .
Re' taqe rak'uun i Jacob re' re' , q'e' xkixowaaj wach i kichaaq' , José rub'ihnaal . Ruum aj re' , xkik'ayej reje , xk'amarik reje Egipto , eh re' José eliik xtoob'jik ruum i Dios ar ,

Eh noq kimolom kiib' i aj nimaneel , xupab'aa' johtoq riib' chikiwach i winaq , Agabo rub'ihnaal , jinaj keh i jalal ruq'oral i Dios , xuq'or keh ruuk' i rajaawriik i Santolaj Uxlab'al chi naa ruwihiik i runimaal wi'jaleel chupaam taqe i tinamit re' re' ixk'ularik noq wilik chi ajaab'esil i Claudio .
Eh noq xukohlaaj ruq'orariik i Pablo taqe wili , xuxuk'aa' qohoq riib' xub'an rutiij kuuk' chi kunchelaal i re' .
Eh re' taqe i ehchalimaj chik ruum i Jesucristo , kiye'em chik wach kuruus i ruk'ax naq wach i kiti'jolal , je' wo' chu'nchel i yiib' wach na'ojb'al inki a'n naq chaloq .
Hat taq nuhermano , noq neenchalik taq cha naah i xa reh reh wach chi pajarik , suuqb'oq taq ak'ux .
Eh wila' re' hoj inqaq'or chi wilkooj pan jinaj wach k'uxliis ruuk' i Dios , eh pan q'equm-oq wo' k'acharik inqa a'n , xachukuj q'orik i k'ahchi'kooj , ma' inqak'am ta naah i korik
K'ahchi' rutehiik chii' i taxaaj noq xrilow . Eh ar xelik chaloq i je' cho junsahl chi nimlaj itz'ihy , qajik i rub'an cho wach ak'al , chopolkeeb' chi k'ahaam i kijib' chi rutz'u'kaal .
Re' wilkeeb' ayu' xa aha' kitinamiit . Wilik i kichalik i Parto , Media , Elam , i hoj i qoh chalik Mesopotamia , Judea , Capadocia , Ponto , Asia ,

Chi je' re' , nee taq ti k'acharik parukorkiil i hat taq chik rak'uun rixq'uun i QaJaaw , eh xa re' taq chik naa a'nam imponik chuwach i reh , reh chi nee taq inak'uhtaaj i holohik chi b'anarik , eh chi reh reh taq areqem chi riij i na'ojb'al inchalik ruuk' i Dios .

Timoteo , hat wak'uun noq wilkaat , xti cha chop ak'ux chi ko'ljiik riij i holohik laj na'ojb'al ruuk' i nimanik , ruuk' holohik laj kapeew . Cha a'n rub'aan i re' , je' rukab' i kiq'orom cho chawiij taqe hermano parub'ihnaal i Dios .

Chi riij i re' , xb'iraj chik taqe kowlaj q'orik xkian cho pan taxaaj , i ruk'ihaal tinamit . Je' wili i xkiq'or : Re' i QaJaaw Dios , i ruk'ul chi neenqayeew runimaal wach ruum xa re' wo' reh inko'linik , xa re' wo' reh i wilik ruloq'il , eh wilik rajaawriik ,
Re' taq i hat hermano , xuyeew taq aak'achariik i Jesucristo noq hat naq taq cho kamnaq chupaam taq mahk .

Eh ma' nee ta rub'an chi nee taq inawuk'ej aweh i wilik pan i kulk , re' rujalwaach i rukik'eel i Jesucristo , wila' ko naawuk'ej taq i mayijimaj chikiwach i ma' tob'laj uxlab'al . Eh ma' nee ta wo' rub'an chi nee taq inak'ux aweh i kaxlanwi'k , re' rujalwaach i ruti'jolal i Jesucristo , wila' ko nak'ux taq aweh i mayijimaj chikiwach i ma' toob' laj uxlab'al .
Eh ma' ruk'ul taj chi nee taq inak'utjaaj aweh k'oyomal , i xa chib'ih chik jariik chi ch'uwa' wach na'ojb'al , ni xata re' ruk'axariik wach i tokoom aj eh ruum hat taq chik santo laj aj nimaneel .

Re' taqe saq wach i kikapeb'aal , chu'nchel i ruyejaam i Dios xa saq wo' wach chi keh . Eh re' taqe i ma' kinimanik ta reh i Dios i ch'uwa' wach kikapeb'aal , xa chu'nchel ch'uwa' wach chi keh , ruum xa ch'uwa' wo' wach i kina'ojb'al .

Eh chu'nchel i ki-ib'irinik reh i ruq'or i Saulo insahchik kik'ux , je' wili inkiq'or : ¿ Mi ma' re' , re' i winaq wili imb'anik ti' k'axik keh i kiq'orik i rub'ihnaal i Jesús , ar Jerusaleem ? ¿ Mi ma' re' wo' re' reh xchalik chi kichopariik taqe wilkeeb' ayu' reh chi nee taqe ruq'asaj pan kiq'ab' i kajaaw i k'amal kib'eeh aj tiij ? inki taqe .

Raaj i raJaaw K'amal b'eeh aj tiij chi qee hoj , xiik' chik naah chihojal rulooq'jiik i Dios i rub'an . Eh ruum ruuk' i ak' k'uhb'aal , xojrukoj panotob'il ruuk' i Dios . Eh re' i xuk'ul cho ruk'ux re' re' , xti wilik rajaawriik chuwach i k'uhb'aal ruq'orom cho pampeet .
ruum re' hin noq kok'achalkiin re' i Jesucristo naa nunimam . Eh wi xin kimik , jinaj kooch chi weh .

Re' hin weht'al chi re' Dios , i xutoq'aa' cho rub'anariik i holohik laj rukamaj taq awuuk' , ma' rukanaam ta chik rub'aan korehtaal i rumanaa' wach na' chureq ruq'ijil i ruk'uliik ruka'peech i Jesucristo .

Eh qeht'al wo' chi xk'ulik i Rak'uun i Dios ayu' wach ak'al chuye'ariik qana'ojb'al , reh chi chanab'eej wach i korik laj Dios . Eh wilkooj chik ruuk' i korik laj Dios , ruuk' i Rak'uun , re' i Jesucristo . Re' wili i korik laj Dios , eh re' reh inye'wik i juneliik k'acharik .
Re' taq i hat , ko aha' pa' ruyee riib' taq chawach , cha chop taq ak'ux chi k'acharik pansuqkiil k'uxliis chi kixilak taqe aawas achaaq' .

Je' re' noq , kow-oq qak'ux chi nimanik . Maa rub'an kiib' qak'ux chi ruyub'jiik i ch'iklik reje wii' qak'ux , ruum re' Dios reh korik inq'orik , nee wo' ruyeew qeh aha' wilik i ruq'orom cho rib'iral .
Re' hin naa taq nukanaam aweh i suq kiil k'uxliis . Naa taq nukanaam aweh i suq kiil k'uxliis , ma' je' ta rukab' i suq kiil k'uxliis i ruyeew i wach ak'al . Maatib'isaj taq ak'ux , mat yo'jik taq .
Ruum aj re' , xa eliik ch'iklik qak'ux ruuk' i Dios . Qeht'al noq xa je' pee ko najt wilkooj ruuk' i QaJaaw Jesucristo , noq ko k'acharik inqa a'n ayu' wach ak'al ruuk' i qati'jolal wili .

Awach inib'irinik reh i nuq'oral , eh ma' runimaj taj , ma' re' tee hin naa nuq'atwiik i q'orik chinaah , ruum re' hin ma' xin chalik ta wach ak'al chi kiye'ariik pantojb'al mahk i tinamit , xin chalik la' chi kiko'ljiik .

Ma' naa ta qa'nam qeh je' rukab' i xub'an chaloq i Caín . Re' reh ehchalimaj ruum i aj Yahm ruum aj re' , xukansaj i ruchaaq' . ¿ Chihreet noq xub'an i je' re' ? Je' re' xub'an , ruum yiib' wach i runa'ojb'al , eh re' ruchaaq' holohik i runa'ojb'al .
Chu'nchel i ye'aab' sutimaj kiij chi ha' , ruch'ihil taqe yuuq' k'ixkaab' , xsahchik kiwach .

Re' Abraham , atoob' ta xa k'isiin chik ma' nkimik , ko xiik' naah kik'ihaal i riih rumaam xwihik je' kik'ihaal i ch'umiil wilkeeb' pan taxaaj , eh je' kik'ihaal i saniib' wilkeeb' chi' palaw ma' kuyuuj ta kajaljiik .
Ruum aj re' , eliik taq qayeew ruloq'il , je' wo' i runimaal wach i Reey chi juneliik , re' i jinaj chi qaDios , ma' nilarik ta wach , eh ma' jaruuj naa rukimiik Je' ta wo' naq re' .

Re' ánjel re' re' kow xuq'or cho chi je' wili : Chayohleej taq wach i Dios , chayeew taq ruloq'il , ruum xponik chik i ruq'ijil chi naa rub'anam i q'ataj q'orik . Chaloq'ej taq i Dios , re' xyej-anik reh i taxaaj , i wach ak'al , i palaw , taqe raasb'al ha' inki .

Chupaam taqe q'iij re' re' , noq xikihaaxb'iik aj nimaneel , re' taqe aj griego xkichoqej kiib kuuk' i aj hebreo . Re' taqe i aj griego xkijal reh taqe raj tahqaneel i Jesús chi re' taqe ixoq kamnaq kib'ahiil ma' manlik ta wach i kiwa' inye'arik noq imb'aan i puhk wi'k eqal eqal
Re' re' xraaj taq awuuk' i Dios noq xusik' taq chaawach , ruum chi xuk'ul i ti' k'axik i Jesucristo taq chawiij , eh xk'ulik wo' ruk'uhtaaj taq aweh chi naa taq ak'amam naah i xub'an i reh .
Noq xojwihik taq cho chaxilak , xqaq'or taq cho rukorkiil aweh chi je' wili : Awach i ma' raaj ta kamanik , i ruk'ul chi ma' nee ta inye'arik ruwa' ruhaa' , qoh kiih .

Re' Dios ma' k'isiin ta xuk'ax i tinamit wach ak'al . Ruum , xiruyeew chee hin chi kaj Ko'loom i hin Rak'uun jinaj chi wib'il wiib' chuwach , reh chi chu'nchel i naakinimaniik weh , ma' naa ta rusahchiik kiwach , naa la' ruwihiik kik'achariik chi juneliik .
Eh noq xkaaj naq kesam i ma' tob'laj uxlab'al je' wili i xq'orarik keh ruum : Re' hin weht'al wach i Jesús , eh je' wo' hoq i Pablo . Eh re' taq i hat , ma' weht'al ta taq awach , ki uchjik .

Eh xwilow chik wach i peet josq'laj chikop , je' wo' taqe i reey wilkeeb' sut i wach ak'al kuch'ihil i ki soldado kimolom kiib' chub'anariik i peleto ruuk' i iqlik chi riij i saq riij kawáyu , je' wo' kuuk' taqe ru soldado .

Ar Cesarea xojokik reje pan barco inchalik Adramitena , re' i kik'ulik sutinoq wii' i barco . Re' barco re' re' xa ojik chik reh ar Asia . Re' haa' chi qaxilak jinaj i winaq , Aristarco rub'ihnaal , aj Tesalónica , re' tinamit re' re' paruyuq'ul i Macedonia wilik .

K'oloq taq panak'ux kula'jiik i ye'ooj taqe prexo . Je'-oq hat taq haa' chi prexohjik kuuk' cha a'n taq awiib' . Chatoob'eej taqe i k'ahchi' rub'aan ti' k'axik keh , ruum je'-oq wo' chik re' taq ineenak'ul i hat .
Ruum aj re' , chu'nchel i naa taq a'nam , oon naa taq aq'orom , cha a'n taq parub'ihnaal i QaJaaw Jesucristo . Eh parub'ihnaal wo' reh chat'iosej taq ree Ajaab'ees Dios i rotob'il .
Eh awach i k'ahchi' rutijiik ruuk' i ak' k'uhb'aal , inchol rutoob'eem i raj tijoom ruuk' chu'nchel i suq atoob' inye'arik reh ruum i Dios .

Xa re' la' , ma' xsiijik ta rak'aal ayu' ruum i Dios , ni xata ye'aab' rupaat i xye'arik . Xa xq'orarik la' rib'iral reh i chi naa ruye'ariik reh i ye'aab' wili , eh chi naa ruye'ariik keh i riih rumaam , atoob' ta re' Abraham komajaa' chih jino'q rak'uun rixq'uun .
Re' reey re' re' xutoq'aa' cho rujot'om i qatinamitaal . Eh xub'an ti' k'axik keh i qamaam qati't , xumin taqe chupaam chi kiq'eb' i kiha'lak'uun kore' x-aasjik , reh chi ma' nee ta kik'ihaaxb'iik .
Xrib'iraj chi je' re' i Pedro ruch'ihil i ruch aj tahqaneel jinaj chik , kikab'cheel xiooj chi chii' i jul .
Ruum aj re' , re' hin eliik inuchop nuk'ux chi saq wach i nukapeew chuwach i Dios je' wo' chikiwach i tinamit .

Re' taqe i re' xti nkesaj wach saqum i kiyiib' wach na'ojb'al , ma' kik'ixiik taj , je' rukab' i rub'an i rub'ohl i palaw noq ink'ulik rukut chi chii' i ruch'uwa'iil wach . Xa je' kikab' taqe ch'umiil ma' xta rub'ehel aha' ojik inki a'n Re' taqe re' naakiye'ariik pa runimaal q'equm chi juneliik .
Eh ma' re' ta wo' jino'q winaq xq'orik weh , xtijinik weh chi riij i k'uhb'aal wili re' la' i Jesucristo xq'orik cho rukorkiil weh .
ruum noq ko k'acharik naq inqa a'n chupaam i mahk , re' k'uhb'aal re' re' iminwik naq qeh chuk'axariik wach i yiib' wach na'ojb'al . Eh re' naq i yiib' wach inqa a'n ineesanik qeh ruuk' i Dios .

Ruum i re' , xirupab'aa' i Jesucristo chi hin raj tahqaneel , chi hin q'orol rib'iral i ak' k'uhb'aal , keh i ma' re' ta taqe aj judío . Eh re' nuq'or chi riij i Cristo korik , ruum re' hin ma' kinchukwik ta q'orik .

Re' taqe kinimanik reh taqe i ruk'uhb'aal i Dios , k'acharik inki a'n parub'ihnaal i reh , eh re' wo' Dios wilik kuuk' . Eh re' hoj , xa ruum i Santolaj Uxlab'al ruye'em qeh i Dios , inqanab'eej chi re' reh xa eliik wilik quuk' .
Ma' xata re' hoj naa qak'axam qiib , naa la' wo' qak'axam i tokoom .

Tik'acharoq taq pan jinaj wach k'uxliis chawach . Mo'q xa nim taq awach neena a'n awiib' . Jinaj-oq la' taq awach kuuk' i xama' nim ta kiwach . Eh maa kapaaj taq chi wilik taq ana'ojb'al cha wib'il awiib' .
Eh chawisaj taq iloq panawánima i k'ahinik iib' , kaqwachinik iib' , k'atzk'otik , choqinik iib' , b'ajaj-iib' . Eh je' wo' taqe i xa chib'ih jariik chi yiib' wach na'ojb'al .

Re' hin , re' Dios xpaab'anik weh chi hin jinaj raj kamanoom chi kixilak i kinimanik reh . Re' re' i nukamaj xuyeew , reh chi naa taq kaat nutob'eem i hat ruuk' i ruq'orariik taq aweh chi manlik wach i ruk'uhb'aal .
Re' rismaal naah xasaq chik je' rukab' i saq laj lana oon je' rukab' i saq suutz' . Eh re' taqe naq'wach xa kirob' rotik chik je' rukab' i xaq q'aaq' .

Chu'nchel i k'ahchi' qak'ulum wili k'axb'al taq awee hat , reh wo' chi ma' k'isiin i naa kik'ulwiik reh i rotob'il i Dios . Eh noq kik'ulum-oq chik i rotob'il , xiik' naah i rut'iosjiik naa kianam ree Dios chi loq'oomb'al reh .
Awach i ruk'ux reh i nuti'jolal eh i ruk'ej reh i nukik'eel , wilik pan jinaj wach k'uxliis wuuk' eh je' wo' hin wilkiin wo' ruuk' pan jinaj wach k'uxliis .
Hoo' , Jaaw re' hin i nunimaj chi re' hat i Cristo , i Rak'uun i Dios , re' i q'orooj chaawib'iral chi naa ak'uliik ayu' wach ak'al , inki Marta ree Jesús .
Eh ma' inkikanaa' ta runimjiik ink'uhtjik keh kuum taqe aj tahqaneel k'acharik inki a'n pan jinaj wach k'uxliis pankomonil inki a'n kitiij , eh k'ul inkipuhkaaj i kaxlanwi'k chikiwach .

Re' hat , re' i rub'ehel xponik chawach , eh xawixowaaj wach i yiib' wach na'ojb'al . Ruum aj re' xnusik' chaawach i hin , hin aaDios . Eh xiik' naah i suq kiil k'uxliis xnuyeew awee hat chuwach i xnuyeew keh awuch'ihil , inki .
Eh jinaj i xutaq'aaj rukanteesjiik ruuk' q'aslaj ch'ihch' re' Jacobo , i ras i Juan .
Re' hat , maamin awiib' ruuk' i yeb'ee wach k'utaaj iraaj ma' raaj q'orarik , ruum re' kiq'orik reh taqe re' , xa reh reh kiq'eb'em kiib' panti' k'axik .
Eh awach i rixowaaj wach i ras ruchaaq' , aj kansan ras ruchaaq' . Eh re' taq i hat aweht'al taq chik chi ma' jino'q i kansan ras ruchaaq' neen wihik ruk'achariik chi juneliik .

Noq kikohlaam chik kiwa' , xupahqaaj i Jesús chi je' wili reh i Simón Pedro : Simón , rak'uun i Jonás , ¿ mi q'e' kinak'ax chikiwach taqe wili ? inki . Re' reh je' wili i xuq'or : Jaaw , re' hat aweht'al chi q'e' ti nuk'ax , inki . Re' i Jesús je' wili i xuq'or : Chacha'jeej taqe weh re' i je' taqe nukok' tentzuun , i nuchjik
Wilik taqe inye'arik kina'ojb'al chi q'orik ruum i Santolaj Uxlab'al . Eh wilik inye'arik kajaawriik ruum i Santolaj Uxlab'al chi kiq'orik chi riij i nimaq wach na'ojb'al .
Noq xiooj wo' chik ruka'peech Egipto taqe rak'uun i Jacob , ko ra'j xuyeew riib' chi naab'jik wach re' i José keh i ras . Je' aj re' noq xunab'eej i reey awach ak'un reh i José .

ruum i ruq'or chi je' wili pan santo laj huuj : Awach iraaj ruk'axam i ruk'achariik , iraaj rik'sam taqe q'iij chi suq ruk'ux , inchol riik'raam riib' chi manelik chaloq i yiib' wach q'orik ju' raaq' , eh manelik chaloq i chukuj q'orik xaq chii' .

Re' i ruk'ihaal tinamit i xinimanik ree Dios , xa jinaj chik wach kikapeew , xa jinaj wach kik'ux chikuncheel . Ma' awach ta jino'q chi kixilak inq'orik reh chi xata reh chi rutkeel chib'ih i wilik reh keh la' pankomonil chib'ih jariik i wilik keh .
Re' i peet xnub'an taq awuuk' re' chi xnuyeew taq chaaweh chi naab'jik i xk'uhtjik cho wee hin . Re' chi re' Jesucristo xkimik ruum qamahk , je' rukab' i ruq'or cho pan santo laj huuj .
Je' re' i naa ak'ulum nimlaj tinamit , ruum awuuk' xchihkik i kikik'eel jalal ruq'oral i Dios , i kikik'eel i rutinamiit i Dios , i kikik'eel chu'nchel i kansamaj taqe chaloq sut i wach ak'al .

Noq xkib'iraj i q'orik wili i ma' re' ta taqe aj judío , q'e' xsuuqb'ik kik'ux , eh xkiyeew ruloq'il i ruk'uhb'aal i QaJaaw . Eh chi kunchelaal xkiq'or chi ruk'ul chi keh chi naakehchaam i juneliik k'acharik xkinimaj i ruk'uhb'aal i QaJaaw .
Re' inq'orik rukorkiil taqe wili i ruq'or chi je' wili : Hoo' . Re' hin ilook' wo' chik kinchalik ruka'peech , inki . Je' ta wo' naq re' , QaJaaw Jesucristo . Kim .

Eh xa re' taq chik cha a'n i xnuk'uhtaaj taq chaaweh i xnuch'ob' taq rub'ehel aweh , i xnuq'or taq xab'iraj , i xnub'an taq xawilow . Chi je' re' , neen wihik taq awuuk' i Dios inye'wik suq kiil k'uxliis .
Xa re' la' , maawixowaaj taq wach je' oq la' inkojarik runa'ojb'al aahermano taq cha a'n reh .

Eh chawik'raaj taq awiib' mankiyoj taq ak'ux ruuk' i na'ojb'al xama' xta ruk'am chaloq . Re' keh xa chukul q'orik taqe , xa runa'ojb'al winaq inkik'uhtaaj , ma' ruuk' taj i Jesucristo inchalik inkik'uhtaaj .
reh chi naa nub'anam i ponik ko aha' naa rub'aan wii' ponik reh chi nawehchaam i nukooch pan taxaaj , re' i xusik' cho wii' qawach i Dios chi naa qak'ulum parub'ihnaal i Jesucristo .

Re' reh xuyeew riib' pan ti'laj kimik chiqiij i hoj , reh chi xojruko'leej chuwach mahk . Eh xojrukanaa' chi ma' xta chik ruch'uwa'iil wach i qánima . Eh xojrukoj chi hoj rak'uun rixq'uun , reh chi xa re' chik i holohik laj na'ojb'al qootwaaj rub'aan .

Re' hin xti korik taq i nuq'or aweh chi awach i nib'irinik reh i nuq'oral , eh i runimaj awach i xtaaq'anik cho weh , wilik ruk'achariik chi juneliik . Eh ma' naa ta rojiik pantojb'al mahk , ruum ik'inaq chik chi riij i kimik , k'acharik chik i xye'arik reh .
Re' ánjel xq'o'rinik weh ruyohq'eem jinaj rupajb'aal b'olob'ik paam re' ruuk' i oro , pajb'al reh i tinamit , pajb'al reh i tz'aq sutimaj wii' riij , eh pajb'al reh taqe ru puertahiil .

Re' taqe re' naakiye'ariik pantojb'al mahk na' ohoq kuxoq , ruum inkikoj chi ki dios aha' wilik i rootwaaj i kiti'jolal , xa nkinimb'isaj chik kiwach chub'anariik i k'ixb'ilaal chi keh , eh xa re' i yiib' wach na'ojb'al inki a'n
Re' k'amal b'eeh ma' nee ta rub'an chi ko ak' aj nimaneel , ruum nee-oq i runimb'isaj riib' , nee-oq i ruq'eb' riib' pantojb'al mahk , je' rukab' i xuq'eb' wii' riib' i aj Yahm .

Hat taq nuloq'laj hermano , re' hin najtir naq q'e' inwaaj rutz'ihb'jiik taq reje ahuuj chi riij i ko'lemb'al qiib' taq awuuk' . Eh yu'naak , xwilow chi ajwaal wach chi xnutz'ihb'aaj taq reje aweh chi cha chop taq ak'ux chuko'ljiik riij taq animaniik , re' i xa junriim q'asamaj cho keh taqe i santo laj aj nimaneel .
Eh q'e' xchalik kik'aah chinaah i Pedro , i Juan , ruum k'ahchi' kiq'orom keh i tinamit nik' wach noq xwuktik chaloq i Jesús chi k'achlik wach , je' wo' re' noq naakiwuktiik chaloq i kamnaq .
ruum re' taqe ru mahk xtahmik wach , je' naa kopan taxaaj xponik . Ruum i re' , xk'ulik cho paruk'ux i Dios i ruyeb'ee wach na'ojb'al i tinamit re' re' .

Eh re' Jesús xsutinik wo' chik reje ar Caná wilik paruyuq'ul i Galilea , re' i xusutej wii' chi riis uuva i jot'ik . Eh wilik Capernaum jinaj i winaq nim wach rukamaj ruuk' i reey , yowaab' jinaj i rak'uun .
Maak'ay taq wach rub'anariik i rukamaj i QaJaaw , xti chu'nchel-oq la' taq ak'ux chub'anariik .

Re' taq inak'ax atoob' ta ma' awilom taq wach , eh k'ahchi' taq animam yu'naak atoob' ta ma' nawil taq wach . Je' re' noq , insuuqb'ik taq ak'ux ruuk' i jinaj runimaal suq kiil k'uxliis xiik' naah loq'il , ma' ha' ta chi je' ,
Re' Dios ruye'em qeh i ruSantolaj Uxlab'al . Ruuk' i re' , inqanab'eej chi k'acharik inqa a'n parub'ihnaal i Dios . Inqanab'eej wo' hoq chi re' reh xa eliik wilik quuk' .

Eh jinaj i nimlaj xaro wilik ar , nujinaq chi ch'amlaj vino . Xkik'am chaloq i jinaj i potz potz paam yoob'en ha' , xkimuhaa' chupaam i vino re' re' , xkib'ak' chi ju' jinaj i q'ab' chee' , xkiyeew johtoq chi chii' i Jesús .
Re' wo' qaDios x-esanik cho qeh pan rajaawriik i q'equm . Yu'naak pa runimaal rajaawriik chik i Rak'uun i q'e' ruk'axam wilkooj .

Hermano , re' hin i nupahqaaj taq otob'il aweh chi chakoj taq kehtaal awach kib'anik reh i yojoj k'uxliis , eh inkitoq'aa' taqchi' taq chaxilak . Re' taqe re' inkixowaaj wach i ak' k'uhb'aal hat taq tijimaj cho wii' , ma' ruk'ul ta taq cha weh chi nee taq inamin awiib' kuuk' .
Wila' xuyeew qeh chi naa qatoob'eem tokoom , qa a'n wo' hoq . Awach i ye'ooj reh chi naa rub'anam i tijinik , chub'an wo' chu'nchel ruk'ux .
Eh chupaam taqe q'iij re' re' ma' xta taq chik i naa apahqaam weh . Eh xti korik taq i nuq'or aweh chi re' waJaaw nee ruyeew taq aweh chu'nchel i naa taq apahqaam ree reh panub'ihnaal i hin .

Re' ju'jun chi ch'ikaab' ree tz'aq xa reh reh wach kika'yik i holohaq ab'aj xoyimaj taqe wii' : Re' peet ch'ikaab' ree tz'aq ruuk' jaspe re' rukab' ruuk' safíro re' roox ruuk' ágata re' rukaaj ruuk' esmeralda
Eh awach i reht'al i holohik , eh ma' rub'an taj , ru mahk i rukoj .

Eh jinaj i q'orik xb'aan cho ko paruloq'laj ye'aab' i Dios , je' wili i xuq'or : Chayeew taq runimaal wach i qaDios chawunchelaal i hat taq raj kamanoom , eh je' wo' taq i hat i tiyohlinik taq reh , chi nimaq , chi kok' taq inki .
Ruum i re' xa qoh jiq'jotik chik chi rotoowjiik chi nee ta njalarik-lom wach i qati'jolal wili , reh chi neenye'arik qeh jinaj i pan taxaaj ti'jolal , re' i rupaat i qánjel qat'iosil .
Re' ju'jun inchol rukojom rehtaal i k'ahchi' rub'anam . Eh wila' riik'raaj chi holohik i k'ahchi' rub'anam , ruuk' i re' neench'iklojik ruk'ux , ma' k'ahchi' ta rukapaam reje i rub'an i tokoom .

Wila' wilik i ajaab'ees i rukapaaj chi ma' xta reet chi neerub'an kaxáro i rixq'uun ruuk' i k'ijool k'ahchi' ruq'uniniik reh , chub'an kaxáro , wila' i rukapaaj chi rub'ehel i neerub'an . Ruum ma' mahk taj chi neerub'an kaxáro i rixq'uun .
Re' taq i hat naa taq kaat kesam chaloq chupaam taqe i paat inlooq'jik wii' i Dios . Eh naa ruponiik i q'iij chi xa awach taq naakikansaniik aweh , naakikapaam chi rukamaj i Dios inki a'n

Jinaj wo' chik i runimaal sahchb'al k'uxliis ma' ha' ta chi je' xuk'uhtaaj cho riib' pan taxaaj noq xwil : Wuquub' i ánjel xi k'amwik cho reh i wuquub' chi tz'apaab' wach ti' k'axik , re' i naa rik'sam wii' i rujosq'iil i Dios na' ohoq kuxoq .
Eh je' wili ruchaq'weesjiik xb'aan ruum i Jesús : Wila' wilik i ma' holohik taj i nuq'or , cha q'or weh chib'ih jariik . Eh wila' ma' xta reet taqe i nuq'or , ¿ chib'ih reet noq kinasak' ? inki .

Eh re' hat wuch kamanoom , i korik wach ak'ux , i nuq'or aweh chi chakoj kina'ojb'al taqe re' , ruum re' keh xkiyeew cho kik'ux chi nuto'ariik chuq'orariik rib'iral i ak' k'uhb'aal . Eh haa' wo' hoq i Clemente , je' wo' taqe junch'uq xi kamanik cho haa' chi wiij , re' taqe tz'ihb'amaj chik i kib'ihnaal paruhujil i juneliik k'acharik .
ruum chi re' keh xkikansaj taqe i santo laj aj nimaneel eh je' wo' re' xkian reh taqe i jalal aq'oral . Eh yu'naak i hat , xayeew keh chi uuk'jik i kik' . Xti ruk'ul chi keh inki ánjel .
Ra'j xti ma' chih ta re' , ruum re' hoj , hoj chik kamnaq chuwach i mahk . Ma' nee ta chik i ruyee riib' chi neqoh-ooj chi qawach chub'anariik i mahk .
Re' josq'laj chikop , i k'achlik naq chaloq ma' nilarik ta chik wach , i xokik chi ruwahxaaq reey , atoob' ta re' wo' naq taqe ruuk' i wuquub' chi reey . Chi riij i re' , narojiik rutojom i ru mahk .

Eh ¿ chib'ih jariik i ruq'or pan santo laj huuj chi je' wili ? Chakaaj reje ixoq xa chi mosojik wilik ruch'ihil i k'isa rak'uun , ruum re' rak'uun aj poh , ma' ruk'ul ta chi neenehtrik haa' i rukooch naa ruye'ariik reh i k'isa rak'uun i xti manlik ehk'eenb'ees , inki .

Eh awach taqe inkaaj b'ehomrik ma' nkikuy taj i pajarik , inkiq'eb' kiib' ruum ruk'axariik wach iraaj ma' raaj b'anarik , re' injot'wik keh i tinamit . Eh re' wo' re' ink'amwik keh pa runimaal tojb'al mahk .

Re' lajeeb' chi uk'aa' xawil kiwach chinaah i josq'laj chikop kaq riij naakixowaam wach i k'oyoom laj ixoq , nakit'usaam , eh naa kikanaam chi rutkeel . Naa kik'uxum i rutib'kaal , eh naakik'atam wach q'aaq' .
Eh awach ink'axwik ree Dios chi korik , re' Dios reht'al wach chi re' re' rak'uun rixq'uun .

¿ Chib'ih i naa qaq'orom chi riij i re' ? ¿ Mi q'e' chihooj re' i qana'ojb'al i hoj , chuwach i kina'ojb'al i keh ? Ra'j xti ma' chih ta re' , ruum xqaq'or chik chi , chi qunchelaal hoj aj mahk , chi je' taqe aj judío , chi je' taqe ma' re' ta aj judío .
Eh xkikorb'isaj wo' hoq i kitiyoox je' nka'yik k'isa imas wakax , xkiyeew i mayijimaj chikop chuwach . Eh xkininq'ijeej wach i kitiyoox xkiyejaa' ruuk' i kiq'ab' .

Eh re' ruqox i tinamit i ma' xikimik ta ruum taqe ti' k'axik re' re' , xama' xkikanaa' ta wo' rub'aan iraaj ma' raaj b'anarik . Eh xama' xkikanaa' ta wo' kilooq'jiik i ma' tob'laj uxlab'al , je' wo' kilooq'jiik i tiyoox oro , plata , q'an ch'ihch' , ab'aj , chee' kiyej-aal , re' i ma' ki ilwik , ma' ki-ib'irinik taj , ni xata kib'ehik .

Re' hoj qeht'al chi re' i QaJaaw Dios ajwaal wach chi naa qayohleem wach . Ruum aj re' , re' hoj kow inqaq'or keh i tinamit chi kinimanoq . Re' Dios reht'al chi re' hoj korik wach qak'ux . Eh inqaaj wo' hoq chi nee taq inanab'eej i hat chi re' hoj korik wach qak'ux .

Chi qunchelaal i hoj , je' wo' naq re' inqa a'n cho najtir . Xa re' naq i ruk'ax wach i qati'jolal inqa a'n . Eh re' naq inqa a'n inqak'ax wach , inqakapaaj i hoj , eh xti ruk'ul wo' naq chi naa ruye'em chi qanaah i rujosq'iil i Dios , eliik naq wach i naa qak'ulum kuuk' i aj mahk .
Eh re' Pedro xuk'uhb'alej xuq'il taqe tinamit ruuk' taqe q'orik wili : Re' taq i hat chako'leej taq awiib' chuwach i ti' k'axik naakik'ulum i yiib' wach i kina'ojb'al , inki .
ruum wila' re' taq i na a'n i ruk'ax wach taq ati'jolal , akimiik taq i naa areqem . Raaj wila' ruuk' i Santolaj Uxlab'al xasach taq wach i ruk'ax wach taq ati'jolal , naa taq ruwihiik ak'achariik .
Eh i ruq'or wo' chi je' wili pan santo laj huuj : Awach i ruyeew ruk'ux chunimjiik i reh , ma' nee ta inchukarik reh i q'orik , naa la' ruye'ariik reh i q'orooj rib'iral reh , inki .
Re' hin peet inwaaj nut'iosem ree nuDios parub'ihnaal i Jesucristo taq chawiij cha ju'junaal , ruum xa aha' yuuq' wilik rib'iral chi nayeew taq ak'ux chunimjiik i Jesucristo .
Hat taq nuhermano , re' Dios q'e' taq ti ruk'ax . Eh re' hoj qeht'al chi re' reh xsik'wik taq chaawach .
Re' i ajwaal wach taq chi naa a'nam re' chi naa taq ak'axam awiib' chawach chi manlik , ruum wila' nak'ax taq awiib' , nee taq inkuyarik nik' k'ihaal taq amahk .

Noq xureq ruq'ijil chikiwach i qataq'ab'jiik reje Italia nah ha' xoj ik'ik reje , re' Pablo ruch'ihil taqe prexo junch'uq xiq'ahteesjik pan q'ab' jinaj i k'amal kib'eeh taqe soldado , Julio rub'ihnaal . Re' reh , re' ruuk' juntuhb' chi soldado , reh i Ajaab'ees aj Roma .

Re' keh k'ahchi' kitz'uyem i rutz'uuy i Moisés , i raj kamanoom i Dios , je' wo' i rutz'uuy i je' Rak'uun Tentzun . Je' wili inkiq'or pankitz'uuy : QaJaaw Dios , q'e' nim awajaawriik , xiik' naah aaloq'il , eh ma' ha' ta chi je' taqe i xa a'n . Hat wo' Reey chikinaah i nimaq taq tinamit , korik wach ak'ux , rub'ehel chu'nchel i na a'n .
Ruum aj re' je'-oq taq hat ha'lak'un kox-aasjik , chusik'ariik i xti korik laj lécha panuxlab'al . Reh chi reh reh taq areqem rukowiil ak'ux korehtaal taq inareq i ko'lb'al awiib' ,

Eh jinaj i q'orik xb'aan cho pan taxaaj noq xb'iraj . Je' wili i ruq'or : Chatz'ihb'aaj i wili : Yu'naak johtoq chi qawach atoob' keh i naa kikimiik chi k'ahchi' kinimam i QaJaaw inki cho weh . Hoo' korik ruum naakihi'liik ruuk' i kikamaj , eh re' kikamaj naa ruk'amwiik reje keh chi hi'lik , inki Santolaj Uxlab'al .

Re' i xti korik laj nimanik i ma' xta ruch'uwa'iil wach chuwach i Ajaab'ees Dios re' wili : Kitoob'jiik i wilkeeb' panti' k'axik , chi je' ma' xta kituut kajaaw , chi je' ixoq kamnaq kib'ahiil , eh re' chi ma' nee ta inch'uwa'resjik iib' ruuk' i yiib' wach na'ojb'al imb'aan wach ak'al .
Re' wili i nuq'or taq reje aweh , ruum inwaaj i hin chi ma' awach ta neenjot'wik taq aweh ruuk' i je' tii chik holohik laj q'orik inkiq'or .
