Eh chu'nchel i rutz'uhkrisam i Dios , i wilkeeb' pan taxaaj , i wilkeeb' wach ak'al , i wilkeeb' ri'si ak'al , i wilkeeb' pan palaw , je' wili i xkiq'or : Re' ta naq i Dios , i ch'iklik chaloq paruloq'laj ye'aab' , je' wo' i je' Rak'uun Tentzun , neentz'uyjik kiwach , neenye'arik runimaal kiwach , i kiloq'il , nee ta naq inye'arik i kajawriik chi juneliik inki taqe .
Eh noq xuxulej chee rutuun i rukab' ángel . Jinaj i je' mama' yuuq' inchaqchotik ruq'aq'al xkutarik cho nah palaw . Ruum i re' , je' naa k'isiin ma' yejaal i palaw xsutinik chi kik' .

Eh xkesaj reje ko chi riij tinamit , ar xkikutib'eej chi ab'aj . Eh re' taqe i xichukwik q'orik chi riij i Esteban xkikanaa' kahnoq i kiso' , chuwach jinaj i k'ijool Saulo rub'ihnaal reh chi xcha'jaljik keh .
Eh wilik wo' chik i ruq'or wii' chi je' wili : Chaloq'ej taq i QaJaaw Dios chawunchelaal taq i hat , i wilkaat taq panimaq tinamit , i pankok' tinamit chaloq'ej taq inki .
Ruum chu'nchel i chib'ih jariik wilik , re' wo' Dios xtz'uhkrisanik cho reh , re' wo' reh i ehchan reh , re' reh inye'wik reh , nee ta naq inye'arik ruloq'il i Dios chi juneliik Je' ta wo' naq re' .

Eh chi junwaar chik , re' i Juan aj qasan ha' xrilow chi xooj k'oloq ruuk' i Jesús , je' wili xuq'or : Re' wili i Rak'uun i Dios , je' k'isa rak'uun tentzun , re' reh ineesanik reh i kimahk i tinamit .

Eh re' Rahab , i k'oyoom laj ixoq , xa ruum wo' chi xnimanik , ma' xkimik ta haa' chi kixilak i ma' xinimanik ta ree Dios , ruum re' reh xuyeew kipatal panotob'il taqe aj Israel xi ponik tahal ye'aab' .
Re' i ajileq' , xa re' i leq' , xa re' ikaansanik , xa re' sachooj xchalik rub'an . Raaj i hin , xin chalik chuye'ariik taq aweh i k'acharik , reh chi naa taq ruwihiik aak'achariik chi juneliik .
Eh re' hoj , pan taxaaj wilik i qa ye'aab' , eh k'ahchi' quy-eem chi pan taxaaj naa ruchaliik ruka'peech i qaj Ko'loom , re' i QaJaaw Jesucristo .
Re' taq i hat hermano , panotob'il taq chak'ul chaxilak taqe aahermano , je' rukab' noq xatruk'ul taq panotob'il i Jesucristo i hat , reh chi neenye'arik ruloq'il i Ajaab'ees Dios .

Chak'am taqe reje chawiij . Hat-oq taq juntz'ajariik awiib' kuuk' , re' keh neenset'arik i rismaal i kinaah , je' rukab' i ruq'or i k'uhb'aal re' re' . Eh re' hat neetitojwik reh i saach neenkian . Chi je' re' , chu'nchel nee kieht'alinik reh chi ma' korik taj i xq'orarik keh chawiij . Nee la' inkinimaj chi re' hat i na a'n wo' hoq i ruq'or i najtir k'uhb'aal .

Eh re' Abraham korik wo' chi kaa' ki'sil taqe i poch'ooj naah i kik'achab' ma' xata ruum chi poch'ooj naah i kik'achab' ruum la' chi nkiyeew kik'ux chunimjiik i Dios je' rukab' i runimjiik i Dios xub'an i Abraham noq komajaa' ta imb'aan reh i re' .
Eh xkisik' chi riij naab'al reh awach keh i ki'ib' re' re' naakipab'aam . Eh wach naah i Matías xkahnik chi re' reh xokik haa' chi kixilak i junlaj chi tahqaneel .
Eh xuq'or chi atoob' reh awach i kuyuuj i sachooj chik chi jumpech chu'nchel i ru mahk ruum i Dios ma' ye'arik ta chutojariik i ru mahk .
Re' taqe ki'ib' chi q'orol ree nuk'uhb'aal wili , re' i ki'ib' chi ruche'el i olivo , eh re' wo' ki'ib' chi ye'aab' kantela wilkeeb' chuwach i QaJaaw ehchan ree wach ak'al .
Ponoq taq ruti'kiil panak'ux taq amahk , tioq'oq taq chi riij . Re' taq ase'eel , cha sutej taq chi oq'ik , re' rusuqkiil taq ak'ux , cha sutej taq chi ruti'kiil ak'ux

Loq'laj nuhermano Gayo , maatijej aweh i yiib' wach na'ojb'al . Re' la' i holohik laj na'ojb'al cha a'n , ruum awach imb'anik reh i holohik laj na'ojb'al , rak'uun rixq'uun i Dios . Eh awach imb'anik reh i yeb'ee wach na'ojb'al , ma' reht'al ta wach i Dios .

Eh re' Abraham ko xam chik chi xpoch'arik naah i ruk'achab' , rehtalil chi k'uluuj chik ruum i Dios chi korik wach ruk'ux , ruum xuyeew cho ruk'ux chunimjiik i Dios . Ruum i re' xkahnik chi kaa' ki'sil taqe inkiyeew kik'ux chunimjiik i Dios , atoob' ta ma' poch'ooj ta naah i ruk'achab' . Re' keh kik'ulariik chi korik wach kik'ux , ruum inkiyeew kik'ux chunimjiik i Dios .
ruum awach inkimik chuwach i mahk , ma' xta chik rajaawriik i mahk chinaah .

Re' hoj , noq qoh-ooj xa aha' yuuq' , xa qaye'em wo' qati'jolal pankimik , je' rukab' i ti'laj kimik ruk'ulum chaloq i Jesucristo , ruum qeht'al chi naa wo' chik ruye'em qak'achariik i Jesucristo je' rukab' noq xk'acharik wo' chik cho ruka'peech i reh .
Re' taqe junch'uq xa re' inkaaj i keh inkisik' , eh ma' nkikapaaj ta rub'aan aha' wilik iraaj i Jesucristo .

Xa ruum chi xnimanik i Abraham re' i Sara , xwihik jinaj k'isa rak'uun atoob' ta ma' ak'unoom ixoq ta naq , eh k'ih chik i ruhab'ul . Re' Abraham xtoob'jik ruum i Dios chi ko xwihik jinaj i k'isa rak'uun , ruum xunimaj chi re' Dios naa rub'anam i q'orooj cho rib'iral reh pampeet .

Re' iraaj i waJaaw xtaaq'anik cho weh , re' chi ma' naa ta nuq'eb'em jino'q taqe i ruye'em weh . Re' la' iraaj chi naa wo' chik wuksam taqe chaloq chi k'achlik kiwach chuk'ulariik i juneliik k'acharik pantz'apaab' poo wach reh i q'iij .

Eh re' hoj , xa jinaj chi Ajaab'ees Dios inqayeew rajaawriik ma' xta chik jino'q chuwach i reh , ruum xa re' wo' reh xyej-anik reh chu'nchel chib'ih jariik i wilik . Eh re' wo' reh xyej-anik qee hoj , eh xa jinaj wo' hoq inehchanik qeh , re' i QaJaaw Jesucristo , xa ruum i reh xtz'uhkrik chu'nchel chib'ih wilik . Eh xa ruum i reh k'achalkooj i hoj .

Eh re' i Timoteo xsutinik chik chaloq i reh taq aq'orob'jiik ar Tesalónica . Eh holohik i xk'ulik ruq'or qeh taq chawiij ruuk' taq animaniik , je' wo' ruuk' i k'axooj taq i na a'n chawach . Xk'ulik ruq'or qeh chi ti' taq qoh awik'raaj , eh chi xa nawaaj naq chik taq awilom qawach , je' wo' re' i hoj xa nqaaj naq chik qilom taq awach .
Chi je' re' , na' k'oloq i xti manlik aj Cha'joom , naa taq ak'ulum aakorona , re' taq akooch xiik' naah loq'il , ma' naa ta rusahchiik wach chi jumpech .
Eh re' hoj , chu'nchel qak'ux inqaq'or rukorkiil taq aweh chi wilik i ruloq'il i ak' k'uhb'aal , ruum qeht'al chi ma' sahchik ta chik wach reh .

Re' taqe re' xa je' kikab' chikop , xa re' i keht'al cho chi kaasb'al inki a'n Eh xa chi kaasb'al kik'amam chaloq chi naakichopariik , eh naa kikanteesjiik , xama' tiklik ta kiq'orik chi riij i xa chib'ih jariik , atoob' ta ma' nkireq chi riij . Eh xa je' kikimik chikop noq naa kikanteesjiik .
Re' Judas je' wili xuq'or , ma' ruum ta chi ruketelaaj kiwach i neb'aa' , ruum la' chi aj jileq' . Eh ruum chi ruuk' i reh wilik i koxtaal molb'al tumiin , i relq'aaj ruuk' i tumiin inkimol chupaam .
Re' hoj xqareq chik chi riij , eh xqanimaj chi re' Dios q'e' qohruk'ax . Re' Dios aj K'axool . Je' re' noq awach ink'axwik wilik i Dios ruuk' , eh re' reh ruuk' wo' Dios wilik .

Eh noq kansamaj chik i Esteban , xtohq'ik rixowjiik kiwach taqe aj nimaneel . Ruum i re' wilik taqe i xkimol reje chi elik pantaq tokoom tinamit . Wilik i xiooj , Fenicia , Chipre , Antioquía . Eh chupaam taqe i tinamit re' re' , xa keh taqe aj judío xkiq'or i ak' k'uhb'aal , ma' xkiq'or ta reh taqe i ma' re' ta aj judío .
Korik , re' runimjiik i Jesucristo jinaj b'ehomal xiik' naah loq'il chi reh awach i suq ruk'ux ruuk' i chib'ih jariik i wilik reh ,

Xye'arik wo' q'ab' reh chi naa rub'anam i peleto kuuk' i santo laj aj nimaneel korehtaal i rub'an keh . Eh xye'arik wo' runimaal wach chi taaq'anik chikinaah i ju'jun ch'uq chi nimaq tinamit , ju'jun chi kok' tinamit , i xa reh reh wach kiq'orik wii' .

Eh wila' ruum i yiib' wach na'ojb'al taq i na a'n imb'aan ti' k'axik taq aweh , ¿ chib'ih taq neerutiq aweh chi nee taq inakuy ransil ruuk' q'unil ? Raaj wila' nak'ul taq i ti' k'axik ruum i rub'anariik i holohik , eh inakuy taq ransil ruuk' q'unil , re' re' q'e' looq' chuwach i Dios .

Ruum aj re' , re' Jesucristo xoj rukoj panotob'il ruuk' i Dios ruuk' i ak' k'uhb'aal . Eh ruuk' i ti'laj kimik xuk'ul i Jesucristo , neenkuyarik i kimahk i xinimanik cho reh i peet k'uhb'aal , reh chi neen kik'ul i kikooch reh juneliik i sik'ooj cho kiwach ruum i Dios , re' i kooch ruq'orom cho rib'iral keh .
Eh ¿ chib'ih i neenqaq'or chi riij i re' ? ¿ Mi ko naaqa'nam i mahk , reh chi re' Dios xiik' chik naah i rotob'il nee ruyeew qeh ?

Maaq'or taq aweh i k'ixb'ilaal chi q'orarik . Mo'-oq awach taq aweh i xa teheeh wach chuq'orariik i memil laj q'orik . Eh mo'-oq awach taq aweh inq'orik yiib' wach sa'al , re' la' t'iosinik taq naa a'nam .

Eh noq xintz'ehtanik , jinaj chik i kawáyu xwilow wach , q'ank'isik i riij , re' iqlik chi riij , Camnaq i rub'ihnaal . Xam chi riij i kiYe'aab' Camnaq . Re' i ki'ib' re' re' , xye'arik rajaawriik chinaah i rukaaj q'at paam i tinamit wach ak'al , reh chi naa kikansam ruuk' q'aq'inik , ruuk' wi'jaleel , ruuk' yab'ilaal , eh ruuk' taqe josq'laj chikop wilkeeb' wach ak'al .

Ruum aj re' , ajwaal wach chi keh taqe i riih rumaam i Abraham chi peet naakiye'em kik'ux chi nimanik , reh chi neen kik'ul i kooch . Eh re' i re' ma' xata keh i kinimanik reh i najtir k'uhb'aal , keh la' wo' chu'nchel i kiye'em kik'ux chi nimanik , je' rukab' runimjiik i Dios xub'an chee Abraham . Re' reh xkahnik chi qamaam qati't i hoj i qaye'em qak'ux chi nimanik ,
Eh noq hin chik kipech'um chi korik taqe q'atal q'orik re' re' , xkaaj naq kinkoq'taam , ruum xkireq chi riij chi ma' rub'ehel taj chi naa kinkikasam .
Je' re' noq , ma' re' taj i winaq q'oreel reh chi neensik'arik wach ruum i Dios ma' ruum ta chi nee ta ruchop ruk'ux chub'anariik i xa chib'ih jariik , xa ruum la' chi nketeljik wach ruum i Dios .
Manqa a'n taq qeh i hoj i k'oyomal , je' rukab' i xkian chaloq i ju'jun chi kixilak i keh . Eh ruum i xkian re' re' ixib' ru ka'winaq miil i xikimik chuwach i jinaj chi q'iij .

Xa re' la' , re' hin inwik'raaj chi wilik inq'ilwik weh chi ma' nub'an ta naq cho rukapeb'jiik i holohik chi b'anarik . Re' inq'ilwik cho weh re' re' , re' i mahk wilik naq cho pan wánima , i je' naq hin ruye'em prexo .

Eh ma' ta naq xa re' i k'uhtamaj qeh chi riij i Jesucristo neenqatijej riij . Taq la' chi qawach chureqariik chi riij i korik . Manqatijej chik riij nik' wach noq inqayot' qak'ux chi riij i qamahk , nik' wach noq inqakanaa' i yiib' wach na'ojb'al , re' naq ink'amwik qeh pankimik , eh nik' wach noq xoj nimanik ,

Eh ma' ta naq awach taq aweh i ma' neemponik panaq'wach i Timoteo . Chatoob'eej la' taq cho pansuqkiil k'uxliis noq neenchalik chi wilariik , ruum re' hin k'ahchi' wuy-eem ayu' wuch'ihil taqe hermano .
Hat taq nuhermano , ¿ chib'ih neerutiq reh jino'q chi neeruq'or chi ruyeew ruk'ux chunimjiik i Dios , eh mo'-oq awach i rub'an otob'il reh ? ¿ Mi nee inko'ljik re' chi xa re' i nimanik i rub'an ?
Wilik taqe i patim ar Jerusaleem je' wili i xkiq'or : ¿ Mi ma' re' re' i winaq wili i kitukik chusik'ariik reh i rukanteesjiik ?
Eh re' Jesús xuhupej i ruxlab'al chikinaah , je' wili xuq'or keh : Chak'ul taq i Santolaj Uxlab'al .
Re' keh ma' nkinimaj taj chi re' Dios ineesanik iloq reh i mahk paránima . Eh xa chi kutkeel naq inkaaj kisik'im i ko'lemb'al kiib' . Eh ma' inkaaj ta kianam i korik i ruq'or i Dios .

Eh awach i nimanik reh i Rak'uun i Dios , wilik chik paránima i korik re' re' . Eh awach i ma' runimaj taj i Dios , i rukoj chi chukul q'orik i Dios , ruum ma' runimaj taj i korik i ruq'orom chee reh chi riij i Rak'uun .

Re' hin xti korik taq i nuq'or aweh chi awach i nimanik weh i hin , nee wo' rub'an i kamanik i nub'an i hin . Eh ma' xata re' re' neerub'an ko ma' k'isiin la' taqe i nimaq wach ma' ilooj taj neerub'an , ruum re' hin naa wo' chik wojiik ruuk' i waJaaw .
Chakoj kina'ojb'al taqe wilkeeb' chi mosojik , reh chi neenkian i neen q'orarik keh ruum i kipatroon , xa atoob'-oq taqe , mo'-oq xa teheeh kiwach chi chaq'wik .
Ma' wach taq aayoj ruk'ux , reh chi ma' awach ta taq jino'q aweh i ma' nee ta ruk'ul i rotob'il i Dios . Mo'-oq je' taq akab' i k'ahlaj raa' ch'ahn i nik' sanik chi ti' , eh i rukansaj i tinamit .
Koruman wo' hoq chi naa ruk'uhtaam i holohik laj na'ojb'al chi kixilak i ma' re' ta taqe aj nimaneel , reh chi ma' nee ta ruk'uhtaaj ruk'ixb'ilaal , eh ni xata neenq'ehb'ik paruxirob' i aj Yahm .
Eh chi qaju'junaal , reh reh wach i qakooch xqak'ul , re' q'oreel chib'ih kamanikaal i xuyeew qeh i Jesucristo .

Eh re' rukab' ánjel xuchihkaaj chaloq i wilik chupaam i rukulk chinaah i palaw . Ruum i re' , xsutinik chi kik' je' xuhkiil rukik'eel kamnaq xkahnik . Eh ruum i re' xikimik chu'nchel i k'achalkeeb' chupaam i palaw .

Mo'-oq xa re' taq neena a'n i kikamaj noq k'ahchi' taq kaat kicha'jeem , xa reh chi suq kik'ux taq awuuk' . Ruum chi hat taq raj kamanoom i Jesucristo cha a'n taq i kikamaj chu'nchel taq awánima , eh nee taq i na a'n iraaj i Dios .

Xa re' la' , cha a'n taq ruuk' chaq'lamiil , tiloch'ik-oq taq . Chak'uhtaaj taq chi saq taq wach akapeb'aal , reh chi neenkik'uhtaaj kik'ixb'ilaal taqe i yiib' wach kiq'orik chi riij i korik laj na'ojb'al taq i na a'n i hat i tinimanik taq reh i Jesucristo .

Re' raaj i waJaaw , re' chi chu'nchel i naa kilwiik weh i hin , Ak'uunb'ees Dios , eh naakinimaniik weh , naa ruwihiik kik'achariik chi juneliik . Eh re' hin naawuksaniik cho keh chi k'achlik kiwach pantz'apaab' poo wach reh i q'iij , inki Jesús .
Xa chupaam i jumehq' re' re' , jinaj i ruánjel i QaJaaw xk'ulik kojwoq ruyab'ilaal i Herodes , ruum ma' xuyeew ta ruloq'il i Dios , eh haah xk'uxwik reh i ruti'jolal ruum i re' , xkimik .
Neeta naq inqayeew runimaal wach i ruloq'il i Dios , re' raJaaw i QaJaaw Jesucristo , ruum re' reh i Ajaab'ees i keteloom wachiis aj k'axool , eh qohrutoob'eej chi juneliik .
Wilik taqe i xkikanaa' rub'aan taqe i re' , xkiq'eb' kiib' ruum i xa memil laj wech'inik iib' .

Re' hin ma' kink'ixik ta chuq'orariik i ak' k'uhb'aal , ruum re' re' i rajaawriik i Dios , ko'lemb'al kiib' i naakinimaniik reh . Eh peet q'orarik keh i aj judío , eh yu'naak k'ahchi' wo' ruq'orariik keh i ma' re' ta taqe aj judío .

Eh re' jino'q i paat ch'ikamaj chik i raa' ma' awach ta chik neench'ikanik reh jino'q chinaah . Je' wo' re' i ak' k'uhb'aal ma' awach ta chik neench'ikanik reh chinaah , ruum re' i Jesucristo i raa' ri'sil
Je' re' noq re' taq i hat b'ahiilb'ees , cha k'ax taq awehk'een cha ju' junaal je' rukab' noq inak'ax taq awiib' i hat . Eh re' ju'jun chi ehk'eenb'ees , inchol wo' runimam i rub'ahiil .

Re' taq i hat , hat naq taq cho kamnaq panamahk ruum ma' xta naq taq panawánima i Dios . Raaj yu'naak , xuyee taq chik chaaweh i Dios i ak' k'acharik parub'ihnaal i Jesucristo , ruum xukuy chik chu'nchel taq amahk .
Eh maayeew chi re' chi ma' re' akooch ruye'em aweh i Dios noq xkiyeew i kiq'ab' cha naah parub'ihnaal i Dios taqe to'ool chi kixilak i komoon aj nimaneel .
Chi riij i re' , xwilow chik wach jinaj i ak' taxaaj , jinaj i ak' wach ak'al , ruum re' peet taxaaj i peet wach ak'al xsahchik kiwach chi jumpech , eh ma' xta wo' chik palaw .
Xa eliik-oq taq suq ak'ux chawach .
Chupaam i q'iij re' re' , xanaa naq chik kaajwaam kimik i tinamit xama' naa ta wo' kikimiik . Xa naa naq chik kisik'im kikimiik eh xama' naa ta wo' kireqem kikimiik .

Re' hoj inqanimaj chi re' Jesucristo xkimik , eh xwukteesjik wo' chik cho chi k'achlik wach , je' wo' re' noq inqanimaj chi re' Dios parub'ihnaal i Jesucristo naa ruksam taqe chaloq chi k'achlik kiwach xinimanik reh .
Awach inq'orik rib'iral chi re' Jesucristo Rak'uun i Dios , re' i Dios wilik ruuk' eh re' reh ruuk' wo' Dios wilik .

Eh chaq'eb' taq chi riij ak'ux ayiib' wach na'ojb'al i naa a'n taq cho najtir . Maa a'n taq chik aweh i je' rukab' i na a'n naq taq chaloq , ruum re' taqe ruk'axariik wach i yiib' wach na'ojb'al injot'wik taq aweh .
Re' hin i Puerta . Awach inokik wuum i hin , re' re' naa ruko'ljiik , eh naa rukahniik chi je' rukab' i tentzun i nelik inokik pan koraal , eh i rureq ruwa' .

Eh wilik i xikutarik chi ab'aj . Wilik i xtararik pankiyejaal ruuk' xera ch'ihch' . Wilik i xikanteesjik chi q'aslaj ch'ihch' . Wilik i k'ul xiooj , xa rutz'uhmal riij tentzun riij kaprax inkikoj chi kiso' . Xa neb'aa' tii taqe , xa eliik ti' kik'ux , eh imb'aan ti' k'axik keh .
Aweht'al taq chik i hat chi re' i Jesucristo xti korik wach ruk'ux . Inchol wo' taq anab'eem chi re' taqe kib'anik reh i korik , aasjinaq taqe ruka'peech ruuk' i Dios .

ruum re' i QaJaaw xuq'or cho qeh chi je' wili : Re' hin xinpab'anik taq aweh chi hat taq kisaqumaal i tinamit ma' re' ta taqe aj judío , reh chi nee taq tiooj chi najt yuuq' chuq'orariik rib'iral i ak' k'uhb'aal i nuyeew i hin , inki QaJaaw , inki taqe .

Eh qakanaam chik rub'aan i xa chib'ih jariik i k'ixb'ilaal chi b'anarik imb'aan chi q'eeqmaal . Eh ma' awach ta chik inqachuk q'orik reh . Ni xata re' ruk'uhb'aal i Dios inqajal wach ruq'orariik xa re' la' wo' korik inqaq'or . Ruuk' i re' , ma' xta nee qoh q'ehb'ik wii' chikiwach i tinamit , eh re' Dios reht'al inqaq'or .

Re' Jesús xjohteesjik wo' chik pan taxaaj ruum i Dios , reh chi xooj tzuhnoq parusak'aaj . Eh re' Santolaj Uxlab'al , i ruq'orom cho rib'iral Ajaab'ees Dios , xuyeew wo' cho chi qanaah , re' taq i kore' xawil , kore' taq i xab'iraj .
Yu'naak , ak' taq chik aak'achariik ruuk' i holohik laj na'ojb'al i ruyee taq aweh i Dios . Eh ti rutoob'eej taq reh chi reh reh taq areqem chi riij chi manlik nik' wach ruwii' i reh .

Noq xrib'iraj chi je' re' i Jesús , je' wili i xuq'or : Re' yab'ilaal re' re' ma' kantesb'al ta reh , k'uhtb'al la' reh chi naa ruye'ariik ruloq'il Ajaab'ees Dios , eh chi naa ruye'ariik nuloq'il i hin , Ak'uunb'ees Dios , inki .

Re' ak' k'uhb'aal wili ink'uhtanik qeh nik' wach noq qoh ruko'leej i Dios . Eh xa ruum chi korik wach qak'ux chi nimanik qoh ruko'leej , ruum je' wili i ruq'or pan santo laj huuj : Re' korik wach ruk'ux chi nimanik wilik ruk'achariik chi juneliik , inki .
Eh re' Jesús rutehlaam chik i rukuruus noq xelik reje ar . Xooj chupaam i Ye'aab' ruB'aqil Naah Camnaq rub'ihnaal , ( eh Gólgota rub'ihnaal pan hebreo )

Re' Dios , xa reh reh wach i rukamaj xuyeew qeh chi qaju'junaal re' q'oreel chi jariik i ruk'ul chi qeh . Je' re' noq , wila' xuyeew qeh i Dios chi naa qaq'orom i ruk'uhb'aal , qa a'n ruq'orariik re' q'oreel i rukowiil qak'ux chi nimanik .
Re' peet keh k'achaach re' re' je' ruwii' kaq b'ahlam . Re' rukab' , je' ruwii' imas wakax . Re' roox , je' nka'yik winaq . Eh re' rukaaj , je' ruwii' xihk ruhe'em paam i ruxiik' chi rupinik .
Ruum aj re' , chawik'raaj taq awiib' i hat . Mo'q xa hat taq min min chub'anariik taq ayiib' wach na'ojb'al , wilik-oq la' taq ana'ojb'al .

Ruum re' Dios xa jinaj wach kilariik i rub'an , chi je' taqe aj judío , chi je' taqe ma' re' ta aj judío , ruum xa jinaj chi QaJaaw inehchanik keh . Eh awach taqe inkipahqaaj i rotob'il i Dios , i ruyeew wo' cho keh ,
Xanaah re' , re' i ruq'or i najtir k'uhb'aal ar xk'ulik kuxoq wach i noq xk'ulik i Jesucristo , reh i kiko'ljiik awach taqe inkiyeew kik'ux chunimjiik .
Mo'q chih k'isinoq i rub'an taq wii' kiib' ak'ux chu'nchel la' taq chayeew pan q'ab' i Dios panatiij . Eh cha pahqaaj taq i rotob'il i Dios chat'iosej taq reh i rub'an taq chaawuuk' .
Chu'nchel i wili xk'ularik k'uhtb'al reh chi qawach i hoj yu'naak , reh chi ma' nee ta nqak'ax wach aha' wilik i ma' toob' taj xkik'ax cho wach i keh .

Noq xuteh chii' i julkahq , xa nb'olik chik i sib' xelik cho chupaam , je' rukab' noq i nelik chee sib' chupaam i nimlaj horna . Eh re' sib' xunujisaj paam i taxaaj xuq'equmrisaj wach i q'iij , eh xtz'irlojik teew ruum .

Ma' ta naq awach taq aweh i neerub'an i jot'ooj oon neeruk'at rooq i ruhermano , ruum awach imb'anik reh taqe re' , re' QaJaaw Jesucristo naa ruye'wiik reh pa runimaal tojb'al mahk , je' wo' rukab' i qaq'orom taq chaaweh .
Je' re' noq awach i wilik pan jinaj wach k'uxliis ruuk' i Jesucristo ak' chik i runa'ojb'al . Re' taqe i rub'an cho najtir ruq'eb'em chik chi riij ruk'ux , chu'nchel i rub'an ak'laj na'ojb'al chik .

Eh re' i waJaaw kiruk'ax i hin Ak'uunb'ees , eh i ruk'uhtaaj weh chu'nchel i rub'an i reh . Re' reh ko ma' k'isiin i nimaq kiwach ma' ilooj taj chuwach i k'achrisanik xnub'an re' re' naa ruk'uhtaam weh , eh re' taq i hat naa taq rusahchiik ak'ux ruum .
Awach-oq taq aweh i ko rub'an i leq' , chukanaa' rub'aan . Ruuk' la' ransil chusik' rutumiin chi je' re' wilik i neerusiij keh i neb'aa' ruuk' i rukamaj neerub'an parukorkiil .
Eh i nupahqaaj wo' reje otob'il aweh chi neenasik' nupatal ar , ruum ch'iklik nuk'ux chi ruuk' taq atiij , re' Dios nee ruyeew q'ab' weh chi naa wo' chik wojiik taq cha wilariik .

Re' taq i hat , maayeew taq awiib' chi jot'arik ruuk' i xa chib'ih chik jariik chi nimanik netikitijej taq wii' ma' xta la' reet chi ruuk' i rotob'il i Dios neenqak'ul rukowiil i qánima chuwach chi neenqatijej qeh i na'ojb'al xa chi riij wi'k ha' inq'orik , ruum re' taqe i xib'anik cho reh i na'ojb'al re' re' , xama' xta xutiq cho wach keh .
Hermano , inqapahqaaj taq reje otob'il aweh chi cha k'ax taqe i k'amal taq ab'eeh kib'anik reh i rukamaj i QaJaaw Jesucristo taq chaxilak , ruum re' keh inkichop kik'ux taq cha k'uhb'aal jiik .

Je' re' xkiq'or i rutuut rajaaw ruum i kiyo'jiik , ruum re' taqe i k'amal kib'eeh i aj judío kianam chik jinaj wach kik'ux chi naa kesam cho chi riij i paat inkiloq'ej wii' i Dios , awach nee nq'orik reh chi re' Jesús re' i Cristo .

Ma' ruum tee re' neekiko'ljik re' la' hoj i xti hoj ko'limaj , i qoh loq'inik ree Dios ruuk' i rajaawriik i Ruxlab'al . Eh insuuqb'ik qak'ux chi re' chik i Jesucristo inehchanik qeh , ma' nqach'ikaa' ta qak'ux ruuk' i rupoch'ariik naah i k'achab' inkiq'or ,
Re' i ruk'uhb'aal i Dios i ruq'or qeh chi naaqanimam i Rak'uun , re' i Jesucristo . Eh i ruq'or wo' qeh chi k'ul naa qak'axam qiib' chi qawach je' rukab' i ruq'orom cho qeh i reh .
Chi riij i re' , jinaj wo' chik i mama' josq'laj chikop xelik cho panak'al noq xwil . Ki'ib' i ruk'aa' je' ruk'aa' rak'uun tentzun , eh je' inq'orik mama' aaq' .
Hermano , mo'-oq je' kikapeew ha'lak'un taq akapeew . Xa je'-oq la' taq hat ha'lak'un , reh chi ma' nee ta chik taq i na a'n i ma' holohik taj . Eh kow-oq la' taq ak'ux chukapeb'jiik riij i holohik .
Wila' awach taq aweh i ti' ruk'ux , inchol rub'anam rutiij . Eh wila' awach taq aweh i suq ruk'ux , inchol rub'anam rutz'uuy loq'oomb'al ree Dios .
Je' re' noq , cha chop wo' chik taq ak'ux chi nimanik , je' rukab' noq i nayeew taq rukowiil aawooq aq'ab' noq xa q'uhtinaq chik .

Re' taq i hat inakoj taq chi aaWaJaaw i Dios , re' ma' ko ta rusik' wach i ruq'at i q'orik chinaah re' q'oreel chib'ih i xub'an i ju'jun . Ruum aj re' , inchol taq ayohleem i Dios i hat nik' chik najtiil taq naa aak'achariik ayu' wach ak'al .
Re' taq i hat ajwaal wach chi wilik-oq rukowiil taq ak'ux chuk'ulariik ti' k'axik , reh chi nee taq i na a'n iraaj i Dios . Chi je' re' nee taq inak'ul i ruq'orom cho rib'iral i Dios ,
Re' ye'ej k'uxliis chi nimanik re' chi ch'iklik qak'ux chi naa qak'ulum i k'ahchi' quy-eem . Re' chi atoob' ta ma' qilow wach qeht'al chi naaqak'ulum .

Re' wili i nuq'or taq reje aweh , eh i nupahqaaj taq otob'il aweh parub'ihnaal i QaJaaw chi maa a'n taq chik awee hat je' rukab' inki a'n i ma' kinimanik ta ree Dios . Re' keh re' inki a'n i kisahchel laj kapeew .
Re' taq i hat hermano , maa b'iraj taq keh i neekiwech'inik taq aweh chi riij taq awa' ahaa' , chi riij i xa chib'ih ninq'ijal , chi riij i runinq'ijiik i ak' poh , chi riij sabatu' q'iij .

Ruum aj re' , wilkeeb' i koq chuwach i ruloq'laj ye'aab' i Dios . Eh chi q'iij chi aq'ab' k'ahchi' keeb' chub'anariik i rukamaj i Dios chupaam i rupaat wilik pan taxaaj . Re' wo' Dios , i tzunlik cho paruloq'laj ye'aab' , naa ruwihiik kuuk' reh i kicha'jaljiik .
Eh re' Pablo xqajik-lom cho wach ak'al , xuk'utzaa' qohoq riib' chinaah i k'ijool , eh xuq'ahcheej , je' wili i xuq'or keh taqe i hermano : Matyo'jik taq k'achlik i k'ijool wili , inki .

Ruum i re' , k'ahchi' nukuyum ransil chu'nchel i ti' k'axik , reh i kitoob'jiik i sik'ooj cho kiwach ruum i Dios , reh chi neenkireq i loq'laj ko'lemb'al iib' reh i juneliik , re' i ruyeew qeh i Jesucristo .

Eh k'ul taq chayeew rusuqkiil ak'ux chawach ar ruuk' tz'ub'uuj k'uhtb'al reh chi nak'ax taq awiib' chu'nchel ak'ux . Re' ta naq i suq kiil k'uxliis neen wihik taq awuuk' i hat , i tinimanik taq reh i Jesucristo . Je' ta wo' naq re' .
Re' taq i hat , k'ul taq naa animam awiib' chawach , reh chi nee taq inayohleej i Jesucristo .

Re' taq i hat loq'laj hermano , ruum chi noq taq xaweht'aliij taqe re' , chawik'raaj taq awiib' , reh chi ma' nee ta taq tikik'am reje chikiij ruuk' i jot'ooj taqe i yiib' wach kina'ojb'al , eh ni xata nee taq inkiyoj ak'ux ruuk' taq animaniik .
Re' taq i hat ehk'eenb'ees , cha nimaj taq ab'ahiil cha ju'junaal . Re' wili i ruk'ul chi nee taq i na a'n , ruum hat taq chik aj nimaneel parub'ihnaal i QaJaaw Jesucristo .
Eh re' taqe i ma' kikanaa' ta rub'aan i mahk , inchol taqe aq'ilim chikiwach i ruk'ihaal , reh chi re' taqe junch'uq neekiyo'jik chub'aan i mahk .
Ruum aj re' , re' taq i hat , ma' ch'olej taq awiib' chawach . Chawik'raaj la' taq awiib' , reh chi ma' xta nee taq inayoj wii' kik'ux taq aahermano , eh ma' xta wo' taq nee naq'eb' wii' pamahk .

Eh re' taqe i kib'anik reh i holohik laj na'ojb'al , naa ruye'ariik keh ruum i Dios i kiloq'il , i rusuqkiil k'uxliis . Re' taqe i aj judío naa ruye'ariik keh chi peet , eh naa wo' ruye'ariik keh i ma' re' ta taqe aj judío ,

Eh noq xikutarik pa runimaal q'aaq' ma' xik'ahtik ta wo' hoq , xkiko'leej kiib' noq xikanteesjik naq chi q'aslaj ch'ihch' . Xye'arik cho kaansil noq xa nkik'ay naq chik . Eh xwihik cho kajawriik chi q'aq'inik xkian rukanteesjiik i aj q'aq'ineel .
Yu'naak chi qawach reje , ma' nwaaj ta chik chi awach neenwech'inik weh , ruum re' hin , re' i rehtalil i nuq'ojariik wilik wach nuti'jolal ink'uhtanik reh chi hin raaj kamanoom i Jesucristo .

Eh jinaj i ánjel xiik' naah i ransil xuchop chaloq jinaj nimlaj ab'aj je' ruwii' ke'b'al , xukut pan palaw , je' wili i xuq'or : Je' wili i naa ak'ulum i hat nimlaj tinamit Babilonia , na' sacharoq awach chi jumpech ma' jaruuj chik naa rilariik awach .
Eh re' taq i hat nuloq'laj hermano , maakanaa' taq chik i santo laj nimanik . Eliik la' taq cha a'n atiij chuwach i Dios , reh chi nee ruk'am taq ab'eeh i Santolaj Uxlab'al .

Eh maa a'n taq chik aweh i yiib' wach na'ojb'al imb'aan wach ak'al . Chajal la' taq wach akapeew , reh chi nee nooj jaljoq wach taq ak'achariik , eh nee taq inooj areq chi riij aha' wilik iraaj i Dios . Eh nee taq i na a'n rub'aan , imponik chuwach i Dios , je' wo' hoq i korik .
Ruum re' hin q'e' k'isiin nuwach chikiwach taqe raj tahqaneel i Jesucristo . Eh ma' ruk'ul ta naq chi hin raj tahqaneel , ruum xnub'an cho ti' k'axik keh i kinimanik reh i Dios .
Maak'ax taq wach i wach ak'al , ni xata re' i yiib' wach na'ojb'al imb'aan wach ak'al . Awach imponik chuwach taqe re' , ma' xtaj i ruk'axb'al Ajaab'ees Dios ruuk' ,

Ruum aj re' , ma' xta chik neenako'leej wii' awiib' hat , i ti q'atwik q'orik chikinaah tokoom , atoob' ta naq wilik ana'ojb'al . Noq inaq'at q'orik chikinaah tokoom i hat , xa re' hat i nayeew awiib' panti' k'axik , ruum i na a'n wo' aweh inki a'n i keh .

Re' Jacobo , re' Pedro , re' Juan , i k'amal kib'eeh aj nimaneel , xkikoj rehtaal chi re' Dios xpaab'anik weh chub'aan i kamanik wili . Eh xkiyeew weh i kiq'ab' chi choparik , je' wo' reh i Bernabé , rehtalil chi xqa a'n jinaj wach qak'ux kuuk' . Eh xuk'ul kik'ux chi re' hoj k'ahchi' qaq'oriik i ak' k'uhb'aal keh i ma' re' ta taqe aj judío , eh chi re' keh k'ahchi' kiq'oriik rib'iral keh aj judío .

Eh noq kikojom chik wach kuruus i Jesús taqe i soldado , xkik'am chaloq i kijib' chi ruso' xkich'aq chikiwach ju'jun keh i xkik'am i soldado . Eh xkik'am wo' chaloq i rub'urb'aal Jesús , ma' xta b'ojb'al reh , xa jinaj rukemariik , xelik cho chi ralaq xponik ko chi rooq ,
Eh wila' neena a'n kitijiik taqe tokoom , ¿ chib'ih reet noq ma' peet inatijej awiib' i hat ? Wila' naq'or chi ma' toob' taj i leq' , ¿ chib'ih reet noq ko na a'n wo' aweh i leq' i hat ?
¿ Mi ma' aweht'al taq re' hat chi re' taq ati'jolal rupaat i Santolaj Uxlab'al ? re' i ruye'em taq panawánima i Dios . Iraaj ruq'orom chi re' taq ati'jolal ma' aweh ta taq cha wib'il awiib' ,
Re' ruk'axb'al i Jesucristo intijinik qeh pan qak'achariik . Ruum xqeht'aliij chi jinaj i xuyeew riib' pankimik chiqiij , yu'naak chi qunchelaal je' naa hoj kamnaq chuwach i mahk .

Re' taq i hat hermano wilik taq asantohiil xat ruyuq'eej taq i Dios pan taxaaj , xti cha kapaaj taq riij i xk'ulik ruk'uhtaaj i Jesucristo . Re' reh raj tahqaneel i Dios , eh rajaaw k'amal b'eeh aj tiij xk'ulik chi k'amal qab'eeh chi nimanik .

Re' hin xnuk'uhtaaj taq chaaweh chi je' re' i kamanik iraaj b'anarik , reh chi neenqa a'n kitoob'jiik i ma' xta wilik keh . K'oloq taq panak'ux i ruq'orom i QaJaaw Jesús chi je' wili : Xiik' naah chihojal i ruye'ariik chuwach i ruk'ulariik , inki , inki Pablo .

Chayeew taq ruloq'il akaxarohiil je' rukab' i ruq'or i k'uhb'aal . Maa ch'uwa'reej taq wach . Ruum re' Dios naa ruq'atwiik i q'orik chikinaah awach inkich'uwa' risaj wach i kikaxarohiil , je' wo' taqe i ch'aqal wach kaxáro .
Xa re' la' ma' xokik ta i koq xa chi chii' i jul xtz'ehtanik i koq . Eh i rilow ach wo' re' itz'ihy b'otlik naq wii' i Jesús wilik ar .

Xub'an aj cho re' ruch'aab' kahoq xa repej chik riib' . Xa nq'ajb'anik chik i xub'an noq xpoq' i kahoq . Eh xub'an wo' jinaj i yihk xiik' naah kowiil . Ma' jino'q i yihk rub'anam chi je' re' i rutohq'iik chee k'acharik wach ak'al .

Eh re' hin xnuxuk'aa' naq wiib' chulooq'jiik i ánjel , je' wili i xuq'or weh : Maa a'n i je' re' , re' la' Dios chaloq'ej , re' hin xa hin wo' raj kamanoom i Dios je' rukab' i hat , je' rukab' taqe aahermano i kiye'em kik'ux chunimjiik i korik i ruq'orom i Jesucristo . Re' inye'wik rukowiil kik'ux i jalal ruq'oral i Dios , inki .

Ra'j taqe i na'ojb'al wili , xuyeew qeh chi naab'jik i Dios ruuk' i Santolaj Ruxlab'al . Re' Santolaj Ruxlab'al reh i rupech'ib'eej cho chu'nchel , reht'al nare' wo' hoq i ruchamiil paam i runa'ojb'al i Dios .
Chak'ul taq re' i qahermano Epafrodito pansuqkiil k'uxliis , parub'ihnaal i QaJaaw . Eh maakanaa' taq kik'axariik i je' rukab' i runa'ojb'al i reh i kina'ojb'al ,
Je' wo' taq i hat ak'uunb'ees ixq'uunb'ees , cha nimaj taq atuut awajaaw ruuk' chu'nchel i naa kiq'orom taq aweh , ruum je' re' imponik chuwach i QaJaaw .

Re' hoj wilik inye'wik rusuqkiil qak'ux , re' chi saq wach i qakapeb'aal , eh parukorkiil k'acharik inqa a'n chi kixilak i tinamit wili . Eh parukorkiil wo' xojwihik taq chaa wuuk' i hat , ma' ruum ta chi wilik qana'ojb'al chi qutkeel qiib' noq k'acharik inqa a'n parukorkiil . Xa ruuk' la' i rotob'il i Dios i k'ahchi'kooj chi k'acharik chi je' wili .

Awach i ruk'ul paránima taqe i nuk'uhb'aal , eh i runimaj re' re' korik chi kiruk'ax . Eh naa wo' ruk'axariik ruum i waJaaw awach ink'axwik wee hin . Eh naa wo' nuk'axam i hin , naa wo' nuk'uhtaam wiib' reh , inki .

Re' taqe re' , xa holohik na'ojb'al chik noq inq'orarik , ruum je' tii chik rulooq'jiik i Dios inki a'n noq ink'utinik xa kiloch'ik chik inki a'n kiib' , eh inkik'saj chi ti' k'axik i kiti'jolal . Chu'nchel inkik'uhtaaj re' re' , ma' xta i rutiq wach , ni xata ruum i re' inkikanaa' i yiib' wach na'ojb'al inkik'ax wach .

Re' keh xk'ulik kiq'or rukorkiil ayu' chikiwach aj nimaneel nik' wach i kik'axariik xa a'n . Re' hin i nupahqaaj otob'il aweh chi cha taq'aaj k'isinoq chib'ih keh reh i kib'eeh je' rukab' imponik chuwach i Dios .
Maatijej aweh i xa memil laj wech'inik iib' ma' xta rub'ehel . Re' hat aweht'al chik chi re' taqe re' xa yojoj k'uxliis i ruk'am chaloq .

Ruum aj re' , chi qunchelaal i hoj , i qohnimanik reh i ak' k'uhb'aal , xelik chik iloq i je' itz'ihy pan naq'qawach . Eh je' chik hoj jino'q lemow , chi k'uhtjiik i ruloq'il i QaJaaw . Eh rajlaal i q'iij i rujal qawach , k'ahchi' qareqem chi je' ruwii' i reh , rajlaal inqak'ul i ruloq'il . Re' i wili i rub'an quuk' i Ruxlab'al i QaJaaw .

Ra'j naa chik re' i rukik'eel i Jesucristo ma' chih rajaawriik . Re' i Santolaj Ruxlab'al wilik chi juneliik xtoob'inik reh noq xuq'asaj riib' chi jilow mayiij chuwach i Dios , chi ma' xta k'isinoq ru mahk . Eh re' reh ineesanik iloq reh i yeb'ee wach wilik panqakapeb'aal , reh chi re' chik i k'achlik Dios neenqakamaneej wach .

Ma' xta reet i xub'an i Dios chi je' re' . Wila' re' reh xye'wik cho keh i ma' re' ta taqe aj judío i Santolaj Uxlab'al je' rukab' noq xuyeew cho qee hoj i qohnimanik reh i QaJaaw Jesucristo , ¿ chib'ih chik wajaawriik re' hin chi neenutoq'aa' nuq'atam wach i Dios ? inki Pedro .

Eh maayeew taq ruti'kiil ruk'ux i Santolaj Uxlab'al , re' i xkojarik taq wii' awehtalil . Eh re' reh naa ruk'uhtaniik reh chi hat taq chik rak'uun rixq'uun i Dios na' ponoq i ruq'ijil noq naa rumanaam wach taq aako'ljiik .

K'oloq panak'ux re' i k'uhb'aal xat-tiijik cho wii' . Maacanaa' chik runimjiik , eh chayot' ak'ux chi riij aamahk . Wila' ma' chih naa wojiik k'oloq cha naah chi ma' aweht'al , je' rukab' noq inooj k'oloq i ajileq' chi ma' eht'alimaj .
Hat taq kok' wak'uun wixq'uun noq wilkaat , maayeew taq awiib' chi jot'arik : Ruum awach imb'anik reh i korik , korik wo' wach ruk'ux , je' rukab' i Jesucristo korik wach ruk'ux .

Hat taq nuhermano , ma' chu'nchel ta taq naa animam i kiq'orik chi re' i Ruxlab'al i Dios wilik kuuk' . Peet la' taq chawilow mi korik chi Ruxlab'al i Dios wilik kuuk' , ruum ma' k'isiin i chukul q'orik k'ahchi' kuktiik chaloq , re' tii chik i ruk'uhb'aal i Dios inkiq'or inki a'n kiib' .
Je' re' noq re' taq i hat nuhermano , inchol taq anab'eem chi parub'ihnaal i reh k'ahchi' taq qaq'orom aweh chi wilik i kuyb'al mahk .
Hat taq hermano , suuqb'oq taq ak'ux , parub'ihnaal i QaJaaw . Chi wee hin , ma' q'uhteel taj chi nee wo' chik nutz'ihb'aaj taq reje aweh i nutz'ihb'aam taq reje aweh ruum kamaneel taq aweh

Eh wi awach taq aweh i xa nuhmik chik , chub'an cho ruwa' ruhaa' parupaat , reh chi re' Dios ma' nee ta ruyeew i ti' k'axik taq cha naah ruuk' i moloj iib' re' re' . Re' chik taq aak'axkiil junch'iht xapahqaaj taq cho weh , ko naa chik qayejaam wach na' kinponoq taq chawula'jiik .

Eh re' i Pilato je' wili i xuq'or : Wila' je' re' , chak'am taq reje chaq'at taq i q'orik chinaah i hat je' rukab' i ruq'or i najtir k'uhb'aal , inki . Re' keh je' wili i xkiq'or : Re' hoj , ma' ye'ooj ta q'ab' qeh chi neenqakansaj jino'q i winaq , inki taqe .
Re' taq i hat , i ruk'ul naq chi nee ta ruq'or taq ak'ux rub'aan i xiik' naah chihojal i rusiij i Dios . Re' hin jinaj chik i na'ojb'al q'e' chihooj inwaaj nuk'uhtaam taq aweh .

Re' i Jesucristo i xti manlik raJaaw K'amal b'eeh aj tiij chi qeh . Re' reh santo , ma' xta ru mahk . Eh ma' xta ruch'uwa'iil wach , ma' xub'an ta reh i yiib' wach na'ojb'al . Eh xiik' naah i runimaal wach xye'arik ar pan taxaaj .
Je' re' noq chu'nchel , i nub'an rub'aan ruuk' i rukowiil nuk'ux i ruyeew i Jesucristo .
Re' iraaj i Dios taq awuuk' re' chi naa taq aak'achariik pan santohiil , eh chi maa a'n taq chik aweh i k'oyomal .
Eh re' taq i hat hermano , maakanaa' taq rub'aan aatiij chuwach i Dios , chat'iosej taq i rotob'il . Xa eliik-oq na'lik taq aweh .
Noq xrib'iraj i xq'orarik reh i Moisés , xumol chi elik , xooj rukeb'aa' riib' paruyuq'ul i Madián . Ar xpatinik chi xa je' ik'al b'eeh . Eh ar xusik' rehk'een ki'ib' i kok' rak'uun xwihik .
Re' winaq ma' ruk'ul ta chi nee rub'ur wach i naah , ruum re' reh i rujalwaach i Dios , eh re' wo' reh ink'uhtanik reh i ruloq'il i Dios . Eh re' ixoq ink'uhtanik i ruloq'il i winaq ,

Re' ta naq i suq kiil k'uxliis i ruyeew i Jesucristo wih-oq taq panawánima , ruum re' i re' xraaj taq awuuk' i Dios noq xusik' taq chaawach , reh chi xkahnik chi xa jinaj taq chik awach . Eh maakanaa' taq rut'iosjiik i rub'an taq chaawuuk' .

Re' Dios i ehchan reh chu'nchel i chib'ih jariik wilik . Eh re' wo' reh xtz'uhkrisanik , reh chi chu'nchel i rak'uun rixq'uun naakehtriik i ruloq'il pan taxaaj . Ruum aj re' , re' Dios , ruum i ti' k'axik xukuy i Jesucristo , xukanaa' chi manlik kaj Ko'loom , i rak'uun rixq'uun .
¿ Aha' inchalik i q'aq'inik , ixowanik iib' i na a'n taq chawach ? ¿ Mi ma' ruuk' re' i ruk'axariik wach i yiib' wach na'ojb'al , xamin min taq panawánima inchalik ?

Eh wilik rib'iral i k'oyomal taq chaxilak , jinaj b'ila' wilik ar k'ahchi' rixooqb'eem i rukab' rutuut . Re' yiib' wach na'ojb'al re' re' nimlaj mahk chi b'anarik ni xata chi kixilak i ma' re' ta aj nimaneel imb'aan .

Re' taq i hat majaa' taq inchalik cha naah jino'q pajarik xiik' naah ti'kiil re' ta ruuk' i ma' nkuyjik taj . Eh re' taq i hat , chayeew taq ak'ux ruuk' i Dios , re' reh ma' nee ta taq tiruq'eb' chupaam i pajarik , nee la' taq tiresaj chupaam i nim wach pajarik .
Re' hin weht'al chi na' kineloq reje ayu' , wilik taqe i naa kik'uliik iloq je' taqe josq'laj xojb' naa naq kaajwaam kisacham wach taqe i komoon aj nimaneel .

Re' hoj i ruyeew rusuqkiil qak'ux ruq'orariik rib'iral keh i ju'jun ch'uq chi raj nimaneel i Dios chi riij taq i k'ahchi' kaat , ruum q'e' taq hat kuyuul , eh inak'uhtaaj taq chi nayeew taq ak'ux chi nimanik , atoob' ta xa reh reh wach i ti' k'axik , i ixowaal k'ahchi' taq ak'ulum .
Korik , re' Dios ma' jino'q ilwinaq wach chi jumpech . Xa re' la' , wi k'ul inqak'ax qiib' chi qawach , ar ink'utinik chi re' Dios wilik quuk' , eh re' qak'axariik xub'an i manlojik wach pan qánima .

Re' hin i Pablo , hin raj tahqaneel i Jesucristo , ma' re' ta winaq xtaaq'anik xpaab'anik weh . Re' la' i Jesucristo , i Ajaab'ees Dios xtaaq'anik xpaab'anik weh re' x-uksanik cho reh i chi k'achlik wach .

Je' re' noq re' taq i hat , cha kapaaj taq riij , i xk'ulik ruk'uhtaaj i Jesucristo . Re' reh xukuy i ti' k'axik i ruwech'jiik xb'aan kuum taqe aj mahk , je' wo' chik re' taq i cha a'n i hat chak'uy taq ransil . Matq'uhtik taq , maayoj taq ak'ux chi nimanik ,
Wila' xoj-ehtrik haa' i rukimiik i Jesucristo , je' wo' chik re' noq naaqehtriik haa' i wuktik chaloq chi k'achlik qawach .
Eh wilik wo' chik i ruq'or wii' chi je' wili : Suuqb'oq taq ak'ux i hat , i ma' hat ta taq aj judío , kuuk' taqe i rutinamiit i Dios inki .

Re' Santolaj Uxlab'al i xuq'or i korik chi pan tz'apaab' ponoq wach reh i q'iij wilik i naa ruyojiik kik'ux chunimjiik i korik laj k'uhb'aal . Re' chik taqe i uxlab'al i kib'anik jot'ooj naakinimam , eh re' chik naakinimam i tijinik inchalik kuuk' i aj Yahm .
Re' hat Tito , cha q'or keh aj nimaneel chi kinimanoq chikiwach taqe ajaab'ees , chikiwach i xa reh reh wach kajaawriik chi taaq'anik . Eh kian i holohik laj na'ojb'al .

Re' taqe re' xama' nkaaj ta kireqem chi riij chi re' taxaaj xa wilik wo' chaloq najtir cho q'iij . Eh chi ruuk' i ransil i ruq'oral i Dios xutz'uhkrisaj chaloq i wach ak'al panha' , eh ruuk' ha' xuyejaa' chaloq .

Ruum re' Jesucristo reh , xa junriim xuk'ul i ti'laj kimik chi riij taqe qamahk . Re' reh ma' xta wo' naq ru mahk xa re' la' xuk'ul i ti' k'axik quum i hoj , i hoj aj mahk , reh chi xojruk'am panotob'il ruuk' i Dios . Re' Jesucristo xkanteesjik , eh xk'aach wo' chik cho ruka'peech ruum wilik ruk'achariik panuxlab'al .
Ruum aj re' , q'e' naq chihooj chi keh chi ma' ta xkinab'eej pampeet i korik laj b'eeh , chuwach chi keht'al chik noq nee wo' chik inkikanaa' runimjiik i santo laj k'uhb'aal tijimaj taqe cho wii' .

Hermano , re' hoj ti qak'uhb'alej taq reje parub'ihnaal i QaJaaw Jesucristo chi maa a'n taq jinaj wach ak'ux ruuk' hermano ma' raaj ta kamanik , eh mo'-oq k'ahchi' ruk'amam naah i k'uhb'aal poninaq qaq'orom taq aweh .

Eh xa ruum i jinaj chi peet winaq , Adán rub'ihnaal , xokik i mahk wach ak'al . Re' mahk xa xutiq chik cho riib' kuuk' i tinamit , eh ruum i re' , xtohq'ik i kimik , je' re' noq chu'nchel chik kikimik , ruum chu'nchel ximahkunik .

Chi kuncheel i re' , xa ruum chi xinimanik , xkian cho ruq'uchariik i nimaq taq tinamit . Xkian wo' chaloq i holohik laj na'ojb'al noq xi wihik chi taaq'anik . Xkik'ul wo' hoq i q'orooj cho rib'iral keh ruum i Dios . Xkian wo' cho rutz'apariik i kichii' taqe i kaq b'ahlam .
Atoob' ta neenkixowaaj qawach xa re' la' ma' qutkeel taj . Atoob' ta nee qoh kikut wach ak'al , xa re' la' xama' nee ta wo' inkisach qawach .

Hat taq tinamit i ma' korik ta taq wach ak'ux ¿ Mi ma' aweht'al taq re' hat chi re' i rub'aan i yiib' wach na'ojb'al wach ak'al rixowjiik wach i Dios i ruk'am chaloq ? ¿ Awach i ruk'ax wach rub'aan i yiib' wach na'ojb'al ayu' wach ak'al insutinik chi aj ixowan wach i Dios ?
Re' Pablo , i Silas ma' xye'arik ta q'ab' keh ruum i Santolaj Uxlab'al chi xkiq'or i ruk'uhb'aal i QaJaaw ar Asia . Ruum i re' , xa ik'ik xkian reje i Frigia , i Galacia .

Raaj i ko'linik iib' chuwach i mahk xa ruum i ye'ej k'uxliis chunimjiik i Dios , je' wili i ruq'or : Maa q'or i hat chi je' wili : ¿ Awach ineenjohtik pan taxaaj chuq'orob'jiik i Jesucristo ? mat ko'q taq , ( ruum re' q'orik re' re' , je' naa qahteesb'al wo' chik cho reh i Jesucristo )

Xooj aj re' i peet ánjel , xuchihkaaj chaloq i wilik chupaam i rukulk chinaah i wach ak'al . Ruum i re' , xpoq' chaloq jinaj yeb'ee wach ti'laj rax q'aah chikiij chu'nchel i tinamit i kojooj keh i rehtalil i peet josq'laj chikop , eh inkiloq'ej wo' hoq i rujalwaach .

Eh noq ruk'ulum chik i junb'oht chi huuj , re' kijib' chi k'achaach , i kijib' ru ka'winaq chi nimaq kiwach winaq xkixuk'aa' kiib' chuwach i je' Rak'uun Tentzun . Eh chi kunchelaal wilik ju'jun kiarpa , ju'jun kikulk re' ruuk' i oro , nujinaq chi insensia , rujalwaach i kitiij i santo laj aj nimaneel .

Awach i nimanik reh chi re' i Jesús i Cristo q'orooj cho rib'iral chi naruk'uliik , re' re' aasjinaq ruka'peech ruuk' Dios . Eh awach ink'axwik reh jino'q i ajaab'ees , i ruk'ax wo' taqe rak'uun rixq'uun i ajaab'ees re' re' .
Eh ma' ruk'ul taj chi xa nim qawach neenqa a'n qiib' , maa awach inqaq'at wach . Eh manqixowaaj qawach chi qib'il qiib' .
Re' mama' winaq chik maanaq , parukorkiil la' chak'uhb'alej , je'-oq awajaaw cha a'n reh . Je' wo' taqe k'ijolaq , parukorkiil taqe chak'uhb'alej je'-oq jinaj taq atuut awajaaw kuuk' .

Eh cha k'uhtaaj taq i holohik laj na'ojb'al chi kixilak i ma' keht'al ta wach Dios . Ro'q ta nkiq'or yu'naak chi hat taq aj mahk , na'kikoj rehtaal i otob'il taq i na a'n ruuk' i re' , naakiye'em ruloq'il i Dios na' chureq ruq'ijil i q'ataj q'orik naa rub'anam .

Re' hin xnuyeew wo' naq cho nuk'ux chuko'ljiik riij i k'uhb'aal re' re' , xwik'saj taqe chaloq chi ti' k'axik i kinimanik reh i Jesucristo . Eh xnub'an wo' cho runimjiik i k'uhb'aal , eh ma' jino'q xreqwik cho numahk .
Eh xupahqaaj keh nik' xtohq'ik riik'raam i rak'uun chi xtohq'ik rub'anam saqb'ih . Re' taqe rumoso je' wili i xkiq'or : Eew jinajora ruqajiik i q'iij xik'ik i kaq tz'a' chi riij , inki taqe .

Eh ruum chi ach je' ne'eel neenb'aan okik chupaam i hi'limb'al q'iij re' imb'aan wii' i runinq'ijiik i elik chaloq Egipto . Re' taqe i k'amal kib'eeh i aj judío ma' xkaaj taj chi xi kahnik wach kuruus ixib' re' re' , ruum chi looq' keh i hi'limb'al q'iij . Ruum aj re' , xkiq'or reh i Pilato chi chutaq'aaj rutoqariik i kituuq wilkeeb' wach kuruus , reh chi naa rehtesjiik cho ar i kiti'jolal .

Eh chupaam i jumehq' re' re' , re' Pilato xraaj naq roq'taam i Jesús . Eh re' taqe i aj judío kow xkiq'or chi je' wili : Wila' xawoq'taaj reje i winaq re' re' , neetikahnik chi ma' hat ta chik ramigo i ajaab'ees aj Roma , ruum awach i rukoj riib' chi reey inkahnik chi raj ixowaal i ajaab'ees aj Roma inki taqe .
Re' Jesús je' wili xuq'or : Maatib'isaj taq awánima . Chanimaj taq i Dios , eh kinanimaj wo' taq i hin .

Eh mat yo'jik taq kuum i ki-ixowanik taq awach . Re' taq i naa a'nam re' re' k'uhtb'al reh chikiwach chi re' keh nakojiik pantojb'al mahk , eh chi re' taq i hat naa taq ako'ljiik , re' wili ruuk' i Dios inchalik .

Ma' re' ta taq i hat xatsik'wik cho nuwach i hin , re' la' hin xin sik'wik taq chaawach i hat . Eh xat nutaq'aaj taq reje chi naa taq ak'uhtaam chi tiwachinik taq . Reh chi re' waJaaw nee taq i ruyeew chaaweh chib'ih jariik i nee taq inapahqaaj reh panub'ihnaal i hin .

Re' Abel xa ruum chi xnimanik , xiik' naah chihojal i rumayiij xuyeew chuwach i xuyeew i Caín . Eh ruum i re' , xuq'or i Dios chi re' Abel korik wach ruk'ux , xuk'ul reh i rumayiij , atoob' ta kamnaq chik , i je' naa ko k'achlik yu'naak , ruum kok'ahchi' qib'iram rib'iral chi xnimanik

Re' taq i hat , inchol taq anab'eem chi re' hoj xa hoj raj to'ool i Jesucristo . Eh ye'ooj chi qanaah chi naa qaq'orom rib'iral i ko'lb'al iib' ruyejaam cho wach i Dios , re' ma' eht'alimaj ta naq najtir .
Eh re' taqe ch'umiil pan taxaaj xitilojik cho wach ak'al , xa je' chik kitilojik chaloq i wach i higo noq ink'uyu'teesjik ruum i kowlaj teew .
Je' re' noq re' taq i hat nuloq'laj hermano , maaloq'ej taq chik chi jumpech i tiyoox .
Eh maayeew taq q'ab' reh i yiib' wach na'ojb'al chi nee ruq'at taq awach , chaq'at la' taq wach i reh ruuk' i rub'anariik otob'il .

Chuwach i Dios i nuq'or aweh chi chawik'saj ruq'orariik pan kixikin , eh chak'uhb'alej taqe chi mankiwech'uj chik kiib' chi riij i k'utaaj xama' xta rub'ehel . Ruum re' taqe re' , xa yojb'al kik'ux taqe ki-ib'irinik reh .

Chajil taq i koq awiib' ruuk' i Dios re' reh nee taq inwihik awuuk' . Eh re' taq i hat aj mahk , cha kanaa' taq rub'aan i yiib' wach na'ojb'al . Je' wo' taq i hat i junk'axariik i Dios taq inawaaj a'nam ruuk' i ruk'axariik wach i yiib' wach na'ojb'al chasaqb'isaj taq wach awánima .
Raaj wila' xa jinaj i suq rilariik taq i na a'n , eh re' jinaj tokoom rilariik taq i na a'n , k'ahchi' taq akojom amahk , eh ti mahkunik wo' taq chuwach i ruk'uhb'aal i Dios .
Re' Dios ma' xusik' ta cho qawach reh i rub'anariik i ch'uwa' wach na'ojb'al . Xusik' la' cho qawach chi k'acharik pan santohiil .

Eh re' Dios kopan taxaaj i ruyeew chaloq i rujosq'iil chikinaah i yiib' wach kina'ojb'al ma' korik ta wach kik'ux . Eh ruuk' i yiib' wach nkian inkitz'ap naah i korik re' nkaaj chi ma' neht'aljik taj .
Hat taq nuloq'laj hermano , k'ul taq qak'ax qiib' chi qawach , ruum re' k'axooj ruuk' i Dios inchalik . Awach ink'axwik , aasjinaq chik ruka'peech ruuk' i Dios , eh reht'al wach i Dios .
Awach i ruq'or chi wilik pan saqum , eh ko rixowaaj-oq wach i ras ruchaaq' , re' re' xa kopan q'equm wo' wilik .

Eh suuqb'oq taq ak'ux wila' ruum i runimjiik i Jesucristo taq tib'ajarik atoob' taq aweh , ruum re' i loq'laj Ruxlab'al i Dios naa ruwihiik taq awuuk' chi juneliik . Eh awuum taq i hat naa ruye'ariik ruloq'il , eh ruum inki a'n i yiib' wach kina'ojb'al inkiyeew chi b'ajarik
Re' Pablo xuyeew rusuqkiil kik'ux , xutoq'aa' ruk'utjaam keh chi ch'ihtaal taqe i xub'an chaloq parub'ihnaal i Dios chi kixilak i ma' re' ta taqe aj judío .
¿ Awach taq aweh i hat i neenreqwik numahk ? Eh wila' re' i korik i nuq'or , ¿ chib'ih reet noq ma' nanimaj taq weh ?
Eh re' hin ma' naa ta chik ruk'uliik panuk'ux chi jumpech taqe kimahk , je' wo' hoq i kiyiib' wach na'ojb'al , inki .
Eh xa ruum i reh , re' Dios xiik' naah i rotob'il xuyeew taq chaaweh . Yu'naak tichol taq chik ruq'orariik i ruq'oral i Dios , eh wilik taq chik ana'ojb'al .

Hat taq nuhermano , i nupahqaaj taq otob'il aweh parub'ihnaal i QaJaaw Jesucristo , eh je' wo' ruuk' i k'axaj iib' i ruyeew qeh i Santolaj Uxlab'al , chi kinatoob'eej tii taq panatiij chuwach i Dios .
Re' tinamit je' wili i xkiq'or reh : Re' hat ma' tob'laj uxlab'al i wilik awuuk' , ruum inakapaaj chi naa akanteesjiik inki taqe .

Re' i xutaq'aaj chaloq i Dios chi jilow mayiij , re' rukik'eel xuchihkaaj chi kuyb'al ree mahk . Eh xa ruum i ruye'ariik k'uxliis chi nimanik inkan i kuyb'al mahk . Ruuk' i re' , xuk'uhtaaj i Dios chi korik wach ruk'ux , ruum ma' xuyeew ta taqe chutojariik i kimahk kianam chaloq ,

Eh ruum chi ma' k'isiin i k'uxik , re' taqe i rumoso i kajaaw i k'amal kib'eeh aj tiij , kuch'ihil taqe i kicha'jinik reh i rupaat i QaJaaw Dios kiluk'um kiq'aaq' ar , q'axnik inki a'n i koq . Eh re' Pedro q'axnik wo' i rub'an i koq chi kixilak .
Eh chakoj taq chi ko'lemb'al awiib' chu'nchel i runimaal rajaawriik i Dios ruye'em taq aweh . Chi je' re' , ma' nee ta ruyoj taq ak'ux i aj Yahm nik' nee raaj taq aajot'ariik ,
Re' i Pedro je' wili i xuq'or ree Jesús : Jaaw , ¿ chib'ih reet noq ma' nee ta nub'an ojik chawiij yu'naak ? Re' hin nuchopom nuk'ux chi neenuyeew wiib' chi kimik chawiij inki .

Re' Dios nee taq i ruyeew cha weh i suq kiil k'uxliis , re' i xiik' naah loq'il chuwach i xa kapeew chi je' wili . Eh re' suq kiil k'uxliis re' re' neencha'jinik reh taq awánima je' wo' taq akapeb'aal , parub'ihnaal i Jesucristo .
Eh ruuk' wo' naq i ju' qaaq' inqaloq'ej i Ajaab'ees Dios . Eh ruuk' wo' chik i re' inqab'aj taqe qas qachaaq' , re' taqe i ruyejaam chaloq i Dios chi je' ruwii' .

Eh ma' xnuq'or ta taq reje aweh panhuuj chi ma' naa ta taq aq'oreem taqe k'oyoom , taqe i aj k'axal wach b'ehomal , taqe i aj jileq' , taqe i looqen tiyoox wilkeeb' wach ak'al . Qaq'or chi ma' nee ta naq'oreej taq chi jumpech i ruk'ul naq chi nee taq ti elik reje ayu' wach ak'al .
Re' hin noq xub'an ma' k'isiin i na'ojb'al xnub'an chi ixob'al kiwach i kinimanik reh i QaJaaw Jesús aj Nazaret .

Re' keh ma' jino'q ixoq neenkilow wach chi ma' ta neenkotwaaj k'oyomal ruuk' . Eh ma' nq'uhtik ta kik'ux chub'anariik i mahk . Inkitaqchi'ij taqe i komajaa' kow kik'ux . Eh q'e' inkik'ax wach i b'ehomal , kiq'eb'em kiib' chi jumpech .

Eh re' aj cha'joom xa re' i rutojb'aal i ruk'ax , noq i rilow chi nk'u'loq i xojb' i rukanaa' taqe kahnoq i tentzun , i rumol chi elik , ruum ma' re' ta wo' i reh i manlik cha'joom , eh ma' re' ta wo' reh taqe i tentzun . Eh re' xojb' , i ruchop taqe i tentzun , k'ul i rutukej kiwach .
Hat taq nuloq'laj hermano , chaweht'aliij taq i wili : Xti chayeew taq ak'ux chi ib'irinik mo'-oq teheeh taq awach chi q'orik , je' wo' chi kaqrik ,
Eh re' i QaJaaw Jesucristo ruq'orom wo' chaloq chi re' taqe i naa kiq'oriik rib'iral i ak' k'uhb'aal ruuk' wo' i kikamaj re' re' naakik'aach .
Re' hin i Saqum . Xinchalik ayu' wach ak'al , reh chi awach i kinimanik weh , ma' naa ta kikahniik panq'equm .

Chi riij i re' , re' Jesús xureq i winaq parupaat i Dios , je' wili i xuq'or reh : Yu'naak xatk'achjik chik , mat mahkunik chik reh chi ma' nee ta nchalik cha naah jino'q i ti' k'axik q'e' chik nim wach , inki .
Eh chib'ih pa' jariik taq inawaaj a'nam , chu'nchel taq cha a'n ruuk' k'axooj .
Wila' korik chi kinak'ax taq chamol taq panawánima i nuk'uhb'aal .

Eh xti chawik'raaj taq awiib' i hat maawixowaaj taq wach i Jesucristo i xq'o'rinik cho qeh , ruum re' taqe i xi-ixowanik reh i Dios noq xuk'uhb'alej taqe ayu' wach ak'al , ma' xkiko'leej ta kiib' chuwach i ti' k'axik . Eh ra'j naa chik re' hoj neenqako'leej qiib' wila' ma' xqib'iraj k'ahchi' ruk'uhb'aliniik cho qeh kopan taxaaj .
Re' taq i hat hermano noq komajaa' taq inanimaj i k'achlik Dios , xa nayeew naq chik taq ak'ux chi kilooq'jiik tiyoox , re' ma' re' ta wo' taqe Dios .

Eh re' Dios noq xupab'aa' chaloq i Rak'uun , peet xutaq'aaj taq cha wuuk' i hat , reh chi nee taq inak'ul i rotob'il i Dios , reh wo' chi nee taq inakanaa' cha ju'junaal i yiib' wach na'ojb'al , inki .
Eh re' hoj ti xqilow cho ruuk' naq'qawach chu'nchel i otob'il xub'an i Jesús ar paruyuq'ul i Judea , eh ar Jerusaleem . Rub'anam-oq chik taqe re' , xkit'uyaa' wach jinaj kuruus kanteesb'al reh .

Hat taq nuhermano , re' hin i nupahqaaj taq otob'il aweh parub'ihnaal i QaJaaw Jesucristo : Cha a'n taq jinaj wach aq'oral , cha a'n taq jinaj wach ak'ux . Mo'q chih i ch'aqaj iib' taq chawach tiwih-oq taq pansuqkiil k'uxliis . Jinaj-oq taq wach akapeew , k'ul taq chawaaj awiib' chawach .
Re' taq i hat hermano , noq xub'an chaloq , ma' eht'alimaj ta naq taq chaawach ruum i Dios , ruum inawixowaaj naq taq wach . Je' naq re' taq i na a'n ruuk' i ruyib'kiil wach taq ana'ojb'al .

Je' re' noq re' hat , maa a'n aweh i mahk inki a'n taqe k'ijolaq . Re' la' korik cha a'n panak'achariik tinimanoq tik'axwoq xa suq-oq ak'ux kuuk' taqe i saq wach i kánima chuq'orariik rib'iral i QaJaaw .

Hermano , wila' je' taq chik hat uksamaj cho haa' ruuk' i Jesucristo noq x-ukteesjik wo' chik chaloq i reh , cha sik' taq i wilik cho pan taxaaj , re' tzunlik cho wii' i Jesucristo parusak'aaj q'ab' i Dios .

Eh noq xuxulej chee rutuun i peet ángel . Ma' k'isa saqb'och ruch'ihil q'aaq' xilakim kik' xqajik chinaah i wach ak'al . Eh ruum i re' , je' naa k'isiin ma' yejaal i wach ak'al ruch'ihil taqe chee' k'ahaam , eh chu'nchel kok' rax ch'ahn xichaajrik .

K'ahchi' kiq'orom chi je' wili : Inqat'iosej aweh , hat QaJaaw Dios , i wilik awajaawriik . Re' hat xa wilkaat wo' cho najtir q'iij je' wo' yu'naak , eh je' chi juneliik , ruum xak'ul chik i awajaawriik chi taaq'anik .

Re' Jesús je' wili xuq'or reh : Neeta naq inanab'eej i kooch i ruyeew i Dios , nee ta nanaab'eej awach i hin i k'ahchi' nupahqaam nuhaa' aweh , re' hat nee naq inapahqaaj ahaa' weh , eh re' hin neen naq i nuyeew aweh i ha' inye'wik k'acharik , inki .
Re' Jesucristo inye'wik taq ak'achariik . Na' k'oloq ruka'peech , naa rilariik wach , naa wo' chik rilariik taq awach haa' i hat , kora'j naa taq awehtriik re' i ruloq'il .
Re' taqe wili tz'ihb'amaj , reh chi nee taq i naanimaj i hat chi re' Jesús re' i Cristo , i Rak'uun i Dios , reh wo' chi wi xanimaj taq , nee taq inareq i juneliik k'acharik , parub'ihnaal i Jesús .

Eh re' hoj , re' chik i Dios inehchanik qeh . Awach ineht'alinik wach i Dios , i runimaj inqaq'or . Eh re' i ma' re' taj i Dios inehchanik reh , ma' runimaj taj inqaq'or . Je' aj re' noq inqanab'eej awach aj uuk' wilik i korik laj Uxlab'al , eh awach aj uuk' wilik i ma' tob'laj uxlab'al aj jot'ool .

Re' taqe re' xa k'ixb'ilaal kib'anik taq chaxilak noq i na a'n taq aninq'iij reh i k'axaj taq awiib' . Eh xa chayeew chik i wi'k inki a'n xama' awach ta chik imponik panaq'kiwach . Xa chi kib'il inkicha'jeej kiib' . Eh xa je' kikab' i suutz' ma' xta jab' i ruk'am chaloq k'ul inooj ruum i teew . Je' wo' kikab' i chee' ma' inwachinik ta chik paruq'ijil , eh noq inwoqarik , xakimik i rub'an .
Eh wilik wo' taqe inkesaj chaloq i kiyowaab' wataq til ch'aht eh wataq ch'aht chee' , ink'ulik kiyeew chi' taq b'eeh , reh chi awach keh i yowaab' neenik'ik i runaach i Pedro chinaah , neenk'achjik .
Eh re' ta naq i ruye'ariik taq ak'ux chi nimanik i nee taq inakoj chi jilow apulato ch'ihch' . Reh chi ma' xta taq neetiruchej i je' ch'aab' qoplik ruq'aq'al i rukoj chi jot'b'al i aj yahm .
Eh chu'nchel taq i neena a'n cha a'n taq chu'nchel ak'ux . Chi je' re' ma' xata keh taqe winaq k'ahchi' a'nam i je' la' naa reh i Dios taq k'ahchi' kaat .

Mo'-oq awach taq chaxilak i neenk'acharik pan k'oyomal , oon ma' nee ta imponik panaq'wach i q'e' looq' , je' rukab' i xub'an i Esaú : Re' reh xa ruum i junriim chi wi'k , xuk'ayej i rukooch xye'arik reh chi riij chi peet ak'un .
Eh chi kunchelaal kow xkiq'or chi je' wili : Re' re' ma' nqaaj ta chi neenawoq'taaj . Re' la' i Barrabás chawoq'taaj qeh inki taqe . Xanaah re' i Barrabás ruum i leq' wilik pantz'ilom .

Naa kianam i jot'ooj chi ma' eht'alimaj , naa rub'anam xa teheeh kiwach , naakinimb'isam kiib' chub'aan i xama' xta rutiq wach , ma' naa ta kinimam i Dios , xa re' naakisik'im i ruk'ax wach i kiti'jolal .
Ruum aj re' , xiik' naah nimaal wach i ruloq'il xye'arik ruum i Dios . Eh xye'arik reh jinaj i b'ihnaal xiik' naah nimaal wach chikiwach chu'nchel i b'ihnaal ,

Re' i xatqatijej taq wii' chi riij i rajaawriik , chi riij i ruk'uliik ruka'peech i QaJaaw Jesucristo ma' xata k'utaaj re' ruuk' intz'aqarik wach chi xa jot'b'al , ruum re' hoj xti ruuk' naq'qawach qilom cho wach i QaJaaw chi wilik runimaal i ruloq'il .

Eh rutaq'aam wo' taq ruq'orariik aweh i re' chupaam taqe i ruhuuj , atoob' ta wilik i k'axik chi reqarik chi riij . Re' taqe i ma' xta kina'ojb'al , re' taqe i ma' kichopom ta kik'ux , inkiyoj wach i ruq'or chupaam taqe huuj re' re' , je' rukab' noq inkiyoj wach i tz'ihb'amaj cho chupaam i santo laj huuj , re' inki a'n re' re' naa ruk'amwiik keh pantojb'al mahk .
Eh noq xrilow i Bernabé , i Pablo aha' wilik naa naq kianam i tinamit , xkiweq i kiso' chikiij , eh xkimin i koq kiib' chi kixilak i tinamit , k'erlik kichii' chuq'orariik chi je' wili :

Re' Jesucristo xk'ulik chub'anariik otob'il keh aj judío , reh chi xk'ulik resaj wach i ruq'orom cho rib'iral i Dios najtir keh i qamaam qati't . Eh xk'ulik ruk'uhtaaj i Jesucristo chi re' Dios korik chi rub'an i ruq'or .
Awach i rukoj riib' chi aj nimaneel , eh mo'-oq i ruq'il riib' ruuk' ju' raaq' , re' reh xak'ahchi' rujot'om riib' , eh re' nimanik i rub'an xama' xta k'isinoq inokik wii' .

K'oloq taq panak'ux i nuq'orom taq chaaweh chi ma' jino'q i xa móso neeruq'at wach i rupatroon . Je' re' noq , wila' kianam k'axik wee hin , naa wo' kianam k'axik taq aweh i hat . Eh wila' kinimam i nuk'uhb'aal i hin , naa wo' kinimam i nuk'uhb'aal taq naa aq'orom i hat .
Re' Jesús je' wili i xuq'or keh i aj judío xinimanik reh : Wila' ma' xakanaa' taq chik runimjiik i nuq'oral , naa taq akahniik chi manlik waj tahqaneel .
Eh xchalik jinaj i runimaal ti' k'axik ruum i wi'jaleel chupaam ruyuq'ul i Egipto je' wo' chupaam i ruyuq'ul i Canaán , re' taqe i qamaam qati't wilkeeb' i Canaán ma' nkireq ta chik kiwa' kihaa' .

Hat nuloq' laj hermana , re' hin q'e' xsuuqb'ik nuk'ux , ruum xnunab'eej chi wilik i awak'uun awixq'uun noq wilkeeb' k'ahchi' kik'amam naah i korik je' rukab' i ruq'or qeh i ruk'uhb'aal i Ajaab'ees Dios .

Ruum awach i ma' rukapaaj ta rutoob'jiik i awach reh , eh mo'-oq wo' rukapaaj rutoob'jiik taqe rak'uun rixq'uun , ma' imponik ta panaq'wach runimjiik i Jesucristo , q'e' wo' chik yiib' wach imb'anik chuwach i ma' re' ta aj nimaneel .

Ruum aj re' , inchol qajilim i koq qiib' ruuk' i Dios chi korik wach qak'ux , eh chi qaye'em qak'ux . Eh nee ta naq inqik'raaj chi ma' xta chik qamahk , ruum rusaqb'isam chik wach i qánima i Jesucristo . Eh je' naa rutz'ajam wach i qati'jolal ruuk' i saq wach ha' .

Xa nkib'iraj naq rib'iral ink'utjik chi wiij chi je' wili : Re' winaq re' re' i nixowanik cho qawach najtir , yu'naak re' chik haa' chuq'orariik i k'uhb'aal , re' naq i xraaj cho rusacham wach najtir , inki taqe .

Ruum aj re' , i nupahqaaj taq otob'il aweh chi cha a'n taq awa' , ruum reh taq aakowiil wila' ko nawaaj taq k'acharik , ruum ma' jino'q taq aweh i naa rukimiik ayu' , eh ni xata jino'q rismaal taq anaah naa aq'eb'em , ki uchjik .
Eh re' hat , q'e' hat kuyuul . Xakuy i ti' k'axik , xiik' naah i kamanik xa a'n panub'ihnaal . Eh ma' xq'uhtik ta ak'ux chub'aan .
Chaq'or wo' keh i mama' winaq chi mo'-oq teheeh kiwach , xa kiloch'ik-oq , holohik-oq i kina'ojb'al , kow-oq kik'ux chi nimanik , korik-oq keh i k'axooj inki a'n eh wilik-oq q'unil kuuk' .

Re' Dios najtir cho q'iij xukuy kimahk i tinamit ruuk' i kisahchel laj na'ojb'al . Raaj yu'naak k'ahchi' ruq'orom keh i tinamit wilkeeb' wach ak'al chi kiyot' i kik'ux chi riij i kimahk , eh chi xa re' chik i reh neenkinimaj ,

Eh re' i María i rutuut i Jesús wilik i koq ruuk' i rukuruus . Eh wilik i koq ar ixoq ruchaaq' i rutuut i Jesús . Wilik i koq ar i María , re' i rehk'een i Cleofas . Eh wilik i koq ar i María aj Magdala .
Re' ruso' muh-amaj pankik' , je' wili i rub'ihnaal : tehel wach reh i ruQ'oral i Dios .
Re' taq i hat , neerub'an chi nee taq inak'ux aweh . Xa re' la' , chawik'raaj taq awiib' mo'-oq ruum i re' taq nee naq'eb' pamahk taqe i komajaa' ta kow kik'ux chi nimanik ,

Re' Dios xruksaj wo' chaloq chi k'achlik wach i Jesús , reh chi ma' naa ta ruq'ahiik i ruti'jolal panjul , je' rukab' i ruq'orom chaloq i Dios , pan santo laj huuj chi je' wili : Re' hin naa nuye'em taq aweh i ketelinik wachiis je' rukab' i xnuyeew reh i reey David , inki .

Eh chupaam i q'iij re' re' , re' taq i hat naa taq anab'eem chi re' hin wilkiin ruuk' i waJaaw pan jinaj wach k'uxliis , eh chi re' taq i hat wilkaat taq wuuk' i hin , je' wo' hin wilkiin wo' taq awuuk' .
Je' re' noq , wila' inqanimaj taqe i ruk'uhb'aal i Dios , iraaj ruq'orom chi qeht'al chik wach i reh chi korik .
Ruum aj re' , xnuq'or taq aweh chi naa taq akimiik panamahk . Xti korik wo' chi naa taq akimiik panamahk , wila' ma' xanimaj taq chi re' hin , hin aj pan taxaaj , ki uchjik .

Eh xnukoj rehtaal chi re' ixoq re' re' xohk'reel ruum i ruuk'jiik i kikik'eel i santo laj aj nimaneel , je' wo' ruum i kikik'eel i xikanteesjik chuq'orariik i korik chi riij i Jesucristo . Eh re' hin , ma' k'isiin ta noq xsahchik nuk'ux .

Eh aweht'al taq i hat chi re' Esaú xraaj naq chik ruk'ulum koq'uun i rotob'il i rajaaw , ma' xk'ulub'jik ta chik reh . Eh atoob' ta yohb'aal wo' naq chik wach oq'ik xub'an chi riij , ma' xkorjik ta chik wach i xuk'ul pampeet .
Re' i tinamit xkiwech'uj kiib' chi riij i Jesús . Wilik kiq'orik reh chi q'e' holohik i rub'an . Eh wilik kiq'orik reh chi ma' holohik taj i rub'an , ruum k'ahchi' rujot'om tinamit inki taqe .
Re' QaJaaw xye'wik kajaawriik chuq'orariik i ak' k'uhb'aal , ma' k'isiin i xkinimaj , eh xkiq'asaj kiib' reh i QaJaaw .

Xrilow la' i Dios chi neen qa a'n ruq'orariik i ru ak' k'uhb'aal xojrupab'aa' chub'aan . Ruum aj re' ma' re' taj imponik chikiwach i tinamit k'ahchi' qa'nam , re' la' imponik chuwach i Dios , re' ineht'alinik reh chib'ih i wilik cho pan qánima .
Re' hoj yu'naak qat'iosej ree Dios noq re' reh i ruyeew ko'lemb'al qeh parub'ihnaal i QaJaaw Jesucristo , eh re' kimik ma' xta chik rajaawriik chi qanaah .
Re' ixoq kamnaq rub'ahiil , eh xti korik chi ma' xta ilil reh , xa ruuk' tii Dios i ruch'ikaa' ruk'ux , eh ma' rukanaa' ta rub'aan i tiij chi q'iij chi aq'ab' , reh chi re' Dios neentoob'inik reh .
Yu'naak komajaa' taq chih inapahqaaj reh panub'ihnaal . Chapahqaaj taq reh , nee taq inak'ul . Chi je' re' , nee taq i manlojik wach i rusuqkiil taq ak'ux , inki Jesús .
Eh wi hat k'ayimaj pankowlaj kamanik noq xusik' chaawach i Dios , mat kapeb'ik ruum i re' , wila' xuyee riib' chi neenawesaj iloq awiib' pan q'ab' inchopwik anaah , chawesaj iloq awiib' ,
Korik wo' hoq , ruum yu'naak re' taqe re' kib'anik i tukinik wachiis . Xa re' i ruk'ax wach i kiti'jolal inki a'n Eh ma' xta i Ruxlab'al i Dios pan kánima .
Re' hin q'e' nsahchik nuk'ux taq i na a'n , ruum jumehq'iil taq k'ahchi' akanaam runimjiik i Dios xsik'wik taq chaawach ruuk' i rotob'il Jesucristo , eh tokoom chik k'uhb'aal xatoq'aa' taq animam .
Chachop taq ak'ux chi wihik pansuqkiil k'uxliis chu'nchel aj uuk' . Eh ti k'acharoq taq pan santohiil , ruum awach i ma' chih santohiil ruuk' , ma' jaruuj ta naa rilom wach i QaJaaw Dios .

Eh re' Jesús je' wili i xuq'or keh : Chakut taq qohoq aya'l parusak'aaj i barco ar nee taq inachop i kar , inki . Re' keh xkikut wo' qohoq i kiya'l , eh ma' nkikuy ta chik cho rehtesjiik i kiya'l ruum i rahliil i ma' k'isa kar .
ruum re' re' ma' xta q'orik reh mi poch'ooj naah i ruk'achab' , oon ma' poch'ooj ta naah i ruk'achab' . Re' i xti ajwaal wach re' chi naa runimam taqe ruq'or i ruk'uhb'aal i Dios .

Awach i ye'arik reh ye'ej rukowiil k'uxliis , chub'aan wo' hoq . Awach i ye'ooj reh chi naa rusihim chib'ih reh i ras ruchaaq' , marupixpuuj wach . Awach i ye'ooj rajaawriik chi k'amal b'eeh , chub'an wo' hoq . Awach i ye'ooj reh chi naa rutoob'iniik suq-oq ruk'ux chub'anariik .

Re' Pablo xupech'uj keh chi je' wili : ¿ Mi xak'ul taq i Santolaj Uxlab'al noq xanimaj taq i QaJaaw Jesús ? inki . Re' keh je' wili i xkiq'or : Re' hoj ni xata qib'iram rib'iral chi wilik i Santolaj Uxlab'al , inki taqe .
Wila' awach i ma' raaj ta runimam inqaq'or taq reje aweh chupaam i huuj wili , chakoj taq rehtaal awach , eh maawuhch'ihleej taq , reh chi neenchalik ruk'ixiik ruuk' taqe i rub'an .

Hat taq hermano , re' hin nuq'or taq aweh chi re' qati'jolal wili ma' re' tee re' naa rokiik pa runimaal rajaawriik i Dios . Ruum re' i ti'jolal wili xanaa wo' ruq'ahiik , ma' re' tee re' naa rokiik haa' chi k'acharik ruuk' i ma' jaruuj naa ruq'ahiik .

Mo'-oq xa chi riij taq awa' xa k'uhlik reh tikamanoq . Chakamaneej la' taq riij awa' naa ruwihiik chi juneliik , re' i naa taq ruye'wiik aweh i juneliik k'acharik . Eh re' inanuye'em taq aweh i hin Ak'uunb'ees nuwii' winaq , ruum re' i waJaaw xuq'or chi re' hin naa nuye'wiik reh , inki .
Eh noq inapahqaaj taq aha' wilik taq inawaaj , ma' nak'ul ta taq , ruum ma' re' ta rupahqaljiik taq i na a'n . Eh re' taq inak'ax wach re' re' xa reh rub'anariik i re' ma' re' taq inawaaj wii' .
Eliik wo' taq chat'iosej ree Ajaab'ees Dios parub'ihnaal i QaJaaw Jesucristo chu'nchel i ruyeew chaaweh .
Chakoj taq rehtaal i xub'an , Abraham . Re' reh xunimaj i Dios ruum i re' xk'ularik ruum i Dios chi korik wach ruk'ux .
Re' tinamit ma' koruman ta chik chi reh i rusaqumaal q'iij , ni xata re' rusaqumaal i poh , ruum re' chik i loq'laj rusaqumaal chii' wach i Dios ruch'ihil i je' Rak'uun Tentzun insihq'inik reh .

Re' taq i hat yu'naak , ma' re' ta chik taq i na a'n i ruk'ax taq wach ati'jolal . Re' la' chik taq i na a'n iraaj i Santolaj Uxlab'al , wila' wilik taq awuuk' i Santolaj Ruxlab'al i Dios . Eh awach i ma' xta ruuk' i Santolaj Ruxlab'al i Jesucristo , ma' re' ta reh i Jesucristo .

Eh wila' re' taqe aj judío xkijal wach i kina'ojb'al nee wo' naq chik kikojariik paruman . Nee naq imb'aan keh je' rukab' noq inlecheb'jik i koq i q'ab' i ruche'el olivo chuwach i runimaal , re' Dios wilik rajaawriik chi kikojariik paruman .
Re' keh ma' jino'q chukuj q'orik xelik cho pan kichii' . Eh ma' xta wo' k'isinoq kimahk .

Xa re' i korik naa nuq'orom awee hin : Re' chi nuloq'ej i ki Dios i numaam wati't je' rukab' i ruq'or i ak' k'uhb'aal , re' i ma' korik ta laj nimanik noq inkiq'or i keh . Eh i nunimaj wo' i k'uhb'aal rutz'ihb'aam chaloq i Moisés , je' wo' hoq i kitz'ihb'aam chaloq i jalal ruq'oral i Dios .

Eh mo'-oq awach aj uuk' neen wihik taq ak'aas . Re' taq aak'aas i hat , re' chi k'ul taq naa ak'axam awiib' chawach , ruum awach inkik'ax i kas kichaaq' , xkinimaj chik taqe i ruq'or i najtir k'uhb'aal .

Re' taqe re' , xti q'e' ti' i k'ahtik xkik'ul ruum i rutz'a'iil i q'iij . Eh ni xata ruum i re' xkinimaj i Dios , eh ma' xkiyeew ta ruloq'il , rub'ajariik la' chik i Dios xkian , re' i wilik rajaawriik chuye'ariik taqe ti' k'axik re' re' .

Re' tinamit re' re' sutimaj riij chi runimaal tz'aq najt naah . Kab'laj i ru puertahiil , eh chi chii' i ju'jun chi puerta , ju'jun i ánjel wilik . Eh chuwach i ju'jun chi puerta re' re' , tz'ihb'amaj i kib'ihnaal i kab'laj ch'uq chi tinamit Israel .

Re' Jesucristo xoj ruko'leej chuwach i ti' k'axik i ruyeew i najtir k'uhb'aal , ruum i ti' k'axik xuk'ul . Je' rukab' i ruq'or pan santo laj huuj chi je' wili : Re' taqe i ju' chee' kit'uyub'jik noq kikanteesjiik , xiik' naah ti'kiil inkik'ul , inki .

Re' taq i hat ab'iram chik taq nik' wach i nuna'ojb'al najtir , noq ko hin naq cho aj nimaneel chi kixilak aj judío . Re' hin yohb'aal wach ti'kiil i xnub'an cho keh i kinimanik reh i Dios , xwaaj naq nusacham kiwach .
Eh xuchop i mama' kaq riij aaq' , re' i xa wilik wo' cho najtir q'iij , ma' tob'laj winaq , aj yahm i rub'ihnaal . Eh xb'ak'arik chi karena ruum i ánjel reh i lajeeb' siento haab' ,

Eh jinaj winaq xpatinik chaloq ar Samaria , Simón rub'ihnaal . Najtir i rutoq'aa' cho warinik chupaam i ye'aab' re' re' . Ma' k'isiin taqe i tinamit i rujot' ruuk' chukuj q'orik i rub'an , eh xti wilik runa'ojb'al i rub'an riib' .

Re' hin inwaaj chi nee nunab'eej chi korik chi xa re' wo' Jesucristo inko'linik . Inwaaj wo' wik'raam rajaawriik i Dios x-uksanik cho reh chi k'achlik wach . Eh inwaaj wo' nukuyum ransil i ti' k'axik je' rukab' noq xukuy cho ransil i ti' k'axik i Jesucristo , ro'q ta ank'ul weh i ti'laj kimik xuk'ul i reh .
Maayeew aaq'ab' chinaah jino'q , reh chi nenokik chi to'ooj chi ma' akapaam ta riij chi korik , reh chi ma' nee ta ti ehtrik i ru mahk i tokoom . Eh chaq'eb' chi riij ak'ux i yiib' wach na'ojb'al .
Je' wo' taqe i ati't ixoq xa kiloch'ik-oq , mo'-oq wo' taqe xa molol wach k'utaaj manki a'n wo' xohk'rik . Inchol la' kik'uhtaam i holohik laj na'ojb'al ,
Je' re' noq awach ma' nee ta ruyeew pan kaxáro i rixq'uun , ma' xta reet i neerub'an . Eh wi ma' xuyeew pan kaxáro i rixq'uun , xiik' wo' naah chihojal neerub'an .
Xa re' la' , cha a'n wo' taq i ruq'or i ruk'uhb'aal i Dios . Mo'-oq xa hat taq aj ib'iroom , ruum wi xa xik'ik taq rij axikin , xak'ahchi' taq ajot'om awiib' cha wib'il awiib' .
Chi riij i re' , re' Jesús xub'ehuj paam i ruyuq'ul i Galilea . Ma' xraaj ta chik wihik Judea , ruum re' taqe i k'amal kib'eeh i aj judío ar , xkaaj naq kikansam .

Eh re' taq i hat , re' Dios xkojwik taq aweh chunimjiik i Jesucristo . Eh re' wo' reh xpa'ab'jik cho ruum i Dios chi kojol qana'ojb'al , x-esanik qeh chuwach i mahk , eh xuyeew qasantohiil , xojruko'leej wo' hoq .
Eh xuyeew i ha' chupaam jinaj i ye'aab' ha' , eh xutoq'aa' rutz'ajam i kooq chi kiju'junaal i raj tahqaneel , eh xujux wo' chik i kooq ruuk' itz'ihy rub'ak'am panyejaal .
Xa re' la' xwixowaaj wo' cho kiwach i kinimanik reh i ak' k'uhb'aal , eh xnupahqaaj chi naakikanteesjiik . Eh i nukoj taqe cho pantz'ilom chi winaq chi ixoq .
Je' re' noq , re' taqe tinamit k'ul xyoj kik'ux chikiwach , ruum ma' nkireq ta chi riij chib'ih rub'anam i Jesús .

Hat taq aj to'ool , chacha'jeej taq chi korik taqe rutentzuun i Dios , re' taqe i aj nimaneel ye'ooj taq aweh chi ilarik . Eh cha a'n taq chu'nchel ak'ux , je' rukab' iraaj i Dios mo'-oq xa hat taq minooj chupaam mo'-oq xa ruum i tumiin , maak'ay taq wach i rukamaj i Dios .
Re' i rukoj chi b'anb'al ti' k'axik i kimik , re' mahk . Eh re' i najtir k'uhb'aal inye'wik rajaawriik i mahk .

Re' taqe i xi kamanik taq pan awab'iix , re' i ma' xatoj ta taqe , k'ahchi' keeb' johtoq chi k'ooq taq chawiij . Eh re' QaJaaw Dios nim rajaawriik xrib'iraj chik chaloq i k'ooq k'ahchi' keeb' taqe kamanoom re' re' .
Ruum aj re' , chaq'eb' taq chi riij ak'ux i yiib' wach na'ojb'al , i jot'ooj , i k'ul b'anaj wachiis , i kaqwachiil , je' wo' chu'nchel i tz'aqaj wach k'utaaj .

Re' ixoq rub'anam kaxáro choplik naah ruum i k'uhb'aal ruuk' i rub'ahiil noq ko k'achlik i rub'ahiil . Eh wila' xkimik reje i rub'ahiil , neeruyee riib' chi xa awach pa' jino'q i aj nimaneel neerub'an wii' kaxáro chuwach i QaJaaw .
Re' keh xkikanaa' i korik laj nimanik , eh k'ahchi' kiq'orom chi re' taqe kamnaq wuktinaq chik taqe chaloq . Ruum i inkiq'or re' re' , wilik taqe k'ahchi' kiyojom ruk'ux chi nimanik .

Ruum wila' wilkooj ruuk' i Jesucristo , ma' xta chik neerutiq qeh chi neel oon ma' nee ta impoch'arik naah i qak'achab' . Re' i xti ajwaal wach re' chi naaqaye'em qak'ux chi nimanik , ruuk' i re' neenqak'uhtaaj chi wilik i k'axooj quuk' .
Eh noq rutijem chik riib' chi korik nik' wach i nimanik , ruuk' taqe ti' k'axik xuk'ul , xkahnik chi re' chik i reh aj Ko'len keh chi juneliik chu'nchel i kinimanik reh .
Eh chi riij i moloj wach tumiin toob'al keh i hermano i wilkeeb' Jerusaleem , chamol taq wach je' rukab' inutaq'aam reje ruq'orariik keh i ju'jun ch'uq chi aj nimaneel wilkeeb' Galacia .
Re' taq i hat ehk'eenb'ees , tinimanoq taq chikiwach ab'ahiil je' rukab' runimjiik i QaJaaw taq i na a'n ,
Re' Jesús je' wili xuq'or keh i tinamit : Re' hin i kisaqumaal i tinamit wach ak'al . Awach i kirutahqeej ma' naa ta chik rub'eeh panq'equm , naa la' ruwihiik chupaam saqum inye'wik k'acharik , nki .
Raaj taq i hat hermano , k'oloq taq panak'ux i kiq'orom cho rib'iral taq aweh pampeet taqe raj tahqaneel i QaJaaw Jesucristo . Je' wili i kiq'orom chaloq :

Eh re' Dios ma' ruman taj chi chib'ih ta jariik neentoob'jik wii' ruum jino'q i xa awach , ruum re' reh inye'wik qeh chi qunchelaal i qak'achariik , i quxlab'al , je' wo' chu'nchel i xa chib'ih jariik .

Wila' inqanimaj inkiq'or taqe i xa winaq , ra'j naa chik re' i ruq'or rukorkiil i Dios ma' neenqanimaj , ruum re' re' xiik' naah loq'il chuwach inkiq'or taqe i xa winaq ruum re' Dios i ruq'or qeh i korik chi riij i Rak'uun .
Re' taq i hat , inchol taq a tiq'aam awiib' chi korik ruuk' i ruk'uhb'aal i QaJaaw Jesucristo . Eh maa a'n taq chik i yiib' wach na'ojb'al i ruk'ax taq wach ati'jolal .
Re' taqe aj Israel , ruum chi xinimanik , wuquub' q'iij xkisutej riij i tinamit Jericó , eh xq'ehb'ik i tz'aq sutimaj wii' riij i tinamit re' re' .
Eh re' Dios xuyeew rajaawriik i Pablo chub'anariik taqe i nimaq kiwach ma' ilooj taj .
Chalik i Jesús je' wili i xuq'or keh : Re' hin xti korik taq i nuq'or aweh chi chu'nchel i kib'anik reh i mahk , re' wo' mahk inchopwik kinaah .
Hat taq nuloq'laj hermano , wila' je' re' qak'axariik xub'an i Dios , je' wo' chik re' i qa a'n i hoj : k'ul qak'ax qiib' chi qawach .
Re' hat xatk'uhtanik weh i rub'eeh i juneliik k'acharik . Eh wilik jinaj runimaal rusuqkiil nuk'ux , ruum xa awuuk' wo' hat wilik i rusuqkiil k'uxliis reh juneliik , inki .
Noq komajaa'-oq kimponik i hin , re' hat chawilow paam i Santolaj huuj chi kixikin i taqe aj nimaneel . Chayeew rukowiil kik'ux , eh cha tijej taqe .
Atoob' ta yohb'aal wach i ti' k'axik neenchalik chi qanaah , neenqakuy rik'tesjiik . Atoob' ta neerub'an intukik wach qak'ux xa re' la' ma' qutkeel taj .
Eh wilik wo' taqe i xa ch'ool inki a'n je' wili xkiq'or : Re' taqe re' xohk'reel taqe ruum aj re' je' re' kiq'orik , inki taqe .
Re' tz'aq re' re' jaspe ab'aj ruyej-aal . Eh re' paam i tinamit re' ruuk' i holohik oro i okinaq reh je' rukab' i lemow xa nworwotik chik .

Chupaam i ye'aab' xiik' naah loq'il xi elik chaloq i wuquub' chi ánjel , re' i kik'amwik cho reh i wuquub' b'uhr wach chi ti' k'axik . Re' keh xa saqpotz'ik chik i kiso' kikojom re' ruuk' i lino xa nrob'rotik chik wach . Eh q'e'lik kisíncho chi' kik'ux re' ruuk' i oro .
Chapahqaaj taq i rotob'il i Dios chikiij i ki-ixowanik taq awach , ma' re' ta kib'ajariik taq naa a'nam i hat .
Re' taqe rooq xan reprotik chik je' rukab' i q'an ch'ihch' ch'ub'ik wach , korb'isamaj cho pan q'aaq' . Eh re' kowlaj q'orik xub'an chaloq xa je' chik inq'orik ruk'ihaal nim ha' xampojik chik .

Eh nuye'em keh chi naab'jik awach i hat . Ma' naa ta nukanaam rub'aan , reh chi neen wihik kuuk' i k'axooj je' rukab' i nuk'axariik i na a'n i hat , reh chi nee kinwihik kuuk' i keh , inki Jesús parutiij .

Eh re' Dios ma' xuketelaaj ta wach i Rak'uun , xuyeew la' pankimik chiqiij i hoj . Eh wila' xuyeew i Rak'uun , ¿ ra'j naa chik re' aha' wilik ajwaal wach chi qeh ma' nee ruyeew cho qeh parub'ihnaal i Rak'uun ?
Pan tz'apaab' taqe ponoq wach ree q'iij wilik taqe naa kikaqse'lanik taq aweh , eh xa re' chik i yiib' wach na'ojb'al i ruk'ax wach i kiti'jolal naa kianam , inki taqe .

Re' taq i hat , maaq'or chi nim taq awach chikiwach i aj judío , re' taqe i je' raa' til olivo . K'oloq taq panak'ux noq ma' re' ta taq i hat i raa' ri'sil i nimanik , xa je' la' taq hat q'ab' i olivo . Re' i olivo ma' re' taj i q'ab' inye'wik ruk'achariik i raa' , re' la' i raa' inye'wik ruk'achariik i q'ab' .
Re' hoj ma' re' ta ruq'atariik taq awach inqaaj ruuk' taq animaniik , ruum re' taq i hat kow taq chik ak'ux . Atoob'jiik la' taq inqaaj , reh chi neen wihik taq rusuqkiil ak'ux chi nimanik .
Eh jinaj i winaq xwihik q'e' yowaab' , Lázaro i rub'ihnaal . Ar Betania xi patinik ruch'ihil taqe i kiib' chi ranaab' , María b'ih i jinaj , Marta b'ih i jinaj .
Eh awach i ma' imponik ta panaq'wach i k'uhb'aal wili , ma' re' tee hoj ma' qohponik ta panaq'wach . Re' la' i Dios ma' imponik ta panaq'wach , re' i xye'wik qeh i ruSantolaj Uxlab'al .
Ruuk' i wili nee taq inanab'eej awach i wilik i Ruxlab'al i Dios ruuk' : Re' inq'orik rukorkiil chi re' Jesucristo xk'ulik chi ruwii' winaq ayu' wach ak'al , re' re' Ruxlab'al i Dios wilik ruuk' .

Re' taqe i aj jot'ool re' re' , keht'al wo' naq chi je' re' i xk'ularik chaloq , eh xa ko je' wo' pan kiwiriik k'acharik inki a'n Xa kok'ahchi' wo' kiq'eb'em kiib' chub'anariik i ruk'ax wach i kiti'jolal , ma' nkiyeew ta rajaawriik i qaDios , inkib'aj taqe nimaq wach kajaawriik .
Eh chukanaa' rub'aan i yiib' wach na'ojb'al , xa re' chik i holohik chub'an , eh chusik' i wihik pansuqkiil k'uxliis , marukanaa' chik ,

Je' re' noq , xti chayeew taq ak'ux chi nimanik , chuk'am raa' taq panawánima . Eh maakanaa' taq chik i ko'lemb'al taq aweh , re' i ch'iklik taq reje wii' ak'ux . Re' ak' k'uhb'aal taq xab'iraj re' wo' re' i k'ahchi' ruq'orariik rib'iral sut i wach ak'al . Eh re' hin i Pablo , hin paab'amaj chuq'orariik rib'iral .

Noq xkib'iraj chi je' re' i k'amal kib'eeh i aj judío , xkichop chaloq ab'aj kanteesb'al naq reh i Jesús . Eh re' reh ma' kota chik xuk'uhtaaj riib' keh xelik reje chupaam i rupaat i Dios xik'ik reje pankiyejaal .
Re' la' chik i ak' na'ojb'al taq cha a'n , re' i rutz'uhkrisam chaloq i Dios . Eh ti k'acharoq taq chi saq taq wach ana'ojb'al , chi korik taq chik wach ak'ux , pan santohiil .
Ruum i wili , re' taqe santo laj aj nimaneel , re' i kinimanik reh i ruk'uhb'aal i Dios , eh korik wo' wach kik'ux chunimjiik i Jesucristo , inchol kichopom kik'ux chukuyariik i ti' k'axik .
Eh re' i Dios xruksaj wo' chik cho ruka'peech i Jesús chi k'achlik wach .
Re' hin i Atoob'laj aj Cha'joom . Re' i atoob'laj aj cha'joom i ruyeew riib' pankimik chi riij taqe rutentzuun .
Yu'naak inchol taq anab'eem chi re' Dios ruuk' i rotob'il xirupab'aa' chub'aan i kamanik wili reh toob'al taq aweh .
Wila' awach imb'anik reh i yojoj k'uxliis , chaq'il junriim oon ka'pech-oq , eh wi ma' xnimanik , chawesaj cho chi kixilak i aj nimaneel .
Eh noq xkib'iraj i q'orik wili taqe i k'amal kib'eeh i aj judío , xyoj wo' chik kik'ux chikiwach .
Raaj awach i nimanik reh i ruq'oral , ruuk' i re' i rureq chi riij chi re' Dios xti korik i ruq'or .

Re' taq i hat loq'laj hermano , noq kok'ahchi' taq awuy-eem i rojiik eloq wach taqe re' , xti cha chop taq ak'ux chi k'acharik parukorkiil , reh chi nee taq tik'ulik rureq i Dios pansuqkiil k'uxliis , chi ma' xta taq ruch'uwa'iil wach awánima , ni xata nee taq i rureq amahk .

Chi riij taqe wili hermano , cha a'n tii taq chaatiij chiqiij , reh chi neenooj rib'iral chi jumehq'iil i ruk'uhb'aal i QaJaaw Jesucristo , reh chi neen kiyeew ruloq'il noq neen kik'ul pan kánima , je' rukab' noq xak'ul taq i hat .

ruum qeht'al chi re' Dios x-uksanik cho reh i QaJaaw Jesucristo chi k'achlik wach , re' wo' reh naa ruksaniik cho qee hoj chi k'achlik qawach . Eh hoj wo' junojiik taq awuuk' i hat noq nakooj ruk'amam johtoq ruuk' i Dios .
Wilik oon i yowaab' taq chaxilak , inchol rutaq'aam kik'amariik taqe i kitowik i parukamaj i Dios , reh chi neenkian kitiij chinaah eh neenkib'uch' pan aseite parub'ihnaal i QaJaaw Jesucristo .
Noq xponik ka'winaq haab' i ruhab'ul i Moisés , xk'ulik reje paruk'ux chi narojiik ruq'o'reem taqe rutinamiit aj Israel chib'ih inki a'n

Eh inuq'or reje aweh chi wilik taqe i aj judío xichopwik reh i winaq wili , eh xanaa naq chik kikansam . Noq xb'iraj chi aj Roma i winaq naa naq kikansam , xinooj chi ruko'ljiik wuch'ihil taqe nu soldado .

Ruuk' i re' , xyoj kik'ux i patineel wilkeeb' ar . Eh junokiik taqe chuchopariik i Gayo ruch'ihil i Aristarco . Re' keh aj Macedonia taqe , re' i ki uhch'ihlinik ree Pablo . Eh xiqerjik reje kuum i aj Éfeso .
Re' taq i hat ma' xawaaj ta taq chi x-oq'teesjik wilik ruSantohiil , korik wach ruk'ux . Re' la' chik inche taq xapahqaaj chi oq'teesjoq i winaq aj kaansoom .
Re' Dios xa jinaj chik wach qilariik i rub'an yu'naak kuuk' i keh , eh xtz'ajarik wo' wach i kánima i keh xa ruum i runimjiik i QaJaaw xkian .
Ruum aj re' , re' ju'jun inchol riik'raam cho paruk'ux chi peet mi ruyee riib' chi neeruk'ux i kaxlanwi'k , mi nee ruyee riib' chi nee ruk'ej reh i ha' i wilik chupaam i kulk .

Eh re' taq i hat nuhermano , q'e' taq ti nuk'ax , kow-oq ta ak'ux chi nimanik , maa awach ink'uyu'sanik taq aweh . Chayeew la' taq ak'ux chub'aan i rukamaj i QaJaaw , ruum re' taq i hat aweht'al taq chi re' rukamaj i QaJaaw taq k'ahchi' kaat naa taq ak'ulum jilow .
Je' re' noq i nupahqaaj taq otob'il aweh chi chak'am taq naah i nuna'ojb'al i hin .

Re' taqe yiib' wach i kina'ojb'al ma' inkireq ta chi riij i runa'ojb'al i Dios xa ruuk' i kina'ojb'al i keh , ni xata ruuk' i xa chib'ih jariik inki a'n Je' re' noq , re' Dios re' chik xiko'leej taqe awach inkiyeew kik'ux chunimjiik i ruk'uhb'aal , atoob' ta re' k'uhb'aal wili xa je' memil laj na'ojb'al noq inkikapaaj .

Je' wo' taq i hat ehk'eenb'ees , cha nimaj taq ab'ahiil cha ju'junaal , reh chi re' taqe i b'ahiilb'ees i ma' kinimanik ta reh i Dios neekinimanik ruuk' taq aaholohik laj na'ojb'al i na a'n chikiwach . Chi je' re' , ma' ko ta ruman chi nee taq inaq'or rub'ehel keh taq ab'ahiil ,

Eh hoj paab'amaj chi raj tahqaneel i Jesucristo , eh noq inqaq'or taq aweh i k'uhb'aal , je' naa re' Dios k'ahchi' rupahqaniik otob'il taq aweh chi cha nimaj taq i reh . Eh i nupahqaaj taq otob'il aweh parub'ihnaal i Jesucristo chi okeen taq panotob'il ruuk' i Dios .
Eh re' Dios xruksaj wo' chik chaloq chi k'achlik wach i Jesús , xuko'leej chuwach i ti'laj kimik xuk'ul , ruum xrilow chi ma' xuyee ta riib' chi xkimik chi jumpech .
