¿ Mi ma' re' wo' re' keh i kib'ajwik reh i loq'laj rub'ihnaal i Jesucristo , re' i b'ihnaal xq'orarik taq cha naah ?
Mo'-oq xohk'reel laj winaq , mo'-oq sik'il peleto . Xa atoob'-oq la' wach ruk'ux wilik-oq i q'unil ruuk' , mo'-oq k'axal wach tumiin re' ruuk' i ma' parub'ehel taj inkan .

Re' i naa ruk'iniik reh i ha' naa nuye'em i hin , ma' naa ta chik ruchiqiik chii' chi jumpech . Re' ha' re' re' , je' naa rukab' jino'q i raasb'al ha' paránima , eh re' re' naa ruye'wiik reh i juneliik k'acharik , inki .
Eh awach i nimanik reh i ruq'oral i Dios , korik chi ruk'ax chi manlik . Eh ruum i runimjiik i ruq'oral i Dios , inqanab'eej chi wilkooj pan jinaj wach k'uxliis ruuk' .

Eh chi riij i re' , ixib' chi ma' tob'laj uxlab'al je' kiwii' tuhtz' xwil kiwach . Jinaj i xelik cho panchii' i mama' kaq riij aaq' , jinaj xelik cho panchii' i peet josq'laj chikop . Jinaj i xelik cho panchii' i jalal ruq'oral i Dios i rub'an riib' .

Re' taq i hat wila' xti korik chi k'ahchi' taq animam i ruq'or i k'uhb'aal nim rajaawriik tz'ihb'amaj cho pan santo laj huuj chi je' wili : Chak'ax aawas achaaq' je' rukab' noq inak'ax awiib' i hat , inki .

Ma' re' taj i hoj k'ahchi' qaq'orom qib'iral chi qib'il qiib' . Re' la' i Jesucristo k'ahchi' qaq'orom rib'iral chi re' reh i Ajaab'ees chi qanaah . Eh re' hoj xa hoj b'anal reh i rukamaj i Dios taq chaxilak , ruum inqik'raaj i ruk'axb'al i Jesucristo .
Re' taq i hat , maayeew taq awiib' chi jot'arik . Je' rukab' inq'orarik chi je' wili : Re' runimjiik i yiib' wach taqchi' inyojwik wach i holohik laj na'ojb'al , inki .

Re' Dios inye'wik suq kiil k'uxliis . Re' reh i x-uksanik cho reh i Jesucristo chi k'achlik wach , re' i nim wach laj aj cha'joom , eh ruuk' i loq'laj rukik'eel xuchihkaaj xuyeew rajaawriik i ak' k'uhb'aal ruyejaam cho wach i Dios .

Xa re' la' , cha chop taq ak'ux chi k'acharik je' rukab' i ruq'or i ru ak' k'uhb'aal i Jesucristo . Atoob' ta neekinooj atoob' ta ma' nee kinooj taq cha wilariik , re' hin xa nwaaj wo' b'iram taq awib'iral chi k'ahchi' taq aye'em ak'ux chi wihik pan jinaj wach k'uxliis , eh chi k'ahchi' taq ko'leem riij i nimanik , i ruk'am chaloq i ak' k'uhb'aal .
Eh re' Dios xruksaj wo' chik chaloq i QaJaaw Jesucristo , je' wo' chik re' na' qoh ruksaj chaloq i Dios i hoj chi k'achlik qawach ruuk' i runimaal rajaawriik .
Je' re' noq re' hin i nuq'or aweh chi kamanoq aweh akooch xuyeew i Dios noq xnuyeew i nuq'ab' cha naah reh apa'ab'jiik ,

Re' taqe kamnaq xq'orarik wo' naq cho keh i ruk'uhb'aal i Dios , reh chi xkian naq i k'acharik panuxlab'al je' rukab' iraaj i Dios , atoob' ta xuyeew wo' naq riib' chi xq'atarik i q'orik chikinaah , noq ko k'achalkeeb' , je' rukab' noq inq'atarik i q'orik chinaah i tinamit .
Chanab'eej taq chi re' Dios k'ih taq xatruloq' wii' . Ruum aj re' , maayeew taq chik q'ab' keh i tokoom chi nee wo' chik taq tikimin chub'anariik i mahk .
Eh maa ch'olej taq i Dios , je' rukab' i xkian chaloq i ju'jun chi kixilak i keh xkian i ch'olinik . Ruum i re' , xutaq'aaj chaloq jinaj i ruánjel i Dios , xi k'ulik kanteesjoq .

Re' hoj ma' yak tan qa a'n chinaah i ruk'uhb'aal i Dios je' rukab' inki a'n i tokoom . Re' la' Dios inilwik qeh chi korik ruq'orariik inqa a'n i ruk'uhb'aal , ruum re' wo' reh xpaab'anik qeh chub'aan , eh k'ahchi' qaq'orom i korik parub'ihnaal i Jesucristo .
Re' hoj i kow chik qak'ux panqanimaniik , inchol qakuyum kimahk i komajaa' kow kik'ux pan kinimaniik . Ma' ruk'ul taj chi xa re' neenqa a'n aha' wilik imponik chi qawach i hoj .
Inko'q i QaJaaw naa wo' wojiik i hin chi jumehq'iil taq cha wilariik .

Chi riij taqe re' , xwilow chik inche kiwach kijib' chi ánjel , ju'jun i pa'alkeeb' pantaq rutz'u'kaal i wach ak'al . Eh re' keh xkiq'il peet i kijib' chi teew , reh chi ma' xihupinik ta chinaah i wach ak'al , ni xata nah palaw , ni xata chikinaah taqe chee' k'ahaam .

Re' taq i hat xa a'n taq chaaweh i inki a'n i ma' kinimanik ta ree Dios . Eh xa re' naq i ma' tob'laj tuskil inawootwaaj . Xa chib'ih chik jariik i yiib' wach xuk'ax taq cho wach ati'jolal : Xa chayeew taq chik i xohk'rik i na a'n , je' wo' ninq'ijinik , xaloq'ej wo' taq i tiyoox .
Re' ki'ib' re' re' naa reliik chee xaq q'aaq' pan kichii' k'atb'al keh chi jumpech awach naq i na kaajwaam rub'anariik ti' k'axik keh . Je' re' i kimik naakik'ulum awach i naa rujot'wiik keh .

Re' Pablo je' wili i xuq'or : Hat taq was nuchaaq' , cha kuy taq numahk . Re' hin ma' weht'al taj chi re' reh i kajaaw i k'amal kib'eeh aj tiij , ruum pan santo laj huuj i ruq'or chi je' wili : Maab'aj i wilik chi ajaab'esil chinaah aatinamiit , inki .

Eh re' taqe i je' kikab' i tz'i' ma' naa ta kik'ulariik cho ar , je' wo' taqe aj war , taqe k'acharik inki a'n pan k'oyomal , taqe kansan kas kichaaq' , taqe i kiloq'inik tiyoox , taqe i chukul q'orik , taqe i jot'ool .

Xa re' la' , ko wilik i ma' imponik ta chi nuwach i na a'n : Re' chi kokiib' ixib' chik i wilkeeb' awuuk' ar ma' inkikanaa' ta runimjiik i ruk'uhb'aal i Balaam . Re' xtaqchi'inik cho reh i Balac , chi xkiq'eb' kiib' pamahk taqe aj Israel , noq xiye'arik chuk'uxariik i xa chib'ih jariik mayijimaj chikiwach i tiyoox , eh xuyeew wo' q'ab' keh chi xi k'acharik pan k'oyomal .

Hat taq qahermano , chanab'eej taq chi eliik inqat'iosej ree Dios i k'ahchi' taq kaat i ruk'ul chi nqat'iosej ree Dios , ruum k'ahchi' taq areqem chi riij chi korik i nimanik , je' wo' ruk'axariik taq awiib' chawach k'ahchi' wo' taq areqem chi riij chi korik .
Re' taq i hat aweht'al taq noq komajaa' naq taq hat cho aj nimaneel , xa pamemil naq taq timinarik chi kilooq'jiik taqe i tiyoox ma' kiq'orik taj .
Je' wo' re' taq i cha a'n i hat b'ahiilb'ees cha k'ax taq awehk'een je' rukab' i xub'an i Jesucristo xuk'ax taqe aj nimaneel , eh xuyeew riib' chi kimik chikiij .
Eh wila' awach xb'anik ti' k'axik taq aweh , maaq'aj taq wach reh . Chayeew la' taq ak'ux chuk'uhtjiik i holohik laj na'ojb'al chikiwach chu'nchel taq aawas achaaq' .
Je' re' noq , chaloch' taq awiib' ri'si rooq ri'si q'ab' i Dios nim rajaawriik , reh chi nee taq i ruyeew runimaal awach na' chureq ruq'ijil .

re' Dios ma' jank'al ta wo' naq i rukanaa' ruk'uhtjiik i rajaawriik . Ruuk' i rotob'il i rub'an , re' reh i ruyeew taq chaaweh i jab' , eh i ruyeew cho wach chi korik taq atik , eh i ruyeew wo' taq chaaweh awa' ahaa' , reh chi ma' xta taq ruti'kiil ak'ux , inki taqe i ki'ib' chi aj tahqaneel .
Je' wo' taqe i hermana ixoq , xa kiloch'ik-oq . Mo'-oq tz'aqal wach k'utaaj taqe . Holohik-oq i kik'achariik , eh korik-oq wach kik'ux ruuk' chu'nchel .
Re' hin najt xwuy-eej reh chi neeruyot' i ruk'ux ixoq re' re' . Xanaah re' , ma' raaj ta rub'anam , ma' rukanaa' taj i k'oyomal .

Eh re' i Herodes kaqrinaq kuuk' taqe aj Tiro , i aj Sidón . Eh re' keh xi chalik pankomonil chuq'orob'jiik i reey Herodes , xkich'ub'isaj wach ruk'ux i Blasto , jinaj winaq nim wach rukamaj to'ool ree reey . Eh re' reh xq'orik i koq chikiij chuwach i Herodes , reh chi nee wo' chik inkik'am kiib' pansuqkiil k'uxliis . Ruum paruyuq'ul i reey re' re' inchalik i k'uxumb'al keh .
Re' Jesús je' wili i xuq'or keh : Re' hin ma' xta jino'q ma' tob'laj uxlab'al wuuk' . Re' la' waJaaw k'ahchi' nuye'em ruloq'il , eh re' taq i hat ma' nayeew ta taq nuloq'il i hin .
Noq ik'ik chik inki a'n chinaah i palaw , yohb'aal wach i rub'ohl i xwuktik ruum i kowlaj teew .
Re' hin i nuq'or panuk'ux chi re' taqe ti' k'axik k'ahchi' qak'ulum pan qak'achariik yu'naak xama' xta tz'aaq , ruum ma' jaruuj neeruq'at wach i ruloq'il i Dios naa qak'ulum na' chub'an .
Hat taq kok' ak'uunb'ees ixq'uunb'ees inutz'ihb'aaj taq reje aweh i wili , ruum re' Dios xukuy taq chik amahk parub'ihnaal i Jesucristo .

Re' reh xko'linik qeh , eh xusik' cho qawach reh i santohiil , ma' ruum ta chi chib'ih ta jariik i holohik laj qa'nam , xa ruum la' chi je' re' i xuyejaa' cho wach , eh xa ruum chi xoj ruk'ax . Re' Dios xanoq wo' xojruk'ax parub'ihnaal i Jesucristo noq komajaa' i rutz'uhkrisaj chaloq i wach ak'al .

Eh noq xkilow wach i Jesús taqe i kajaaw k'amal kib'eeh aj tiij , taqe i kicha'jinik reh i rupaat i Dios , je' wili i xkiq'or : Chakoj wach kuruus , Chakoj wach kuruus inki taqe . Re' Pilato je' wili i xuq'or : Chak'am taq reje , chayeew taq wach kuruus i hat , ruum re' hin ma' xta ru mahk xnureq , inki .

Re' ko'lb'al iib' wili kisik'im wo' cho chi riij , eh kipech'um wo' chaloq pampeet i jalal ruq'oral i Dios . Eh xkiq'or wo' cho rukorkiil chi ruuk' i runimaal i rotob'il i Dios xuyeew i ko'lb'al taq aweh i hat .

Yu'naak ma' k'isiin chik i aj jot'ool wilkeeb' sut i wach ak'al . Re' keh ma' nkinimaj taj chi re' i Jesucristo xk'ulik ayu' wach ak'al chi ruwii' winaq . Eh awach inq'orik reh chi je' re' , xa aj jot'ool , eh i rukoj riib' chi re' reh i Cristo .

Re' hoj xqareq chi riij chi re' winaq wili xiik' naah yib'kiil wach runa'ojb'al , xa aha' yuuq' k'ahchi' ruyojom qak'ux i hoj , hoj aj judío , k'amal wo' b'eeh reh jinaj tokoom chik nimanik , re' inkinimaj i aj Nazaret .

Eh xti , xiik' naah nimaal wach i ma' eht'alimaj ta naq chi riij i korik , je' wili noq wilik : Re' Jesucristo xk'ulik wach ak'al , chi ruwii' winaq . Xuq'or i Santolaj Uxlab'al chi korik wach ruk'ux . Eh x-ilarik wach kuum i ánjel . Xq'orarik rib'iral keh i ma' re' ta taqe aj Judío wilik i xinimanik reh sut i wach ak'al . Eh xk'amarik wo' chik johtoq pan taxaaj ruuk' i ruloq'il .

Eh xiq'ehb'ik chik inche cho pan taxaaj i nimaq taq saqb'och , xk'ulik qohoq chikinaah i tinamit wach ak'al . Re' ju'jun chi saqb'och je' naa ju'jun kintaal rahliil . Re' taqe tinamit ma' k'isiin ta noq xkib'aj i Dios chi riij i runimaal ti' xb'aan keh ruum i saqb'och .
Eh re' hoj , jinaj i ak' taxaaj , eh jinaj i ak' wach ak'al k'ahchi' quy-eem , re' ruq'orom cho rib'iral i Dios chi naa ruye'em qeh , re' taqe i naa ruwihiik wii' i korik , i otob'il .
Re' taxaaj xsahchik wach , xa je' chik imb'otarik wach huuj xb'aan . Eh chu'nchel nimaq taq yuuq' , je' wo' taqe mohloom yuuq' sutim ha' riij , xi ehteesjik reje pan kiye'aab' .
Re' Dios xojrukanaa' chi ma' xta chik qamahk , ruum re' Jesucristo xub'an iraaj i Dios , xuyeew i ruti'jolal pankimik chi jilow mayiij , eh xa junriim xuyeew riib' chi mayiij reh juneliik .
Re' hoj eliik k'ahchi'kooj chut'iosjiik ree Dios taq chawiij chawunchelaal . Eh tik'ulik taq reje panqak'ux noq inqa a'n qatiij .

Eh noq xintz'ehtanik , jinaj chik i kawáyu xelik chaloq , kaq riij , re' iqlik chi riij xye'arik jinaj ruch'ihch' k'ul q'as . Xye'arik rajaawriik chi rehtesjiik i rusuqkiil kik'ux i tinamit wach ak'al , reh chi k'ul naa kikansam kiib' chikiwach .
Re' taqe i aj nimaneel k'ayimaj pankowlaj kamanik , inchol ruponiik panaq'kiwach i kipatroon , reh chi ma' nee ta nq'orarik chi re' chi ma' re' i rub'ihnaal i Dios , i k'uhb'aal k'ahchi' qaq'orom .
Eh maa chuk taq i q'orik chawach , ruum awisam taq chik iloq panawánima anajtir na'ojb'al , je' wo' chu'nchel i yiib' wach i na a'n naq taq chaloq .

Xa re' la' jinaj i ma' toob' taj i na a'n re' chi ma' naq'il taj ixoq , Jezabel i b'ih , i rukoj riib' chi q'orol ruk'uhb'aal i Dios . Eh i ruk'uhtaaj i yiib' wach na'ojb'al i keh i numoso , rumin taqe pan k'oyomal , i rumin taqe chuk'uxariik i xa chib'ih tib'kaal mayijimaj chikiwach i tiyoox .

Eh pan santo laj huuj i ruq'or chi re' Dios naa ruko'leem taqe i ma' re' ta taqe aj judío naakiye'em kik'ux chunimjiik i Jesucristo . Re' Dios ruq'orom wo' cho reh i Abraham chi riij i ak' k'uhb'aal chi je' wili : Panab'ihnaal i hat , naa nuye'em i wotob'il chikinaah chu'nchel i tinamit wach ak'al , inki reh .

¿ Mi xsahchik tii lanik taq panak'ux re' aak'uhb'aaljiik rub'anam chaloq i Dios i hat taq chik rukojom chi rak'uun rixq'uun ? Pan santo laj huuj je' wili ruq'or : Hat wak'uun noq wilkaat maawixowaaj aak'uhb'aaljiik i rub'an i QaJaaw , eh maayoj ak'ux wila' kow xat ruq'il ,

Tinimanoq taq chikiwach i kik'amwik taq ab'eeh . Eh cha a'n taq i neenkiq'or taq aweh , ruum re' keh ma' kihi'lik ta taq chak'uhb'aljiik , ruum keht'al chi naakiq'asam ponoq chuwach i Dios . Chachop taq ak'ux chi kitoob'jiik , reh chi neensuuqb'ik kik'ux chub'aan . Ruum re' kikamaj neentoob'inik taq aweh .
Eh noq wilkeeb' chik Canaán , re' Dios xusach kiwach i wuquub' seht chi tinamit . Re' naq i kak'aal taqe tinamit re' re' , keh chik i qamaam qati't xuyeew .
Wila' awach jino'q i tokoom laj tijinik i ruk'uhtaaj , mo'-oq eliik wach ruuk' i korik laj tijinik inchalik ruuk' i QaJaaw Jesucristo , eh mo'-oq je' rukab' i ruk'uhtaaj qeh i korik laj nimanik .
Wila' xooj k'oloq jino'q i ma' re' ta ruk'uhb'aal i Jesucristo nee ruq'or taq aweh , maak'ul taq cho panapaat . Eh ni xata nee taq i nayeew rusuqkiil ruk'ux ,

Ruum wi re' hoj xiik' naah i ti' k'axik k'ahchi' qak'ulum yu'naak , je' rukab' i ti' k'axik ruk'ulum chaloq i Jesucristo , je' wo' chik re' noq k'ahchi' qak'ulum jinaj runimaal rusuqkiil qak'ux parub'ihnaal i QaJaaw Jesucristo .

Re' taqe re' , q'e' ti' i naakik'ulum ruum xkitijej keh i xub'an i Caín . Xkiq'eb' kiib' , je' rukab' i xub'an i Balaam . Eh xkiq'etwachej kiib' chuwach i Dios je' rukab' i xub'an i Coré . Ruum aj re' nik' wach i kimik xuk'ul i reh je' wo' chik re' i naakik'ulum i keh .

Eh re' taqe i jot'ool re' re' xama' tiklik ta kiq'orik chi riij i xa chib'ih jariik atoob' ta ma' nkireq chi riij . Re' keh xa re' i keht'al cho chi kaasb'al inki a'n ma' xta kina'ojb'al , xa je' kik'acharik chikop , panti' k'axik k'ahchi' kik'amariik ruum .

Eh re' Noé ruum chi xnimanik , xunimaj noq xq'orarik reh ruum i Dios chi chalik reh i ti' k'axik , atoob' ta komajaa' wo' naq ink'ularik . Eh xuyejaa' i kanowa paat ko'lb'al riib' i reh , ruch'ihil taqe i awach reh parupaat . Ruum chi xuyeew ruk'ux , xuyeew taqe panti' k'axik i tinamit , eh xureq rukorkiil wach ruk'ux inkan ruuk' i nimanik .

Chu'nchel-oq chik korjinaq wach aha' naa kianam wii' rulooq'jiik i Dios . Eh re' taqe k'amal b'eeh aj tiij eqal eqal kiokik chub'aan i kikamaj reerulooq'jiiki Dios chupaam i peet tasb'al paam i paat itz'ihy naah .

Re' i Esteban je' wili i xuq'or keh i q'atal q'orik : Re' taq i hat , q'e' taq kow aanaah ma' ti' ib'irinik ta taq re' taq awánima je' rukab' i kánima i ma' kinimanik ta reh i k'achlik Dios . Eh xama' namay ta wo' taq rixowjiik wach i Santolaj Uxlab'al Eliik taq wach kuuk' chaloq aamaam awati't

Eh chanab'eej taq chi re' k'uhb'aal ma' xye'arik taj chi ye'b'al keh panti' k'axik i korik wach kik'ux . Xye'arik la' chi ye'b'al keh panti' k'axik ma' nkinimaj taj i korik , taqe i yiib' wach kina'ojb'al , taqe i aj mahk , taqe i ma' imponik ta panaq'kiwach i Dios , taqe kansan kituut kajaaw , taqe i kansan kas kichaaq' .
Chupaam i nuhuuj xnutz'ihb'aaj pampeet , xnuq'or taq reje aweh chi maa a'n taq jinaj wach ak'ux kuuk' i kib'anik reh i k'oyomal .
Eh re' Dios xanoq wo' rusik'im cho nuwach noq komajaa' kin-aasjik . Eh noq xponik i q'iij chuwach i reh , ruum i rotob'il xirupab'aa' chi hin raj kamanoom .
Re' hin ma' nureq ta naq chi riij chib'ih jariik i nub'an , ruum ma' re' ta chik inche nub'an aha' naq wilik inwaaj rub'aan , aha' wilik inwixowaaj naq wach , re' chik inche re' i nub'an chaloq .

Eh k'ahchi'-oq taq areqem chi riij chi korik runimjiik i QaJaaw Jesucristo , re' i qaj Ko'loom . Eh reh reh-oq wo' taq areqem i ruk'axb'al chi manlik . Re' ta naq i reh neenye'arik ruloq'il yu'naak , eh je' chi juneliik . Je' ta wo' naq re' .

Re' hoj ma' xta qana'ojb'al noq inkiq'or i tinamit ruum i runimjiik i Jesucristo . Eh re' taq i hat , inkiq'or taq chi wilik taq ana'ojb'al . Re' hoj , ma' xta rukowiil qak'ux noq inkiq'or , re' taq i hat , kow taq ak'ux noq inkiq'or . Re' hoj , inkixow qa wach , re' taq i hat , nkiyeew taq aloq'il .
Chakuy taq ransil i pajarik . Kow-oq taq ak'ux chunimjiik i Dios , ruum aweht'al taq i hat chi je' wo' re' i ti' k'axik k'ahchi' kik'ulum taqe awuch hermano wilkeeb' sut i wach ak'al .

Je' wo' taq i hat kamanoom , cha nimaj taq apatroon ayu' wach ak'al . Mo'q xa re' taq neena a'n i kikamaj noq k'ahchi' taq kaat kicha'jeem xa re' taq inawaaj chi suq kik'ux taq awuuk' , tinimanoq la' taq chikiwach chu'nchel taq ak'ux . Chi je' re' , nee taq inak'uhtaaj chi nayohleej taq i QaJaaw Dios .
Eh re' lajeeb' chi uk'aa' xawil kiwach kijalwaach i lajeeb' chi reey i komajaa' kiokik chi taaq'anik na' kik'ul i kajaawriik chi reyil kuch'ihil i josq'laj chikop , xa je' jinaj ora nakianam .

Eh re' hoj , ma' re' taj i uxlab'al xa reh ayu' wach ak'al xqak'ul pan qánima . Re' la' i Santolaj Ruxlab'al i Dios xuyeew qeh xqak'ul pan qánima , reh chi neenqareq chi riij taqe i runa'ojb'al i Dios xuyeew qeh chi naab'jik .
Re' taq i hat kaq b'ehoom , chab'iraj taq : Tioq'oq taq , eh ponoq taq ruti'kiil panak'ux i ti' k'axik naa ruchaliik taq cha naah

Re' hat maayohb'isaj awiib' ruuk' i ti' k'axik naa ak'ulum , ruum wilik taqe akomoon naakikojariik pantz'ilom ruum i aj Yahm , xa pajb'al taq aweh . Eh naa taq ak'ulum jarub'-oq q'iij i ti' k'axik re' re' . Xa re' la' korik-oq wach ak'ux korehtaal akimiik re' hin naa nuye'em aweh aakorona reh i juneliik k'acharik .
Eh re' hat Timoteo , i tinimanik ree Dios , maa a'n aweh taqe re' . Tik'acharoq la' parukorkiil chaloq'ej i Dios tinimanoq cha a'n i k'axooj cha a'n i kuyuuj , xa ch'ub'ik-oq wach awánima .
Ayu' wach ak'al xach'ikaa' taq ak'ux , xayeew taq reh ati'jolal i xak'ax taq wach . Eh xaq'inab'isaj taq awiib' je' rukab' noq inq'inab'ik i wakax noq inkanteesjik , je' re' taq i naa ak'ulum i hat .

Chi junsuut i loq'laj ye'aab' re' re' xwil wo' kiwach i kijib' ru ka'winaq chi tzunaab' . Eh ar tzunulkeeb' i kijib' ru ka'winaq chi nimaq kiwach winaq . Re' keh saq saq i kiso' , eh wilik kikoróna wach kinaah re' ruuk' i oro .

Chayeew taq pa runimaal ti' k'axik , chatib'isaj taq ruk'ux je' rukab' noq xunimb'isaj riib' i reh ruuk' i rub'ehomal . Re' reh je' wili ruq'or : Re' hin ayu' wilkiin pan nuye'aab' chi taaq'anik . Ma' hin ta kahnel ixoq , ma' xta ti' naawilom wach , inki .

Eh je' wo' taq i hat b'ahiilb'ees , holohik-oq taq ana'ojb'al kuuk' awehk'een . Eh chayeew taq kiloq'il je' rukab' i ruk'ul chi keh , ruum xa k'isiin inkaaj chi tz'ajik , eh ruum chi re' i Dios ruq'orom chaloq chi naa wo' kehtriik i keh i k'acharik ruye'em taq chaaweh i hat . Je' taq re' i cha a'n , reh chi ma' xta neenq'ilwik reh taq aatiij .
Re' hin ma' nuyeew ta q'ab' reh ixoq chi neerub'an i k'uhb'alinik chikiwach i tinamit , eh ni xata neenjohtik naah chinaah i winaq . Inwaaj chi ma' xta choqik neerub'an ixoq .
Re' Dios i rub'an aha' wilik taqe ruq'or . Eh re' wo' reh xsik'wik taq awach chi xat okik taq pan jinaj wach k'uxliis ruuk' i Rak'uun , re' i QaJaaw Jesucristo .

Re' taq i hat hermano , xat ruyuq'eej taq i Dios , reh chi xresaj taq cha naah i kowlaj taaq'anik i rub'an i najtir k'uhb'aal . Xa re' la' maa koj taq awehteesjiik chaloq reh i rub'anariik iraaj ma' raaj b'anarik , kamanoq la' taq aweh chi k'axb'al taq awiib' chawach ,
Re' taq i hat parub'ehel taq tiq'oroq , eh re' taq i holohik cha a'n je'-oq taq akab' i naa ruq'atariik i q'orik chikinaah ruum i ak' k'uhb'aal , ineesanik cho qeh pamahk ,
Korik chi xa reh reh wach i kamanik imb'aan xa re' la' re' QaJaaw Jesucristo xa jinaj wo' hoq .

Re' keh re' wo' naq ruuk' taqe i peet cho aj nimaneel . Eh chi kixilak i keh xelik chaloq i Jesucristo xk'ulik aasjoq . Eh re' reh wilik rajaawriik chinaah chu'nchel i chib'ih jariik wilik , ruum re' reh i Dios . Re' ta naq i reh neenye'arik ruloq'il chi juneliik . Je' ta wo' naq re' .

Wila' re' hoj k'ahchi' qak'ulum i ti' k'axik , ruuk' i re' naa taq areqem rusuqkiil ak'ux i hat ruch'ihil i ko'lemb'al taq awiib' . Eh wila' re' hoj i ruyeew rusuqkiil qak'ux i Dios , naa wo' ruwihiik rusuqkiil taq ak'ux i hat . Chi je' re' nee taq i na a'n rukuyariik taqe ti' k'axik je' rukab' k'ahchi' qak'ulum i hoj yu'naak .
Eh re' Dios inye'wik rukowiil qak'ux i hoj , je' wo' taq i hat , chunimjiik i Jesucristo . Eh re' wo' Dios xpaab'anik qeh chub'aan i rukamaj wili .
Eh je' wo' chik wili i xq'orarik cho reh ruum i q'orik xrib'iraj : Aha' wilik i rutz'ajam chik wach i Dios , maa q'or chi ch'uwa' wach , i nuchjik .

Re' taqe reey wilkeeb' sut i wach ak'al , i je' pan k'oyomal xi wihik ruuk' i Babilonia , eh xkich'ikaa' kik'ux ruuk' i rub'ehomal , ma' k'isiin ta naa rutib'iik kik'ux naakoq'em wach na' kilow i rusib'eel noq naa ruk'ahtiik .
Re' Jesús je' wili xuq'or reh : Awach i kiruk'ax , i rumol paránima i nuk'uhb'aal . Re' re' naa ruk'axariik ruum i waJaaw , eh re' hin , re' i waJaaw naa qachaliik chi patinik paránima .

Je' wili noq wilik i qak'axariik xub'an i Dios : Ma' re' tee hoj xoj k'axwik reh chi peet . Re' la' reh xk'axwik qeh chi peet , ruum xutaq'aaj chaloq i Rak'uun , reh chi xuyeew riib' chi jilow mayiij reh chi xkuyarik chu'nchel i qamahk .

Raaj wila' k'acharik inqa a'n pan saqum je' rukab' i Dios Saqum noq wilik , eh k'ul wilkooj pan jinaj wach k'uxliis chi qawach , re' rukik'eel i Jesucristo , i Ak'uunb'ees Dios , intz'ajwik iloq reh chu'nchel i qamahk .
Re' hat yu'naak , ma' hat ta chik moso minooj pankowlaj kamanik hat la' chik rak'uun rixq'uun i Dios . Eh ruum i re' , naa awehtriik haa' i kooch ruq'orom cho rib'iral parub'ihnaal i Jesucristo .
Eh re' chik i xuq'or i Dios chi riij i Ak'uunb'ees je' wili : Re' runimaal awajaawriik i hat , hat Dios , juneliik naa awihiik chi taaq'anik . Eh parukorkiil na a'nam i taaq'anik re' re' .

Re' taqe i k'amal kib'eeh i aj judío je' wili i xkiq'or reh : Re' hoj ma' ruum taj i holohik laj na'ojb'al i na a'n tiqaaj kaat qakansam chi ab'aj , ruum la' chi naq'ehtaaj i Dios ruuk' taqe aq'oral . Xanaah re' , xa hat wo' winaq , eh inakoj inchaa wiib' chi Dios , inki taqe .

Re' rusib'eel i q'aaq' i naa kiwihiik wii' pa runimaal ti' k'axik intzub'ik johtoq chi juneliik . Eh re' taqe kiloq'inik reh i peet josq'laj chikop ruch'ihil i rujalwaach oon xkiyeew q'ab' chi xkojarik keh i rehtalil , ma' naa ta kihi'liik chuk'ulariik i ti' k'axik chi q'iij chi aq'ab' naa kiwihiik ar , inki .
Re' hoj ma' jaruuj neenyoj qak'ux , ruum re' Dios xa ruum chi xuketelaaj cho qawach , xuyeew chi qanaah i chi naa qaq'orom rib'iral i ak' k'uhb'aal .

Je' re' noq re' hoj nee chik inqaq'or chi chu'nchel qak'ux chi je' wili : Re' hin re' QaJaaw Dios intoob'inik weh , ruum aj re' ma' kinyo'jik ta ruum chib'ih jariik i neerub'an weh i xa winaq , qoh ko'q .

Awach i xa chu'nchel i k'uxb'al wi'k ruk'ux , ma' ruk'ul ta chi neenkixowaaj wach i tokoom . Eh awach i xak'utlik wach i rik'ux , ma' ruk'ul ta chi neeruch'olej i xa chu'nchel rik'ux , ruum re' Dios xukoj wo' taqe chi rak'uun rixq'uun i kik'uxwik reh taqe re' .

Eh re' Dios , re' inye'wik reh i kowiil k'uxliis , rusuqkiil k'uxliis , toob'inoq taq chaaweh , reh chi k'ul taq nee ti k'acharik pan jinaj wach k'uxliis , je' rukab' i xk'ulik ruk'uhtaaj i Jesucristo ,

Re' Jesucristo reh , xa junriim xuq'asaj riib' chi jilow mayiij chi riij i qamahk , ma' xub'an ta reh je' rukab' i xkian taqe kajaaw i k'amal kib'eeh aj tiij junch'uq . Re' keh eqal eqal inkikansaj i k'atoj chikop chi kimayiij . Peet inkiq'asaj chi riij kimahk i keh . Eh rukab' inkiq'asaj i mayiij i chi riij kimahk tinamit .
Eh awach i wilik rub'ehomal ayu' wach ak'al , eh i rilow chi ma' xta wilik reh i ras ruchaaq' , eh mo'q i runej chib'ih i wilik reh , re' re' ma' xtaj i ruk'axb'al i Dios paránima .
Re' hoj ch'iklik qak'ux ruuk' i Dios inqaaj naq chi xojkimik ta lom , reh naq chi nee qoh-ooj patineel ruuk' i QaJaaw Jesucristo .
Hat taq loq'laj hermano i xa hat taq ik'al b'eeh chupaam i wach ak'al wili , i nupahqaaj taq otob'il aweh chi maa a'n taq chik aweh taqe i yiib' wach na'ojb'al , re' i min min taq chajot'ariik .
Eh ponoq taq panaq'awach chu'nchel i tinamit . Chak'ax taqe hermano chayohleej taq i Dios . Eh ponoq taq panaq'awach i reey .
Re' Moisés xukapaaj naq chi re' taqe aj Israel , i rutinamitaal , naa kireqem chi riij chi re' Dios xtaaq'anik reje reh kuuk' chi kiko'ljiik chuwach i ti' k'axik , re' keh ma' xkireq ta chi riij .
Chawik'raaj taq awiib' chikiwach i je' kikab' i tz'i' , re' i xiik' naah ch'uwa'iil wach i kina'ojb'al , i kiq'orik reh chi koruman chi naa rupoch'ariik naah i k'achab' .

Eh inkiq'or chi nkinimaj i Dios . Xanaah re' , ruuk' i kiyiib' wach na'ojb'al ink'utinik chi ma' korik ta keh inki a'n Re' keh aj ixowaal taqe , ruum xa ja'lik kichii' kiwach , ma' xtaj i holohik inki a'n
Re' hin i nuq'or i korik chi re' keh q'e' wo' naq inkaaj rub'anariik iraaj i Dios . Xa re' la' , xama' nkireq ta wo' chi riij nik' wach rub'anariik .

Re' wo' reh inye'wik rusuqkiil qak'ux chupaam chu'nchel i ti' k'axik inqak'ul . Eh nik' wach noq i ruyeew rusuqkiil qak'ux i Dios i hoj , je' wo' chik re' noq neenqayeew rusuqkiil kik'ux hoj taqe i k'ahchi' kik'ulum i ti' k'axik ruuk' i suq kiil k'uxliis i ruyeew qeh i Dios i hoj .
Eh xti cha chop ak'ux chi korik chi neenak'uhtaaj chuwach i Dios chi hat atoob'laj raj kamanoom , eh mo'-oq chih k'isinoq neetik'ixik wii' . Chach'ob' la' rub'ehel chi manlik i korik laj k'uhb'aal .

Eh re' i aj ixowaal re' re' inixowanik kiwach i kiq'orik rib'iral i ruk'uhb'aal i Dios i ruk'ul chi looq'jiik , imponik rutzunaa' riib' chupaam i rupaat i Dios , je' tii chik i Dios i rub'an riib' ar .
Eh re' taq i hat tuutb'ees ajaab'ees , maa kaqrisaj taq awak'uun awixq'uun chi ma' xta rub'ehel . Chak'isaj la' taq parukorkiil chak'uhb'alej taqe parub'ihnaal i QaJaaw Jesucristo .
Eh ruuk' chu'nchel i ti' k'axik inqak'ul re' re' , ma' k'axik ta noq qoh ik'ik chupaam , eh qoh elik korik , ruum qohrutoob'eej i Jesucristo , ixk'axwik qeh .

Chi qunchelaal xoj q'ehb'ik wach ak'al . Eh jinaj i q'orik xb'iraj , je' wili i xuq'or cho weh pan hebreo : Saulo , Saulo ¿ chib'ih reet noq inawixowaaj nuwach ? Xa re' hat k'ahchi' aye'em awiib' chi ti' , je' rukab' i rub'an i b'ooyax i ruyeq' i toq'b'al reh , inki weh .

Weht'al chib'ih taqe i na a'n , je' wo' i neb'a'il k'ahchi' awik'iik wii' . Xa re' la' hat wo' b'ehoom ruuk' i rotob'il i Dios . Weht'al wo' chi nkitz'aq wach i q'orik chawiij taqe inkikoj kiib chi aj Judío , eh ma' re' ta wo' taqe xa junch'uq chi raj kamaj i aj Yahm taqe .
Re' wilik k'axooj ruuk' , ma' insuuqb'ik ta ruk'ux noq imb'aan i ma' ruk'ul ta chi b'anarik , insuuqb'ik la' ruk'ux noq imb'aan i korik .

Je' re' noq , chaq'eb' taq chi riij ak'ux chu'nchel i ch'uwa' wach chi b'anarik , je' wo' hoq i yiib' wach na'ojb'al , imb'aan wach ak'al . Eh chak'ulaa' taq ruuk' chaq'lamiil i ruq'or i k'uhb'aal ye'ooj taq panawánima , re' inko'linik taq aweh .
Re' i ak' k'uhb'aal re' hin ximponik ch'ikanoq reh taq awuuk' je' intikarik tik xnub'an . Eh re' Apolos je' naa kojooj ruha'iil xub'an . Eh re' ixk'isanik reh re' i QaJaaw Dios .

Eh tiklik wo' chik cho chi riij i rukab' ánjel , je' wili xuq'or : Xuq'eb' chik riib' xuq'eb' chik riib' panti' k'axik i nimlaj tinamit Babilonia , ruum xuyoj i kina'ojb'al i nimaq taq tinamit ruuk' i k'oyomal xutijej taqe wii' . Ruum i xub'an re' re' , je' naa xuxohk'risaj taqe ruuk' k'ahlaj ha' , inki .
Re' taq i hat , nee taq ti kahnik chi hat taq wamigo , wila' xa a'n taq i nuq'or taq aweh i hin .
Hat taq kok' wak'uun wixq'uun noq wilkaat , maayeew taq chik kajaawriik i xatz'aqoj tiyoox . Je' ta wo' naq re' .
Ruum re' taqe re' xa kiooj chi' taq paat chi kijot'ariik taqe meem laj ixoq , i xiik' naah i kimahk , i kiq'eb'em kiib' chub'anariik i xa chib'ih jariik i ruk'ax wach i kiti'jolal .

Re' la' i korik naa qaq'orom ruuk' k'axooj keh i qas qachaaq' . Eh k'ahchi'-oq qareqem rukorkiil wach qak'ux je' rukab' i rukorkiil wach ruk'ux i Jesucristo , re' i k'amal qab'eeh i hoj , hoj raj nimaneel .
Chachop taq ak'ux chi wihik pan jinaj wach k'uxliis , chi wihik pansuqkiil k'uxliis ruuk' taq atoob'jiik i rub'an i Santolaj Uxlab'al .

Eh re' Saulo je' wili i xuq'or : Jaaw , ¿ awach i hat ? inki . Je' wili i xq'orarik reh : Re' hin i Jesús i k'ahchi' awixowaam nuwach . Xa re' hat k'ahchi' aye'em awiib' chi ti' k'axik , je' rukab' i rub'an i b'ooyax , noq i ruyehq' i ju' i toq'b'al reh , inki .

Chaloq'ej la' taq chi aaWaJaaw i Jesucristo panawánima . Eh xa eliik-oq ayejaam taq awiib' chi kichaq'weesjiik chu'nchel i neenkipahqaaj kina'ojb'al taq aweh chi riij i ch'iklik taq reje wii' ak'ux i hat .
Eh je' wili i xq'orarik cho reh ruum i QaJaaw Dios : Maa jil chaa wii' chawisaj peet axijab' cha wooq , ruum re' ye'aab' pa'alkaat wii' santo laj ye'aab' .

Ruum aj re' , re' taq i hat , inchol taq amolom panawánima i k'uhb'aal ab'iram taq cho pampeet . Wila' xamol taq panawánima i k'uhb'aal re' re' , nee taq ti wihik ruuk' i Ak'uunb'ees , je' wo' ruuk' i Ajaab'ees Dios .
Re' hin xti korik taq i nuq'or aweh chi awach i runimaj i nuq'oral , ma' jaruuj naa rukimiik , inki .
Eh jinaj chik i nimlaj ye'aab' xiik' naah saqiil xwilow wach , eh jinaj i tzunlik chupaam . Chuwach i tzunlik ar xsahchik wach i taxaaj je' i wach ak'al ma' x-ilarik ta chik kiwach chi jumpech .

Eh wilik wo' kiq'orik reh chi re' qawa' qahaa' reh i qapaam , eh re' qapaam ye'aab' qawa' qahaa' , inki taqe . Korik chi je' re' xa re' la' re' re' naa rusacham wach i Dios kab'chel . Eh ma' korik taj chi re' qati'jolal b'anb'al k'oyomal , ruum re' qati'jolal reh i QaJaaw Jesucristo naa rukamaniik , eh naa rukamaniik i QaJaaw reh i qati'jolal .
Eh re' taq i hat chanab'eej taq chi hat taq chik kamnaq chuwach i mahk . Eh re' taq aak'achariik ye'b'al chik ruloq'il i Dios , reh chi naa taq awihiik pan jinaj wach k'uxliis ruuk' i Jesucristo .

Re' hin nut'iosej ree Dios , ruum re' reh ink'amwik qab'eeh , reh chi eliik qoh elik korik parub'ihnaal i Jesucristo . Eh re' chik i hoj k'ahchi' qaye'wiik chi naab'jik i ruk'uhb'aal , xa aha' yuuq' je' rukab' noq i nelik reje ruxlaab' ink'ohnik laj iq'oom
Re' wili i k'uhb'aal xuk'uhtaaj qeh i Jesucristo , eh re' wo' re' inqaq'or rib'iral taq aweh i hat : Chi re' Dios i Saqum , eh ruuk' i reh ma' xta k'isinoq i q'equm .
Chu'nchel i ruye'em weh i waJaaw kichalik wuuk' . Eh awach i kichalik wuuk' , ma' jaruuj taqe neenukaaj reje wulu' .
Je' re' noq maakanaa' taq chik i korik laj k'axooj chawach .

Ruum i re' , neerub'an kiko'ljiik chi jumpech awach taqe i k'ahchi' kisik'im i Dios parub'ihnaal i reh . Re' reh neerub'an rupahqaljiik i koq i rotob'il i Dios chikiij taqe aj nimaneel , ruum wilik ruk'achariik chi juneliik .

Eh re' keh kow xkiq'or chi je' wili : Chakansaj la' . Chakoj wach kuruus inki taqe . Re' Pilato je' wili i xuq'or keh : ¿ Mi ruk'ul taq cha weh re' chi neenukoj wach kuruus taq aareey ? inki . Re' keh je' wili i xkiq'or : Re' hoj ma' xta chik jino'q qareey tokoom , xa re' wo' hoq ajaab'ees aj Roma inki taqe .
Je' wo' re' yu'naak i re' Dios kokiib' ixib' chik i xukanaa' iloq , re' rusik'im cho kiwach chi kixilak i aj Israel ruuk' i rotob'il .
Re' taqe reey wilkeeb' sut i wach ak'al xkian k'oyomal ruuk' ixoq re' re' . Eh re' tinamit wach ak'al xkian wo' i k'oyomal ruuk' . Ruum i re' , je' naa xuxohk'risaj taqe ruuk' k'ahlaj ha' , inki .
Re' taq i hat inchol taq ak'axam awiib' chawach je'-oq taq jinaj atuut awajaaw . K'ul taq chawaaj awiib' , eh k'ul wo' taq chakoj awiib' chawach .
Chu'nchel i re' , re' i Santolaj Ruxlab'al i Dios ink'amwik kib'eeh eh manlik taqe rak'uun rixq'uun i Dios .

Jumehq'iil wo' chik xuk'uhtaaj cho riib' weh pan taxaaj jinaj sahchb'al k'uxliis : Jinaj i mama' kaq riij aaq' , wuquub' i naah , lajeeb' i ruk'aa' . Eh re' wuquub' chi nahis re' re' wilik ju'jun kikoróna .

Eh ruum chi hoj rak'uun rixq'uun i Dios , naa wo' qehtriik haa' i kooch ruq'orom cho rib'iral . Re' kooch re' re' , chi riij i Jesucristo naaqehtriik , wila' xti korik chi k'ahchi' qakuyum i ti' k'axik yu'naak je' rukab' i ruk'ulum chaloq i Jesucristo . Chi je' re' , naa wo' qehtriik i runimaal ruloq'il .

Re' taqe i to'ool inki a'n rukamaj i Dios chi korik , i ruk'ul chi neekik'axarik chi manlik . Eh xti ruk'ul wo' hoq chi je' re' neenb'aan keh i kiq'orik rib'iral i ruk'uhb'aal i Dios , eh inki a'n wo' i tijinik ,

Xa re' la' , ma' chu'nchel ta kieht'alinik reh chi re' taqe i tiyoox ma' xta kajaawriik . Wilik i okrinaq taqe chi kilooq'jiik . Eh noq inkik'ux i wi'k mayijimaj chikiwach i tiyoox , inkikapaaj chi rulooq'jiik inki a'n . Eh xanaah re' ruum chi ma' kow ta kik'ux inkikapaaj chi nkich'uwa'reej wach i kinimaniik .
Eh re' i je' q'ab' i ruche'el i uva ma' kiwachinik taj , re' reh naa ruyok'wiik iloq reh . Eh wila' kiwachinik , i ruyok' taqe iloq i chiqiij chi kixilak , re' raaj i reh chi kiwachiniik chi korik .
Eh maakoj wo' taq awiib' chi hat taq ehchan reh taqe i ye'ooj taq aweh chi ilarik cha k'uhtaaj la' taq keh i holohik laj na'ojb'al .

Hermano , re' hoj inqaaj chi nee taq inanab'eej chib'ih jariik imb'aan kuuk' kamnaq . Reh chi ma' nee ta taq intib'ik ak'ux chikiij je' rukab' inkik'ul i ma' re' ta taqe aj nimaneel ma' xta ch'iklik reje wii' kik'ux .

Re' taqe i aj Israel , xa ruum chi xinimanik xa je' panchiq ak'al ki-ik'ik noq xkiq'at wach chi kooq i kaq palaw . Eh re' taqe aj Egipto xkaaj wo' naq kiq'atam wach i kaq palaw i keh eh jihq'ik chik xponik kian ar .
Eh chupaam taqe q'iij re' re' , x-aasjik i Moisés chi ma' eht'alimaj , ma' k'isiin ta xk'axarik wach ruum i Dios . Eh xa ixib' poh xk'ihteesjik ruum i rutuut rajaaw .
Eh ruum chi reht'al reh i k'amal kib'eeh aj tiij nik' wach noq inchalik i k'isinal k'uxliis , ruketelaaj kiwach i xama' keht'al taj inki a'n je' wo' taqe i awach inkikanaa' runimjiik i Dios .

Eh chi qeh i hoj je' ach k'isiin ma' nsaq'ik , ach k'isiin ma' nqilow wach i saqum . Ruum aj re' qakanaa' rub'aan i yiib' wach na'ojb'al , re' i ruk'am chaloq i q'equm . Re' la' chik qa a'n i holohik laj na'ojb'al , i ruk'am chaloq i saqum . Qatiq'aa' taq qiib' chi korik .

Eh je' wo' taq i hat patroon , holohik-oq taq ana'ojb'al kuuk' amoso , je' rukab' noq kinimanik taq chawach i keh . Ma' xta chik ti' k'axik taq naa a'nam keh . Ruum xa jinaj i QaJaaw wilik cho pan taxaaj taq inanimaj kuuk' , re' reh ma' awach taj i tokoom rilariik i rub'an .
Suq-oq taq ak'ux haa' i hat kuuk' i suq kik'ux . Eh tioq'oq taq haa' i hat kuuk' i oq'ik inki a'n ruum i ruti'kiil kik'ux .

Xa re' la' re' hat inakowb'isaj anaah . Ma' nawaaj ta ayot'om ak'ux chi riij amahk , ruum aj re' , re' hat xa cha wib'il awiib' k'ahchi' amolom wach cha naah i ti' k'axik na' chureq ruq'ijil , noq naa rub'anam i q'ataj q'orik i Dios parub'ehel .

Eh chi riij taqe re' , wilik taqe i aj judío xi elik chaloq Antioquía , eh Iconio , xiooj k'oloq ar Listra . Xkitaqchi'ij i tinamit , eh pankomonil xkikutib'eej chi ab'aj i Pablo , pankik'ux i keh xkimik , xkiqerej reje ko chi riij i tinamit , ar xkikanaa' kahnoq .

Eh noq ruq'orom chik taqe re' i Jesús , xchalik ruti'kiil i ránima , eh xti xuq'or i korik keh i raj tahqaneel chi je' wili : Re' hin xti korik taq i nuq'or aweh chi jinaj taq i wilik chaxilak i hat naa ruk'ayiniik weh chi ma' eht'alimaj .
Eh pan santo laj huuj i ruq'or chi chu'nchel wilkeeb' chi ri'sil i rajaawriik i mahk , reh chi awach neekinimanik reh i Jesucristo , neekiko'ljik , eh neen kik'ul i ruq'orom cho rib'iral i Dios .
Kikohlaam-oq chik ruq'orariik i ruk'uhb'aal i Dios , jinaj i josq'laj chikop naa reliik cho pan julkahq , naa rutoq'aam peleto kuuk' . Eh ma' naa ta kikuyum ransil , naa kikanteesjiik ruum .
Ruum wila' nqaaj chi nee qoh ehtrik i ruloq'il i Jesucristo , ajwaal wach chi naaqaye'em qak'ux chi nimanik , je' rukab' noq xqatoq'aa' cho pampeet , chi je' re' naa qak'ulum i k'ahchi' quy-eem .

Eh wila' re' chik i Jesucristo wilik taq panawánima , k'achlik taq awánjel at'iosil , ruum re' Dios hat taq chik ruko'leem chuwach i mahk , atoob' ta re' taq ati'jolal naa rukimiik , ruum je' re' i ye'ooj cho chinaah ruum i raa' ri'sil i mahk .

Re' keh chu'nchel i jalal ruq'oral i Dios xkian ti' k'axik reh . Re' keh xikansanik cho keh jarub' xiq'orik cho rib'iral chi naa ruk'uliik iloq i jinaj . Korik wach ruk'ux . Eh noq xk'ulik iloq , re' taq chik i hat xat-tz'aqwik ru mahk , eh hat taq xatkansanik reh .

Ixowanik iib' , kaansanik iib' , xohk'rik , tuskil , rub'anariik taqe xa chib'ih jariik . Re' hin i nuq'or wo' chik taq aweh je' rukab' i xnuq'or taq aweh pampeet : Chi re' i kib'anik reh taqe re' , ma' naa ta kehtriik i wihik pa runimaal rajaawriik i Dios .
Chanimaj taq i Saqum , ruum ko wilik taq chaxilak , reh chi nee taq ti k'acharik pan Saqum , inki Jesús . Ruq'orom-oq chik taqe re' , xelik reje ar , ma' kota chik xuk'uhtaaj riib' keh .
Re' reh xpa'ab'jik cho ruum i Dios chub'aan i kamanik wili , xub'an chi korik , je' rukab' noq xnimanik chaloq i Moisés xub'an i rukamaj i Dios chi korik .
Parub'ihnaal i Jesucristo , i qaj Ko'loom , xuyeew cho qeh i Dios chi manlik i Santolaj Uxlab'al .

Je' wo' re' xub'an jinaj i winaq wilik chi kixilak i re' ruuk' taqe i riih rumaam i Leví , eh aj Chipre , José i rub'ihnaal , Bernabé i rukab' b'ih xkikoj taqe aj tahqaneel ( iraaj ruq'orom Suuqb'isan K'uxliis )
Eh re' hoj , manq'uhtik qak'ux chub'anariik otob'il , ruum naa rureqem ruq'ijil noq naa qak'ulum rujilob'aal wila' ma' xub'an kiib' qak'ux chub'aan .
Yu'naak i hin , hin chik kamnaq chuwach i najtir k'uhb'aal , ruum ma' wilkiin ta chik chi ri'sil i rajaawriik . Re' la' chik i Dios i nunimaj panuk'achariik .

Chi riij i re' , xye'arik chik weh jinaj i chee' reh pajb'al je' ruwii' kaxlan aaj . Eh xq'orarik cho weh chi je' wili : Hiy , chapaj i rupaat i Dios ruch'ihil i artaal . Eh chawajlaaj taqe jarub' chi kiib' i kiloq'inik ar .

Re' taqe re' saq wach i kánima , ruum ma' xkian ta keh i k'oyomal . Eh xkinimaj chi korik i je' Rak'uun Tentzun . Eh aha' inooj i reh kiooj chi riij . Re' taqe re' xiko'ljik cho chi kixilak i tinamit wach ak'al chi je' taqe rupeet mayiij i Dios , je' wo' chi reh i je' Rak'uun Tentzun .

Re' taqe je' nimaq taq chili'l re' re' , je' kiwii' kawáyu re' ruuk' i xa uy-inik chik inki a'n ree ojik panq'aq'inik . Re' wilik wach kinaah je' cho corona re' ruuk' i oro . Eh re' kiwach je' wach winaq .

Re' taq i hat xat-ehtesjik taq chaloq pamahk . Xa re' la' , re' taq awehteesjiik xb'aan maankamanik taq aweh chi b'anb'al reh iraaj ma' raaj b'anarik . Chak'uhtaaj la' taq chi hat taq manlik raj kamanoom i Dios .

Ruum taqe re' , inqakuy ransil i ti' chub'anariik i rukamaj i Dios , ruum qeht'al chi re' hoj ruuk' i k'achlik Dios ch'iklik reje qak'ux re' i Ko'len keh chu'nchel i tinamit , eh Ko'len wo' keh chi manlik i kinimanik reh .

¿ Mi ma' nakapaaj taq re' hat chi xiik' naah ti'kiil i tojb'al kimahk naakik'ulum i ki-ixowanik wach i Rak'uun i Dios , eh inkich'uwa'reej wach i rukik'eel , re' ineesanik reh i qamahk , re' inye'wik rajaawriik i ak' k'uhb'aal , eh inkib'aj i Ruxlab'al i Dios ink'axwik keh ?
Eh je' wili i xuq'or keh i raj tahqaneel : Re' i suq kiil k'uxliis wih-oq taq awuuk' Eh nik' wach noq xirutaq'aaj cho ayu' i waJaaw i hin , je' wo' chik re' noq tinutaq'aaj taq reje i hat , inki .

Re' taqe chukul q'orik re' re' xa ch'i'k kiij . Q'e' taqe aj ch'ool . Xa q'e' q'as kiq'orik . Xa holohik tii chik kiq'orik chi riij i kas kichaaq' xa re' inkaaj chi kinimjik . Eh xa re' inkisik' i ruk'ax wach i kiti'jolal .

Eh re' taqe reey wach ak'al , taqe i nimaq wach kikamaj , taqe i kajaaw soldado , taqe i wilik kajaawriik , taqe i b'ehomaq , taqe i minooj pankowlaj kamanik , taqe i ma' awach ta intaaq'anik keh , xooj kikeb'aa' kiib' pantaq saqrehp , pantaq paat ab'aj , wataq yuuq'

Eh re' i kiyo'jik , re' i ma' kinimanik taj , re' i xiik' naah yib'kiil wach i kina'ojb'al , re' i kansan kas kichaaq' , re' i wilkeeb' pan k'oyomal , re' taqe i aj war , re' i kiloq'inik reh i tiyoox , re' taqe i chukul q'orik , chu'nchel i re' naakikutariik pan palaw q'aaq' qoplik ruuk' asufre . Re' re' i ruka'peech kimik , inki .
Eh yu'naak ma' xta chik i naa awuy-eem . Wukteen johtoq qajoq ahaa' cha pahqaaj ree i QaJaaw Jesús chi neerutz'aj amahk , inki weh i Ananías .
Eh re' rismaal kinaah je' chamiil rooq i rismaal naah ixoq . Re' keh je' reeh nimlaj kaq b'ahlam .
Re' jino'q i raj kamanoom i QaJaaw ma' ruk'ul ta chi sik'il peleto , xa chu'nchel-oq la' aj uuk' chaq'laam . Eh choloq k'uhb'alinik , xa kuyuul-oq ,

Atoob' ta ma' wilkiin ta taq awuuk' , wilkiin la' taq awuuk' panuxlab'al , ruum q'e' taq ti' tiwik'raaj reje . Eh re' xti nsuuqb'ik wii' nuk'ux i hin re' chimb'iraj taq awib'iral chi k'acharik taq i na a'n parukorkiil , eh korik taq wach ak'ux chunimjiik i Jesucristo .
ruum re' taqe i korik wach kik'ux , re' QaJaaw incha'jinik keh , eh irib'iraj chaloq i kitiij . Eh re' taqe i yiib' wach kib'anik , re' taqe re' ma' imponik ta chuwach i Dios , inki .

Eh re' hoj i ruk'ul chi eliik naa qat'iosem ree Dios taq chawiij hermano , i hat taq ruk'axam i QaJaaw , xusik' taq chaawach i Dios pampeet . Reh chi naa taq areqem ko'lemb'al reh taq awánima parub'ihnaal i Santolaj Uxlab'al , re' inye'wik taq chaaweh i santohiil , eh ruum chi xanimaj taq i korik .

Awach imb'anik ree mahk , chub'an parumahk . Awach i ch'uwa' wach , chub'an chi ch'uwa' wach . Awach i atoob' wach ruk'ux , marukanaa' chik rub'aan i otob'il . Awach i wilik rusantohiil , marukanaa' chik i santohiil , inki ánjel .

Re' Pedro je' wili i xuq'or keh : Chayot' taq ak'ux chi riij taq xa a'n , eh qajoq taq ahaa' cha ju'junaal parub'ihnaal i Jesucristo , reh chi neenkuyarik taq amahk , eh re' Dios nee taq i ruyeew chaaweh i Santolaj Uxlab'al .
Eh mo'-oq awach taq chaxilak ineruq'aj wach i yiib' wach imb'aan reh . Chachop la' taq ak'ux chub'aan otob'il , chi je' taq chawach i hat aj nimaneel , chi je' kuuk' chu'nchel i tinamit .

Eh je' wo' chik re' inki a'n taqe winaq , xkikanaa' rub'aan i kanamaj chikinaah . Ma' nkaaj ta chik wirik kuuk' i kehk'een , eh xa kiqop chik chub'anariik i yiib' wach na'ojb'al , kuuk' chik i kuch winaq inkaaj wirik . Xak'ul chik inki a'n chikiwach i k'ixb'ilaal chi b'anarik . Ruum i re' , inye'arik i ti' k'axik chikinaah ruum i Dios ruum i kisahchel laj na'ojb'al .
Je' re' noq , suuqb'oq wo' taq ak'ux haa' i hat ti ehtroq wo' taq haa' i rusuqkiil nuk'ux i hin .
Ruum aj re' , chayot' taq ak'ux chi riij taq amahk xa a'n , chajal taq wach ana'ojb'al . Eh re' Dios neerusach wach chu'nchel taq amahk , eh naa wo' ruye'em taq cho rusuqkiil awánima ,
Re' taqe ru puertahiil i tinamit re' re' ma' naa ta kitz'ahpik chi jumpech , ruum ar ma' naa ta chik rilariik wach i q'equm aq'ab' .
Raaj awach i naa ruk'uxum reh i nuti'jolal i hin eh neeruk'ej reh i nukik'eel , wilik ruk'achariik chi juneliik . Eh re' hin naawuksaniik cho reh chi k'achlik wach pantz'apaab' poo wach reh i q'iij ,

Re' Jesús je' wili ruchaq'weesjiik xub'an : Ma' xta naq k'isinoq awajaawriik chi nunaah ma' ta ruye'em cha wajaawriik i Dios . Ruum aj re' , awach i xq'asanik weh panaq'ab' , xiik' naah i ru mahk i reh chawach i hat , inki .
Je' wo' re' i runimjiik i Dios wila' xa rutkeel i nimanik imb'aan chi ma' ruch'ihil taj otob'il inkahnik chi kamnaq .

Eh re' i ma' xub'an ta rub'aan i najtir k'uhb'aal ruum ma' xta rajaawriik chub'aan . Ruum aj re' , re' i Dios xutaq'aaj chaloq i Rak'uun chi je' ruwii' winaq aj mahk . Eh xuyeew panti' k'axik i Rak'uun chi jilow mayiij reh i rutojariik riij i mahk , reh i rusachariik wach i mahk i ruk'ax wach i qati'jolal .
Eh atoob' ta neenkian taq aweh i ti' k'axik ruum i rub'anariik i korik laj na'ojb'al , suuqb'oq taq ak'ux . Matyo'jik taq awach aj uum , eh maayoj wo' taq ak'ux kuum .
Je' wo' taq i hat tuutb'ees ajaab'ees , maa kaqrisaj taq awak'uun awixq'uun chi xama' xta rub'ehel , reh chi ma' nee ta ntukinik wach kik'ux .

Re' ánjel re' re' kow xuq'or cho chi je' wili : xq'ehb'ik chik , xq'ehb'ik chik panti' k'axik i nimlaj tinamit Babilonia . Eh xsutinik chi kipaat i raj kamanoom i aj Yahm , je' wo' chi ke'emb'al kiib' i xa chib'ih chik jariik chi ma' tob'laj uxlab'al . Xsutinik chi ye'aab' kisuuq' xa chib'ih tz'inkaal ch'uwa' kiwach , eh xiik' naah yib'kiil kiwach .

¿ Awach i aj chukul q'orik re' re' ? Re' inq'orik reh chi re' Jesús ma' re' taj i Cristo , i q'orooj cho rib'iral chi naruk'uliik , re' aj i re' i rukoj riib' chi Cristo . Ni xata re' Ajaab'ees , ni xata re' Ak'uunb'ees i runimaj .

Eh xa awach pa' i ma' parub'ehel ta neeruk'ux reh i kaxlanwi'k neeruk'ej reh i ha' wilik pan kulk reh ixq'eq jinaj runimaal mahk k'ahchi' rub'anam chi riij i ruti'jolal i QaJaaw Jesucristo , je' wo' chi riij i rukik'eel .
Re' hat i ma' xta na'ojb'al , chanab'eej chi re' i nimanik imb'aan chi rutkeel chi ma' re' ta haa' otob'il , xama' xta kamaj inkahnik wii' .

Re' Judas xooj k'oloq ar , ruch'ihil taqe i ruk'ihaal soldado , ruch'ihil taqe i kicha'jinik reh i rupaat i Dios xitaq'ab'jik reje kuum i k'amal kib'eeh aj tiij , kuum i aj fariseo . Wilik taqe i yoq'ooq' kich'ihch' , yoq'ooq' kisaqumb'aal , i yoq'ooq' kiq'aaq' ju' taq chee' .
Eh re' QaJaaw Jesucristo reh , korik wach ruk'ux , nee taq i ruyeew rukowiil ak'ux , nee taq tiruko'leej chuwach i yiib' wach na'ojb'al .
Eh noq xkanab'jik ruum i rutuut rajaaw i Moisés , xmolarik ruum i rixq'uun i kireey i aj Egipto , eh je' ink'ihteesjik xti ruha'lak'uun xub'an reh .

Eh re' ánjel re' re' xuchop i sansario , xuham i nah wach q'aaq' chupaam , re' i wilik chinaah i artaal , eh xujalk'iij cho chinaah i wach ak'al . Eh xub'an i ma' k'isa kahoq , xan reprotik chik i ruch'aab' , xa nteleninik chik , eh xub'an jinaj kowlaj yihk noq xwil .

Ruum re' i nimaq taq tinamit je' naa xuxohk'risaj taqe ruuk' i k'ah laj ha' , ruuk' k'oyomal xutijej taqe wii' . Re' taqe reey wilkeeb' sut i wach ak'al xi wihik wo' pan k'oyomal ruuk' i tinamit re' re' . Eh re' taqe aj yakool wilkeeb' sut i wach ak'al xib'ehoomb'rik ruum i ruk'aayjiik i xama' xta rutiq , re' q'e' imponik chuwach i Babilonia , inki .
Xa ruum i ruq'orariik taqe re' xinkichop aj judío chupaam i rupaat i Dios eh xkaaj naq nukanteesjiik .
Naakiq'eb'em chi riij kik'ux rib'irjiik i korik eh re' chik naa ruponiik chikiwach rib'irjiik i xama' xta rub'ehel laj k'utaaj .
Xa re' la' , ko wilik wo' taq chaxilak i hat i ma' kinimanik ta reh , inki . Re' Jesús xa reht'al wo' chik awach i ma' kinimanik ta reh . Eh awach naa ruk'ayiniik reh chi ma' eht'alimaj .

Re' Jesús je' wili i chaq'wik xub'an : Awach pa' aj eh nee nuyeew i tz'aqik laj kaxlanwi'k re' re' i nuq'or inki . Eh xut'aqsaj i kaxlanwi'k , xuyeew reh i Judas , re' rak'uun jinaj i winaq , Simón i b'ih .

Re' hat Timoteo , chako'leej riij i ye'ooj cha naah ruum i Dios . Maab'iraj taqe i yeb'ee wach k'utaaj , i xama' xta rutiq wach , je' wo' hoq i wech'inik iib' chi riij i na'ojb'al , i xa je' tii chik korik laj na'ojb'al noq inq'orarik .

Eh re' taqe aj judío ma' xinimanik taj xchalik kik'aah , xkimol wach i winaq yiib' wach kina'ojb'al , re' ruuk' taqe xa sub'ul q'iij , reh chi xkiyoj ruk'ux i tinamit . Xkimin i koq kiib' parupaat aj nimaneel , Jason rub'ihnaal , chusik'ariik i Pablo , i Silas , reh i kehteesjiik chaloq , eh naa naq kiq'asam pan kiq'ab' i tinamit .

Eh awach i xrilow i ruch hermano chi xub'an i mahk ma' k'amwik ta pankimik , inchol rub'anam rutiij chi riij , reh chi neenye'arik ruk'achariik ruum i Dios . Xa re' la' wi ma' re' ruuk' i mahk ink'amwik pankimik xub'an . Eh awach imb'anik reh i mahk ink'amwik pankimik , ra'j ma' nee ta nuq'or re' chi neenb'aan tiij chi riij .

Re' hin xti korik taq i nuq'or aweh chi awach ink'ulwik reh i nutaq'aaj reje i hin , re' wo' hin kiruk'ul ruuk' , eh awach ink'ulwik wee hin , i ruk'ul wo' ruuk' awach i xtaaq'anik cho wee hin , inki Jesús .

Re' runimaal rajaawriik i Dios i ruyeew qeh ma' nee ta rub'an chi nee nelik paruye'aab' . Eh qat'iosej taq ree Dios i naa rub'anam quuk' wili . Eh qaloq'ej taq i Dios chu'nchel qak'ux . Eh qohloch'ik-oq chuwach i Dios chi loq'oomb'al reh je' rukab' imponik chuwach i reh ,

Eh wilik taqe aj judío xak'ul kiooj pantaq b'eeh xkaaj naq chi parub'ihnaal i Jesús inkesaj i ma' tob'laj uxlab'al kuuk' yowaab' . Eh je' wili i xkiq'or reh taqe ma' tob'laj uxlab'al : Eleen taq reje kuuk' i yowaab' parub'ihnaal i Jesús , re' i k'ahchi' ruq'orom rib'iral i Pablo , inki taqe .
Eh re' Pablo reh , re' i Silas xupab'aa' chi ruch'ihil . Eh pahqalimaj-oq chik i rotob'il i QaJaaw chikinaah kuum taqe aj nimaneel , xi elik reje ar .
Re' taq i hat chawik'raaj taq awiib' maayeew taq chi re' chi ma' re' i wach taq aakamaj k'ahchi' taq kaat , reh chi manlik wach i jilow taq naa ak'ulum .

Re' i ki'ib' re' re' , ye'ooj kajaawriik chupa'ab'jiik i jab' pan taxaaj , nik' pa' najtiil naa kiq'orom i k'uhb'aal . Eh ye'ooj kajaawriik chi neenkisutej chi kik' taqe ha' , eh chuye'ariik xa jar b'uhr wach chi ti' k'axik chinaah i wach ak'al xa jarpech pa' inkaaj i keh pankik'ux .
Re' hat , ma' jaruuj neenye'arik aweh i ajaawriik re' re' , ruum re' hat ma' korik ta wach awánima chuwach i Dios .
Chu'nchel i weh i hin , aweh wo' i hat , eh re' taqe aweh i hat , wee hin wo' taqe . Eh re' i nuloq'il , kuuk' i keh ink'utinik .
Chi kunchelaal xkichop q'ab' rub'aan i yeb'ee wach na'ojb'al . Ma' awach ta keh imb'anik reh i holohik laj na'ojb'al jinaj ta naq reje .
Ma' xtaj i otob'il taq neena a'n chi wilik taq inenawaaj chi riij , ni xata nee taq inanimb'isaj awiib' chub'aan ruuk' la' chaq'lamiil taq naa a'nam . Eh maa awach i ruq'at wach i tokoom .
Eh jinaj i je' ruwii' winaq wilik chi kixilak i wuquub' chi ye'aab' kantela re' re' , koju' rooq poninaq i ruso' . Eh re' rusincho b'ak'lik chi' ruk'ux re' ruuk' i oro .

Chupaam i tinamit re' re' , ma' awach ta chik i naa ruk'ulum i ti' k'axik , ruum ar xa re' chik i loq'laj ruye'aab' i Dios , i ruye'aab' i je' Rak'uun Tentzun naa ruwihiik , eh re' taqe raj kamanoom naa kiloq'inik reh ar .
Eh chu'nchel i xa chib'ih jariik i wilik ilook' insahchik kiwach . Ruum aj re' , re' taq i hat , korik-oq wach taq ana'ojb'al , eh maakanaa' taq chub'anariik atiij .
Ar xi okik reje pan barco noq xiooj wo' chik k'oloq Antioquía , re' i xye'arik cho wii' i rotob'il i Dios chikinaah pampeet reh i rub'aan i kamanik , re' i kikohlaam chik wach rub'aan .

Wila' xa a'n kaxáro , ma' re' ta mahk i neena a'n . Eh wila' xub'an kaxáro i q'ahxoq , ma' re' ta wo' mahk i neerub'an . Xa re' la' re' taqe inki a'n kaxáro ti' naakik'iik wii' , re' hin ma' nwaaj ta naq chi je' re' ineenkik'ul .

ruum re' hoj ma' kuuk' ta taqe quch ti'jolal k'ahchi'kooj chi peleto . Kuuk' la' taqe i k'ih b'uhr kiwach chi ma' tob'laj uxlab'al wilkeeb' cho panteew k'ahchi'kooj chi peleto . Re' taqe re' kitaaq'anik , wilik kajaawriik , eh kichopom naah i tinamit wach ak'al panq'equm kiye'em ruum i mahk .
Wila' awach taq aweh i ko wilik iraaj i runa'ojb'al , chupahqaaj ree Dios , ruum re' Dios ma' pajooj taj noq i ruyeew chu'nchel aj eh , ruum ma' awach taj i tokoom rilariik i rub'an .
Maa chup taq i rajaawriik i Santolaj Uxlab'al wilik taq panawánima .

Re' santo laj itz'ihy naah paat inlooq'jik wii' Dios je' wili ruyejeb'jiik b'anooj : Re' peet tasb'al paam wilik i koq panookb'al , Loq'laj Ye'aab' rub'ihnaal . Ar xi wihik i ye'aab' kantela , ruch'ihil i mexa ye'aab' kaxlanwi'k re' inq'ahteesjik chi mayiij .

Ruum aj re' , i nukoj ana'ojb'al chi chaloq' aweh wuuk' i oro , korb'isamaj pan q'aaq' . Chi je' re' , netib'ehoomrik chi manlik . Eh chaloq' asaq' so' wuuk' , reh chi nee nakoj chawiij b'urb'al wach ak'ixb'ilaal , ruum t'usulkaat . Chaloq aawiq'oom wuuk' tz'ajb'al paam i naq'awach , reh chi nee chik ti'ilwik .
Re' hin inutz'ihb'aaj taq reje aweh i huuj wili i tinimanik taq reh i Rak'uun i Dios , reh chi nee taq inanab'eej chi wilik taq aak'achariik chi juneliik .

Awach i xa paruk'ux inchalik i k'uhb'alinik i rub'an , xa re' reh raaj chi neenye'arik ruloq'il . Raaj awach i re' i ruloq'il i xtaaq'anik cho reh iraaj rusik'im , re' reh , re' i korik i ruq'or , eh ma' xtaj i yiib' wach i rub'an .

Eh re' xiik' naah k'ihaal tz'aaq wili , ar molik pan qati'jolal xa je' rukab' jino'q ak'al xun xa re' yu' impaxik . Ar aj ink'utinik re' chi xa re' wo' Dios i xiik' naah nimaal rajaawriik , ma' re' tee hoj .

Re' taq i hat loq'laj hermano , maaq'aj taq wach i neenb'aan taq aweh . Chakanaa' la' taq chi re' Dios nee ruyeew i chee rujosq'iil , ruum tz'ihb'amaj chaloq chi je' wili i ruq'or i Dios : Re' hin naa nuq'atwiik q'orik chinaah i ju'jun . Eh re' hin naa nuq'ajwiik wach reh i rub'an , inki .

Re' i Jesús je' wili i xuq'or keh : Wila' xa re' hin i nuyeew runimaal nuwach chi wib'il wiib' , xama' xta neenokik wii' re' la' waJaaw inye'wik runimaal nuwach , re' wo' inaq'or taq chi aaDios i hat .

Re' i hat , maa sach wach i rukamaj i Dios ruum i k'uxb'al awa' inak'ux . Xti korik noq chu'nchel i xa chib'ih jariik chi k'uxb'al wi'k ma' mahk ta chi k'uxarik . Re' mahk chi b'anarik re' chi neenayoj rik'ux aahermano ruuk' i k'uxb'al awa' neenak'ux , re' ma' toob' ta chi k'uxarik chi ree reh .

Eh re' José ruch'ihil i Nicodemo xkik'am reje i ruti'jolal i Jesús . Xkib'ot reje pan itz'ihy xkimuhaa' chupaam ink'ohnik laj iq'oom re' re' , ruum je' re' i okrinaq taqe wii' i aj judío noq inkimuq'aa' i kikamnaaq .

Xti korik noq re' taq i hat xaketelaaj taq kiwach taq awuch aj nimaneel i xiye'arik pantz'ilom . Eh noq xkiq'uch i chib'ih taq aweh , xama' ti' ta wo' taq xawiik'raaj , ruum aweht'al taq chi xiik' naah chihojal i jilow taq naa ruye'ariik aweh pan taxaaj , re' i ma' jaruuj chik naa rusahchiik wach .
Eh jinaj cho chi kixilak i riih rumaam i David wili , re' i Jesús , re' i xutaq'aaj chaloq i Dios chi kiko'ljiik i tinamit Israel , je' wo' rukab' i ruq'orom chaloq pampeet i Dios .

Je' rukab' i ruq'or i tz'ihb'amaj chaloq chi je' wili : Re' taqe na'ojb'al wili ruyejaam cho wach i Dios chi keh i kik'axwik reh , re' i ma' awach ta ilwinaq ib'irinaq cho reh , eh ni xata kapeb'imaj chaloq , inki .

Eh wila' re' Santolaj Ruxlab'al i Dios , i x-uksanik cho reh i Jesucristo chi k'achlik wach , wilik taq panawánima , re' wo' chik i reh naa ruksaniik cho reh taq ati'jolal i hat chi k'achlik wach ruuk' i Santolaj Ruxlab'al wilik taq panawánima .
Eh re' i Santolaj Uxlab'al i rub'an jinaj wach ruuk' i qánjel qat'iosil i hoj re' inq'orik reh chi hoj chik manlik rak'uun rixq'uun i Dios .
Mayeew taq awiib' chi jot'arik , ruum re' Dios ma' awach ta neenjot'wik reh , ruum re' reh chu'nchel reht'al . Chakoj taq rehtaal aha' wilik intikarik re' wo' chik i re' injacharik .

Chawil taq re' , re' Dios xiik' naah i rotob'il , eh xiik' wo' naah i rujosq'iil , xuk'uhtaaj cho chikinaah i ma' xkaaj ta runimjiik i Jesucristo . Eh awuuk' taq i hat q'e' atoob' . Re' rotob'il re' re' eliik naa ruwihiik taq awuuk' wila' xak'am taq naah . Eh wila' xakanaa' wo' chik taq i runimjiik i Jesucristo , ma' naa ta taq kaat rukojom paruman .

Ruum aj re' hermano , xa hat-oq taq kuyuul korehtaal i ruk'uliik ruka'peech i QaJaaw Jesucristo . Chakoj taq rehtaal i rub'an i aj ab'ixoom : Re' reh i rukuy ruyub'jiik i jab' , kora'j i rub'an re' iiwik . Eh i rukuy wo' ruyub'jiik i ruq'ijil i rumolariik i ru holohik laj wach i rutik .
Re' ta naq i QaJaaw neen ketelinik kiwach taqe i awach reh parupaat i Onesíforo , ruum re' reh k'ih pech xk'ulik ruyeew rusuqkiil nuk'ux . Eh ma' xk'ixik ta wuum chi wilkiin chi prexohjik .

Hat taq kok' wak'uun wixq'uun noq wilkaat , yu'naak maakanaa' taq chik i wihik ruuk' i Jesucristo , reh chi ch'iklik qak'ux taq awuuk' pankomonil na' k'oloq ruka'peech , eh chi ma' naa ta qak'ixiik na' qoh-ohoq pa'lojoq chuwach .
Re' hin i nuq'or taq aweh : Chi ti k'acharoq taq je' rukab' iraaj i Santolaj Uxlab'al , reh chi ma' nee ta chik taq i na a'n i yiib' wach na'ojb'al inak'ax taq wach aati'jolal ,

Re' wili xti korik eh ajwaal wach chi chu'nchel naakinimaniik reh chi re' Jesucristo xk'ulik ayu' wach ak'al chi kiko'ljiik taqe aj mahk . Eh re' naq i hin xti xiik' cho naah i numahk chikiwach i keh .
Eh yu'naak hermano , i nuq'or taq aweh chi chasik' taq rukowiil ak'ux ruuk' i runimaal rajaawriik i QaJaaw Jesucristo .
Je' re' noq , awach i kow ruk'ux chi nimanik , inchol riik'raam riib' chi manq'ehb'ik chik pamahk .
ruum re' Jesucristo reh , xa ruuk' i jinaj chi mayiij xuyeew , xukanaa' chi ma' xta chik kimahk taqe i wilik kisantohiil .
Xkib'iraj chi je' re' taqe i k'amal kib'eeh i aj judío , xkichop taqe chaloq ab'aj kantesb'al naq reh i Jesús .
Xa re' la' , inwaaj chi nee taq inareq chi riij chi re' i Jesucristo i K'amal rub'eeh i ju'jun chi winaq . Eh re' b'ahiilb'ees k'amal rub'eeh i rehk'een , re' i Dios K'amal rub'eeh i Jesucristo .
Wilik wo' taqe i xk'uhtjik cho kik'ixb'ilaal . Wilik i xiq'ojib'ik . Wilik i xb'ak'arik cho kooq kiq'ab' . Eh wilik i xiye'arik cho pantz'ilom .

Re' i xye'wik rukowiil qak'ux , eh ma' k'ul ta chik inooj i qakapeew je' rukab' i barco kojooj toob'al reh ma' k'ul ta inooj . Eh k'ahchi' quy-eem i xkojwik i koq qeh ko chi juntar tasb'al paam i wilik cho wii' Dios .
Matokik taq haa' chub'anariik taqe xama' xta kamaj inki a'n i wilkeeb' chi k'acharik panq'equm . Chaq'or la' taq rukorkiil keh chi ma' toob' taj inki a'n

Re' taq i hat hermano , maach'olej taq awiib' . Awach i ruch'olej i ruhermano , eh i ruq'at q'orik chinaah , k'ahchi' wo' ruch'olem i ruk'uhb'aal i Dios , eh i ruq'at i q'orik chinaah . Eh awach i ruq'at i q'orik chinaah i k'uhb'aal , aj q'atal q'orik chik chinaah i k'uhb'aal , ruum ma' re' ta chik runimjiik i rub'an .

Re' kab'laj chi ru puertahiil i tinamit kab'laj wo' chi perla ab'aj . Eh re' ju'jun chi puerta , ju'jun chi perla i ruyej-aal . Eh re' nimb'eeh panyejaal i tinamit xti xa oro chik je' rukab' i lemow xasaqum chik paam .

Eh re' Jesucristo reh , Rak'uun i Dios , xub'an i kamanik chi korik chi kixilak i rak'uun rixq'uun i Dios . Re' taqe ak'uunb'ees ixq'uunb'ees wili re' hoj , wila' ma' xyoj qak'ux , eh wila' xa eliik suq qak'ux chi ruyub'jiik i k'ahchi' reje quy-eem .
Eh xti korik-oq taq aweh i k'axooj cha a'n . Eh chaq'eb' taq chi riij ak'ux i yiib' wach na'ojb'al , re' chik i holohik laj na'ojb'al taq cha a'n .

Chupaam i jumehq' re' re' , jinaj i kowlaj yihk xub'an . Eh je' naa ru lajeeb' q'at paam i nimlaj tinamit xb'oq qohoq aak'al chi ki'sil . Eh wuquub' miil chi tinamit i xikimik ruum i kowlaj yihk . Eh nik' nimaal i ma' xikimik taj , ma' k'isiin ta noqxiyo'jik , xkiloq'ej Dios wilik cho pan taxaaj .
Eh noq re' Dios inq'orik chi wilik i naa ruye'em ma' kota ruman chi wilik jalal ruq'oral , ruum re' Dios xa jinaj wo' hoq .

Re' i Pilato je' wili i xuq'or reh i Jesús : ¿ Chib'ih reet noq ma' kinachaq'weej taj ? ¿ Mi ma' aweht'al re' hat chi wilik wajaawriik reh aakojariik wach kuruus , eh wilik wo' wajaawriik reh awoq'tesjiik reje ? inki .

Re' i ruq'oral i Dios k'ahchi' rilom wach , re' i tz'ihb'amaj chaloq chi je' wili : Re' reh , je' ink'amarik reje tentzun pan kantesb'al xb'aan , ma' xuk'er ta chii' , je' rukab' noq ink'amarik reje tentzun chuwach i kiyok'wik reh i rismaal i riij ma' xta xuq'or .
Eh chi riij re' , xkipahqaaj jinaj kireey . Re' Dios re' Saúl rak'uun i Cis xuyeew cho chi kireey chuwach i ka'winaq haab' . Re' Saúl ar inchalik chupaam i tinamit , Benjamín .

Ruum ma' k'isiin taqe i ma' nkaaj ta nimanik . Eh re' i kib'anik ree re' , re' taqe i kow inkiq'or chi koruman chi naa rupoch'ariik naah k'achab' . Eh xama' xta rub'ehel taqe inkiq'or , xa re' jot'ooj inki a'n
Eh chuwach i itz'ihy re' re' , k'ih b'uhr wach chikop wilkeeb' ar : Wilik taqe i kijib' kooq , wilik taqe i kijukem kiib' noq kib'ehik , wilik taqe tz'ikin kirupinik .
Re' hin xnuyeew chik keh i loq'il je' rukab' i xayeew weh i hat , reh chi xa jinaj chik wach kik'ux , je' rukab' noq wilkiin i hin awuuk' i hat xa jinaj wach qak'ux .
Je' re' noq maakanaa' chik i xti korik laj tijinik xponik nuk'uhtaaj aweh . Eh tinimanoq , tik'axwoq je' rukab' iraaj i Jesucristo .

Eh ar wilkeeb' i waqiib' chi nimaq ikom , ab'aj kiyej-aal , ye'aab' kihaa' i aj judío tz'ajb'al kiib' niimb'al reh i k'uhb'aal . Re' taqe nimaq taq ikom re' re' , je' naa ox ox ikom chi ha' paam i ju'jun .

Eh re' i holohik laj na'ojb'al taq cha a'n , maa a'n taq chik i mahk , ruum wilik i wilkeeb' taq chaxilak xa je' ma' keht'al ta wach i Dios . Re' wili taq i nuq'or reje aweh , reh chi nee taq tik'ixik chub'aan .
Eh xa tiloch'ik tik'upik-oq taq atoob'-oq wach taq ak'ux wilik-oq i q'unil taq awuuk' , k'ul taq cha kuy amahk chawach ruuk' k'axooj .

Chako'leej wo' taqe aawas achaaq' , reh chi ma' nee ta kiooj pan q'aaq' . Eh re' chik taqe junch'uq , chaketelaaj taq kiwach . Xa re' la' , chawik'raaj taq awiib' i hat chayib'uj taq i kiso' , ruum re' keh ruchopom i kiso' i ruyib'kiil wach i kina'ojb'al .
Eh re' hoj qeht'al wo' hoq chi chu'nchel i chib'ih jariik wilik inkamanik chi toob'al keh i kik'axwik ree Dios , re' taqe i xusik' cho kiwach chi rak'uun rixq'uun taqe , je' rukab' i xraaj i reh .

Chu'nchel kieht'alinik reh chi re' taq i hat xanimaj taq chik i Dios . Ruum i re' , q'e' insuuqb'ik nuk'ux taq chawiij . Eh re' hin inwaaj chi nee taq inak'uhtaaj chi wilik taq ana'ojb'al chub'aan otob'il , ma' re' ta chub'aan i yeb'ee wach na'ojb'al .

Ar wo' wilik jinaj i artaal re' ruuk' oro k'atb'al insensia . Ar wilik i loq'laj kaxoon k'ul b'uruuj wach chi oro , je' chi riij , je' chupaam , molb'al reh i peet k'uhb'aal , ar molooj jinaj i xaro re' ruuk' i oro , re' i molik wii' i maná . Eh ar molooj i rukarote i Aarón , i xpoq' cho rutoxl . Eh ar molooj i ki'ib' chi tz'ilom ab'aj re' i tz'ihb'amaj wii' i ru lajeeb' k'uhb'aal i Dios .

¿ Aha' wilik inqanimb'isaj naq cho wii' qawach ? Xsahchik wach ¿ Chib'ih reet noq xsahchik wach ? Ma' ruum taj i runimjiik i ruq'or i najtir k'uhb'aal , xa ruum la' chi nqayeew qak'ux chunimjiik i Jesucristo .

¿ Mi ma' nanimaj re' hat chi re' hin wilik wuuk' i waJaaw , eh wilkiin wo' ruuk' i reh ? Re' taqe i xa chib'ih jariik i nuq'or taq aweh i hat , ma' xata panuk'ux inchalik re' la' i waJaaw wilik wuuk' i rub'an chee rukamaj wuuk' .
Xkimol cho kiib' i tinamit chukojariik kimahk i Pablo , i Silas . Eh ruum i re' , re' taqe q'atal q'orik xkiq'or chi ehteesjoq i kiso' chikiij eh chi kiye'aroq chi tz'uhuum ruuk' q'ab' chee' .

Re' hin i nuq'or taq aweh i jinaj i ak' k'uhb'aal wili , re' chi k'ul taq cha k'ax awiib' chawach . Nik' wach noq ti nuk'ax taq i hin , je' wo' re' inchol taq a'nam i hat k'ul taq cha k'ax awiib' chawach .

Re' qati'jolal wili rupaat qánjel qat'iosil , xa sahchik wach reh . Eh xa je' rukab' itz'ihy naah paat xan sahchik wach . Eh wila' xsahchik wach i qati'jolal wili , re' hoj qeht'al chi re' Dios ruyejaam cho qeh pan taxaaj jinaj i rupaat i qánjel qat'iosil , ma' re' ta ruyej-aniik winaq , eh reh chi juneliik .
Re' Jesús kow xuq'or chi je' wili : Awach i nimanik wee hin , ma' xata re' hin kirunimaj i runimaj la' wo' haa' i waJaaw xtaaq'anik cho weh .
Noq xrib'iraj i q'orik wili i Ananías , je' wili i xuq'or : Jaaw , re' hin k'ih aaxik'utjanik weh chi re' winaq re' re' , yohb'aal wach ti'kiil i rub'an keh i kinimanik aweh wilkeeb' Jerusaleem .

Re' tinamit xa re' keh naakik'axam kiib' , naakik'axam wach i tumiin , naakinimb'isam kiwach , xama' tiklik ta naa kib'aniik . Eh ma' holohik ta naa kiq'oriik chi riij i Dios , ma' naa ta kinimam i kituut kajaaw ma' xtaj naakit'iosem , ni xata naakinimam i korik .
Eh yu'naak hoj chik ko'limaj chuwach i mahk ruum i ti'laj kimik xuk'ul i Jesucristo . Ruum aj re' , parub'ihnaal i reh , na qako'ljiik chuwach i rujosq'iil i Dios .

Re' hin , ruum chi nuye'em nuk'ux chunimjiik i QaJaaw Jesucristo , weht'al chi ma' xtaj i k'uxb'al wi'k mahk chi k'uxarik . Eh wila' awach inkapeb'inik reh chi wilik i k'uxb'al wi'k mahk chi k'uxarik , mahk wo' chi neeruk'ux i reh .

Timoteo , wila' xak'uhtaaj keh i hermano taqe re' , wila' k'ahchi' areqem rukowiil ak'ux i ruuk' korik laj nimanik , ruuk' i holohik laj tijinik k'ahchi' kaat , chi je' re' hat manlik raj kamanoom i Jesucristo .
